0.text: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
0.name: charizard

1.text: A brutal Pokemon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
1.name: blastoise

2.text: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
2.name: ekans

3.text: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
3.name: vulpix

4.text: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
4.name: poliwhirl

5.text: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
5.name: machamp

6.text: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
6.name: farfetchd

7.text: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
7.name: dewgong

8.text: Under a full moon, this Pokemon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
8.name: gengar

9.text: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
9.name: exeggutor

10.text: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
10.name: rhyhorn

11.text: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
11.name: pinsir

12.text: A prehistoric Pokemon that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.
12.name: omastar

13.text: A Pokemon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.
13.name: kabuto

14.text: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
14.name: moltres

15.text: An extremely rarely seen marine Pokemon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
15.name: dragonite

16.text: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.
16.name: ivysaur

17.text: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.
17.name: pikachu

18.text: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.
18.name: nidorina

19.text: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it's an earthquake.
19.name: dugtrio

20.text: A legendary POKMON in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.
20.name: arcanine

21.text: Lives lazily by the sea. If the SHELLDER on its tail comes off, it becomes a SLOWPOKE again.
21.name: slowbro

22.text: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.
22.name: magnemite

23.text: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.
23.name: farfetchd

24.text: One of DODUO's 2 heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 MPH in prairies.
24.name: dodrio

25.text: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.
25.name: onix

26.text: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.
26.name: weezing

27.text: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.
27.name: rhydon

28.text: As long as the center section is unharmed, it can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.
28.name: staryu

29.text: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.
29.name: eevee

30.text: Its DNA is almost the same as MEW's. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.
30.name: mewtwo

31.text: Even though it is filled with ACID, it does not melt because it also oozes a neutralizing fluid.
31.name: weepinbell

32.text: The shell is very durable. Even if it cracks, it can survive without spilling the contents.
32.name: exeggcute

33.text: If it eats the plant stick it carries as emergency rations, it runs off in search of a new stick.
33.name: farfetchd

34.text: Swings its long antlers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.
34.name: pinsir

35.text: As it warms itself and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.
35.name: venusaur

36.text: If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously, even if it gets a bit wet.
36.name: charmander

37.text: Its long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, making it quite popular among older people.
37.name: wartortle

38.text: It firmly plants its feet on the ground before shooting water from the jets on its back.
38.name: blastoise

39.text: It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.
39.name: caterpie

40.text: This is its pre- evolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
40.name: metapod

41.text: It flits from flower to flower, collecting honey. It can even identify distant flowers in bloom.
41.name: butterfree

42.text: The barb on top of its head secretes a strong poison. It uses this toxic barb to protect itself.
42.name: weedle

43.text: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.
43.name: kakuna

44.text: It uses sharp, poisonous stings to defeat prey, then takes the victim back to its nest for food.
44.name: beedrill

45.text: It rapidly flaps its wings in the grass, stirring up a dust cloud that drives insect prey out into the open.
45.name: pidgey

46.text: It slowly flies in a circular pattern, all the while keeping a sharp lookout for prey.
46.name: pidgeotto

47.text: Its outstanding vision allows it to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even while flying at 3300 feet.
47.name: pidgeot

48.text: This Pokemon's impressive vitality allows it to live anywhere. It also multiplies very quickly.
48.name: rattata

49.text: To protect its territory, it flies around ceaselessly, making high- pitched cries.
49.name: spearow

50.text: It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.
50.name: fearow

51.text: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.
51.name: ekans

52.text: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.
52.name: sandshrew

53.text: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.
53.name: sandslash

54.text: It has a docile nature. If it is threatened with attack, it raises the barbs that are all over its body.
54.name: nidorina

55.text: The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.
55.name: nidoqueen

56.text: It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.
56.name: nidoranm

57.text: It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.
57.name: nidorino

58.text: It uses its thick arms, legs and tail to attack forcefully. Melee combat is its specialty.
58.name: nidoking

59.text: Though rarely seen, it becomes easier to spot, for some reason, on the night of a  full moon.
59.name: clefairy

60.text: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.
60.name: jigglypuff

61.text: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
61.name: zubat

62.text: When it plunges its fangs into its prey, it instantly draws and gulps down more than ten ounces of blood.
62.name: golbat

63.text: The smell from its drool-like syrup and the pollen on its petals is so bad, it may make opponents faint.
63.name: gloom

64.text: By shaking its big petals, it scatters toxic pollen into the air, turning the air yellow.
64.name: vileplume

65.text: The tochukaso growing on this Pokemon's back orders it to extract juice from tree trunks.
65.name: paras

66.text: When nothing's left to extract from the bug, the mushrooms on its back leave spores on the bug's egg.
66.name: parasect

67.text: The small bugs it eats appear only at night, so it sleeps in a hole in a tree until night falls.
67.name: venonat

68.text: It digs underground and chews on tree roots, sticking its head out only when the sun isn't bright.
68.name: diglett

69.text: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.
69.name: persian

70.text: The only time it can use its psychic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.
70.name: psyduck

71.text: It will beat up anyone who makes it mad, even if it has to chase them until the end of the world.
71.name: primeape

72.text: It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.
72.name: growlithe

73.text: The swirl on its belly is its insides showing through the skin. It looks clearer after it eats.
73.name: poliwag

74.text: Though it is skilled at walking, it prefers to live underwater where there is less danger.
74.name: poliwhirl

75.text: It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.
75.name: abra

76.text: When it closes its eyes, twice as many alpha particles come out of the surface of its body.
76.name: kadabra

77.text: It has an IQ of 5000. It calculates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.
77.name: alakazam

78.text: It trains by lifting rocks in the mountains. It can even pick up a GRAVELER with ease.
78.name: machop

79.text: This tough Pokemon always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.
79.name: machoke

80.text: If it notices anything that moves, it immediately flings its vine at the object.
80.name: bellsprout

81.text: When it's hungry, it swings its razor-sharp leaves, slicing up any unlucky object nearby for food.
81.name: weepinbell

82.text: As it floats along on the waves, it uses its toxic feelers to stab anything it touches.
82.name: tentacool

83.text: When its 80 feelers absorb water, it stretches to become like a net to entangle its prey.
83.name: tentacruel

84.text: Proud of their sturdy bodies, they bash against each other in a contest to prove whose is harder.
84.name: geodude

85.text: It travels by rolling on mountain paths. If it gains too much speed, it stops by running into huge rocks.
85.name: graveler

86.text: Its rock-like body is so durable, even high-powered dynamite blasts fail to scratch its rugged hide.
86.name: golem

87.text: Training by jumping over grass that grows longer every day has made it a world-class jumper.
87.name: ponyta

88.text: It just loves to gallop. The faster it goes, the longer the swaying flames of its mane will become.
88.name: rapidash

89.text: It is always so absent-minded that it won't react, even if its flavorful tail is bitten.
89.name: slowpoke

90.text: An attached SHELLDER won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
90.name: slowbro

91.text: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.
91.name: magnemite

92.text: When many MAGNETON gather together, the resulting magnetic storm disrupts radio waves.
92.name: magneton

93.text: In order to prevent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these Pokemon.
93.name: farfetchd

94.text: It lives on a grassy plain where it can see a long way. If it sees an enemy, it runs away at 60 mph.
94.name: doduo

95.text: The light blue fur that covers it keeps it protected against the cold. It loves iceberg- filled oceans.
95.name: seel

96.text: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.
96.name: muk

97.text: Even a missile can't break the spikes it uses to stab opponents. They're even harder than its shell.
97.name: cloyster

98.text: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.
98.name: haunter

99.text: The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.
99.name: hypno

100.text: If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.
100.name: krabby

101.text: During the study of this Pokemon, it was discovered that its components are not found in nature.
101.name: voltorb

102.text: If even one is separated from the group, the energy bond between the six will make them rejoin instantly.
102.name: exeggcute

103.text: Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an EXEGGCUTE.
103.name: exeggutor

104.text: It lost its mother after its birth. It wears its mother's skull, never revealing its true face.
104.name: cubone

105.text: Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for MAROWAK. It gets its bones from those graves.
105.name: marowak

106.text: It is also called the Kick Master. It uses its elastic legs to execute every known kick.
106.name: hitmonlee

107.text: To increase the strength of all its punch moves, it spins its arms just before making contact.
107.name: hitmonchan

108.text: It has a tongue that is over 6'6"long. It uses this long tongue to lick its body clean.
108.name: lickitung

109.text: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.
109.name: koffing

110.text: By lightly spinning its drill- like horn, it can easily shatter even a diamond in the rough.
110.name: rhydon

111.text: People try to catch it for its extremely nutritious eggs, but it rarely can be found.
111.name: chansey

112.text: During battle, it constantly moves the vines that cover its body in order to annoy its opponent.
112.name: tangela

113.text: To avoid crushing the baby it carries in its pouch, it always sleeps standing up.
113.name: kangaskhan

114.text: When they're in a safe location, they can be seen playfully tangling their tails together.
114.name: horsea

115.text: During spawning season, they swim gracefully in the water, searching for their perfect mate.
115.name: goldeen

116.text: When autumn comes, the males patrol the area around their nests in order to protect their offspring.
116.name: seaking

117.text: When the stars twinkle at night, it floats up from the sea floor, and its body's center core flickers.
117.name: staryu

118.text: It is said that it uses the seven- colored core of its body to send electric waves into outer space.
118.name: starmie

119.text: It uses the mysterious power it has in its fingers to solidify air into an invisible wall.
119.name: mrmime

120.text: It's very proud of its speed. It moves so fast that its opponent does not even know what knocked it down.
120.name: scyther

121.text: It has several different cry patterns, each of which seems to have its own meaning.
121.name: jynx

122.text: When two ELECTABUZZ touch, they control the electric currents to communicate their feelings.
122.name: electabuzz

123.text: It moves more frequently in hot areas. It can heal itself by dipping its wound into lava.
123.name: magmar

124.text: When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.
124.name: pinsir

125.text: These violent Pokemon fight with other members of their herd in order to prove their strength.
125.name: tauros

126.text: This gentle Pokemon loves to give people rides and provides a very comfortable way to get around.
126.name: lapras

127.text: As it uses the fins on the tip of its tail to swim, it blends with the water perfectly.
127.name: vaporeon

128.text: The negatively charged ions generated in its fur create a constant sparking noise.
128.name: jolteon

129.text: An artificial Pokemon created due to extensive research, it can perform only what is in its program.
129.name: porygon

130.text: In prehistoric times, it swam on the sea floor, eating plankton. Its fossils are sometimes found.
130.name: omanyte

131.text: Its heavy shell allowed it to reach only nearby food. This could be the reason it is extinct.
131.name: omastar

132.text: Three hundred million years ago, it hid on the sea floor. It also has eyes on its back that glow.
132.name: kabuto

133.text: It was able to swim quickly through the water by compactly folding up its razor-sharp sickles.
133.name: kabutops

134.text: In prehistoric times, this Pokemon flew freely and fearlessly through the skies.
134.name: aerodactyl

135.text: Legendary bird Pokemon. As it flies through the sky, it cools the air, causing snow to fall.
135.name: articuno

136.text: Legendary bird Pokemon. They say lightning caused by the flapping of its wings causes summer storms.
136.name: zapdos

137.text: Legendary bird Pokemon. It is said to migrate from the south along with the spring.
137.name: moltres

138.text: Said to rest quietly in an undiscovered cave, this Pokemon was created solely for battling.
138.name: mewtwo

139.text: Because it can learn any move, some people began research to see if it is the ancestor of all Pokemon.
139.name: mew

140.text: When heat from its body causes the air around it to shimmer, this is a sign that it is ready to battle.
140.name: typhlosion

141.text: It lives in narrow burrows that fit its slim body. The deeper the nests go, the more mazelike they become.
141.name: furret

142.text: In the daytime when it gets warm, it curls up inside a big leaf and drifts off into a deep slumber.
142.name: ledian

143.text: If prey becomes ensnared in its nest of spun string, it waits motionlessly until it becomes dark.
143.name: spinarak

144.text: Rather than making a nest in one specific spot, it wanders in search of food after darkness falls.
144.name: ariados

145.text: As a result of its pursuit of faster, yet more silent flight, a new set of wings grew on its hind legs.
145.name: crobat

146.text: This Pokemon uses the bright part of its body, which changed from a dorsal fin, to lure prey.
146.name: lanturn

147.text: If the impact site of a meteorite is found, this Pokemon is certain to be within the immediate area.
147.name: cleffa

148.text: Although it does not flap its wings very much, it can stay up in the air as it tags along after its trainer.
148.name: togetic

149.text: When these dance together, their petals rub against each other, making pretty, relaxing sounds.
149.name: bellossom

150.text: When it expands its throat to croak out a tune, nearby POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL gather immediately.
150.name: politoed

151.text: It can be carried away on even the gentlest breeze. It may even float all the way to the next town.
151.name: hoppip

152.text: As soon as it rains, it closes its flower and hides in the shade of a tree to avoid getting wet.
152.name: skiploom

153.text: It uses its tail to hang on to tree branches. It uses its momentum to swing from one branch to another.
153.name: aipom

154.text: A mucous membrane covers its body. Touching it barehanded will cause a shooting pain.
154.name: wooper

155.text: Every time it yawns, SHELLDER injects more poison into it. The poison makes it more intelligent.
155.name: slowking

156.text: It loves to watch people it's scared. It frightens them by screaming loudly or appearing suddenly.
156.name: misdreavus

157.text: Because different types of UNOWN exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
157.name: unown

158.text: In order to conceal its black tail, it lives in a dark cave and only moves about at night.
158.name: wobbuffet

159.text: When it is in danger, its tail uses some sort of mysterious powers to drive away the enemy.
159.name: girafarig

160.text: It hides deep inside caves where no light ever reaches it and remains virtually motionless there.
160.name: dunsparce

161.text: The many small metal particles that cover this Pokemon's body reflect bright light well.
161.name: steelix

162.text: The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with BERRIES to make a drink.
162.name: shuckle

163.text: It always licks honey. Its palm tastes sweet because of all the honey it has absorbed.
163.name: teddiursa

164.text: These group together in areas that are hotter than normal. If it cools off, its skin hardens.
164.name: slugma

165.text: It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.
165.name: swinub

166.text: The points on its head absorb nutrients from clean water. They cannot survive in polluted water.
166.name: corsola

167.text: To escape from an attacker, it may shoot water out of its mouth, then use that force to swim backward.
167.name: remoraid

168.text: Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.
168.name: octillery

169.text: It swims along freely, eating things that swim into its mouth. Its whole body is very coarse.
169.name: mantine

170.text: The pungent- smelling flame that shoots from its mouth results from toxins burning in its body.
170.name: houndoom

171.text: During the deserted morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.
171.name: phanpy

172.text: Because this Pokemon's skin is so tough, a normal attack won't even leave a scratch on it.
172.name: donphan

173.text: This manmade Pokemon evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprogrammed reactions.
173.name: porygon2

174.text: The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.
174.name: stantler

175.text: The color of the mysterious fluid secreted from its tail is predetermined for each SMEARGLE.
175.name: smeargle

176.text: The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.
176.name: smoochum

177.text: It naturally spits an 1100-degree flame. It is said when many appear, it heralds a volcanic eruption.
177.name: magby

178.text: In order to milk a MILTANK, one must have a knack for rhythmically pulling up and down on its udders.
178.name: miltank

179.text: Biting into one of the delicious eggs that BLISSEY provides will make everyone around smile with joy.
179.name: blissey

180.text: This brawny Pokemon courses around the earth, spouting flames hotter than a volcano's magma.
180.name: entei

181.text: This divine Pokemon blows around the world, always in search of a pure reservoir.
181.name: suicune

182.text: It has an incredible ability to calm raging storms. It is said that LUGIA appears when storms start.
182.name: lugia

183.text: Revered as a guardian of the forest, CELEBI appears wherever beautiful forests exist.
183.name: celebi

184.text: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it's evidence that this Pokemon mistook the intensity of its charge.
184.name: pikachu

185.text: If the electrical sacks become excessively charged, RAICHU plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this Pokemon's nest.
185.name: raichu

186.text: SANDSHREW's body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This Pokemon curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
186.name: sandshrew

187.text: SANDSLASH's body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
187.name: sandslash

188.text: At the time of its birth, VULPIX has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this Pokemon receives plenty of love from its TRAINER. The six tails become magnificently curled.
188.name: vulpix

189.text: NINETALES casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe's mind. This Pokemon is said to live for a thousand years.
189.name: ninetales

190.text: JIGGLYPUFF's vocal chords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This Pokemon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
190.name: jigglypuff

191.text: WIGGLYTUFF has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pokemon's eyes, it is quickly washed away.
191.name: wigglytuff

192.text: ZUBAT remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
192.name: zubat

193.text: GOLBAT loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokemon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
193.name: golbat

194.text: During the daytime, ODDISH buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from  the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
194.name: oddish

195.text: GLOOM releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this Pokemon is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.
195.name: gloom

196.text: VILEPLUME's toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That's why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
196.name: vileplume

197.text: PSYDUCK uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this Pokemon  generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
197.name: psyduck

198.text: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of GOLDUCK give it frightening speed. This Pokemon is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.
198.name: golduck

199.text: ABRA sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this Pokemon immediately teleports to safety.
199.name: abra

200.text: KADABRA emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a TRAINER of this Pokemon.
200.name: kadabra

201.text: ALAKAZAM's brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This Pokemon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
201.name: alakazam

202.text: MACHOP's muscles are special - they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This Pokemon has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
202.name: machop

203.text: MACHOKE's thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This Pokemon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
203.name: machoke

204.text: MACHAMP has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This Pokemon tends to leap into action before it thinks.
204.name: machamp

205.text: TENTACOOL's body is largely composed of water. If it is removed from the sea, it dries up like parchment. If this Pokemon happens to become dehydrated, put it back into the sea.
205.name: tentacool

206.text: TENTACRUEL has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This Pokemon's outburst creates rough waves around it.
206.name: tentacruel

207.text: The longer a GEODUDE lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this Pokemon's heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.
207.name: geodude

208.text: GRAVELER grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This Pokemon eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.
208.name: graveler

209.text: GOLEM live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these Pokemon will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.
209.name: golem

210.text: MAGNEMITE attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this Pokemon clinging to the breaker box.
210.name: magnemite

211.text: MAGNETON emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this Pokemon.
211.name: magneton

212.text: DODUO's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.
212.name: doduo

213.text: Watch out if DODRIO's three heads are looking in three separate directions. It's a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don't go near this Pokemon if it's being wary - it may decide to peck you.
213.name: dodrio

214.text: GRIMER's sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This Pokemon enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
214.name: grimer

215.text: From MUK's body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this Pokemon's body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
215.name: muk

216.text: VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures Poke Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this Pokemon looks very similar to a Poke Ball remains a mystery.
216.name: voltorb

217.text: ELECTRODE eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokemon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
217.name: electrode

218.text: If KOFFING becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This Pokemon may also overinflate its round body, then explode.
218.name: koffing

219.text: WEEZING loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This Pokemon will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
219.name: weezing

220.text: RHYHORN runs in a straight line, smashing everything in its path. It is not bothered even if it rushes headlong into a block of steel. This Pokemon may feel some pain from the collision the next day, however.
220.name: rhyhorn

221.text: RHYDON's horn can crush even uncut diamonds. One sweeping blow of its tail can topple a building. This Pokemon's hide is extremely tough. Even direct cannon hits don't leave a scratch.
221.name: rhydon

222.text: HORSEA eats small insects and moss off of rocks. If the ocean current turns fast, this Pokemon anchors itself by wrapping its tail around rocks or coral to prevent being washed away.
222.name: horsea

223.text: SEADRA sleeps after wriggling itself between the branches of coral. Those trying to harvest coral are occasionally stung by this Pokemon's poison barbs if they fail to notice it.
223.name: seadra

224.text: GOLDEEN is a very beautiful Pokemon with fins that billow elegantly in water. However, don't let your guard down around this Pokemon - it could ram you powerfully with its horn.
224.name: goldeen

225.text: In the autumn, SEAKING males can be seen performing courtship dances in riverbeds to woo females. During this season, this Pokemon's body coloration is at its most beautiful.
225.name: seaking

226.text: STARYU's center section has an organ called the core that shines bright red. If you go to a beach toward the end of summer, the glowing cores of these Pokemon look like the stars in the sky.
226.name: staryu

227.text: STARMIE's center section - the core - glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this Pokemon has been given the nickname 'the gem of the sea.'
227.name: starmie

228.text: PINSIR is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This Pokemon's movements turn sluggish in cold places.
228.name: pinsir

229.text: MAGIKARP is a pathetic excuse for a Pokemon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.
229.name: magikarp

230.text: When MAGIKARP evolves into GYARADOS, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this Pokemon's wildly violent nature.
230.name: gyarados

231.text: If this Pokemon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that CROBAT has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
231.name: crobat

232.text: CHINCHOU lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This Pokemon flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.
232.name: chinchou

233.text: LANTURN is nicknamed 'the deep-sea star' for its illuminated antenna. This Pokemon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
233.name: lanturn

234.text: PICHU charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this Pokemon.
234.name: pichu

235.text: IGGLYBUFF's vocal chords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This Pokemon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
235.name: igglybuff

236.text: NATU cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this Pokemon's eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
236.name: natu

237.text: XATU stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this Pokemon does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
237.name: xatu

238.text: When BELLOSSOM gets exposed to plenty of sunlight, the leaves ringing its body begin to spin around. This Pokemon's dancing is renowned in the southern lands.
238.name: bellossom

239.text: MARILL's oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you see just its tail bobbing on the water's surface, it's a sure indication that this Pokemon is diving beneath the water to feed on aquatic plants.
239.name: marill

240.text: AZUMARILL's long ears are indispensable sensors. By focusing its hearing, this Pokemon can identify what kinds of prey are around, even in rough and fast-running rivers.
240.name: azumarill

241.text: If two or more WOBBUFFET meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other's endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. TRAINERS need to beware of this habit.
241.name: wobbuffet

242.text: GIRAFARIG's rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this Pokemon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
242.name: girafarig

243.text: HERACROSS charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe's grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This Pokemon even has enough power to topple a massive tree.
243.name: heracross

244.text: Molten magma courses throughout SLUGMA's circulatory system. If this Pokemon is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
244.name: slugma

245.text: MAGCARGO's shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile - just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This Pokemon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
245.name: magcargo

246.text: CORSOLA's branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokemon grows it back in just one night.
246.name: corsola

247.text: SKARMORY is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This Pokemon flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
247.name: skarmory

248.text: KINGDRA lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this Pokemon creates spiraling ocean currents.
248.name: kingdra

249.text: For its nest, PHANPY digs a vertical pit  in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
249.name: phanpy

250.text: DONPHAN's favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokemon can't stop very easily.
250.name: donphan

251.text: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This Pokemon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
251.name: treecko

252.text: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE's body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokemon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
252.name: grovyle

253.text: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE's body are very sharp edged. This Pokemon is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
253.name: sceptile

254.text: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This Pokemon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
254.name: torchic

255.text: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokemon's legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
255.name: combusken

256.text: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokemon's wrists burn.
256.name: blaziken

257.text: The fin on MUDKIP's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokemon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
257.name: mudkip

258.text: The surface of MARSHTOMP's body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokemon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
258.name: marshtomp

259.text: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokemon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
259.name: swampert

260.text: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokemon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
260.name: poochyena

261.text: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokemon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
261.name: mightyena

262.text: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This Pokemon does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
262.name: zigzagoon

263.text: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This Pokemon is very challenged by gently curving roads.
263.name: linoone

264.text: Using the spikes on its rear end,   WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokemon's feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
264.name: wurmple

265.text: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There,  this Pokemon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
265.name: silcoon

266.text: BEAUTIFLY's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokemon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.
266.name: beautifly

267.text: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokemon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
267.name: cascoon

268.text: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokemon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
268.name: dustox

269.text: LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this Pokemon travels on land in search of clean water.
269.name: lotad

270.text: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this Pokemon spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
270.name: lombre

271.text: LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This Pokemon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
271.name: ludicolo

272.text: SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this Pokemon's body becomes.
272.name: seedot

273.text: NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This Pokemon dislikes having its long nose pinched.
273.name: nuzleaf

274.text: SHIFTRY is a mysterious Pokemon that is said to live atop towering trees  dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
274.name: shiftry

275.text: TAILLOW courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy Pokemon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
275.name: taillow

276.text: SWELLOW flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokemon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW's clawed feet, preventing escape.
276.name: swellow

277.text: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This Pokemon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
277.name: wingull

278.text: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small Pokemon and eggs inside its massive bill. This Pokemon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
278.name: pelipper

279.text: RALTS senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This Pokemon rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
279.name: ralts

280.text: It is said that a KIRLIA that is exposed to the positive emotions of its TRAINER grows beautiful. This Pokemon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
280.name: kirlia

281.text: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this Pokemon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
281.name: gardevoir

282.text: From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This Pokemon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
282.name: surskit

283.text: MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This Pokemon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
283.name: masquerain

284.text: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This Pokemon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
284.name: shroomish

285.text: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokemon's fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
285.name: breloom

286.text: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This Pokemon's sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
286.name: slakoth

287.text: VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can't tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokemon's stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.
287.name: vigoroth

288.text: SLAKING spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokemon reluctantly moves to another spot.
288.name: slaking

289.text: NINCADA lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This Pokemon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
289.name: nincada

290.text: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this Pokemon was long believed to be invisible.
290.name: ninjask

291.text: SHEDINJA's hard body doesn't move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this Pokemon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
291.name: shedinja

292.text: Normally, WHISMUR's voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokemon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
292.name: whismur

293.text: LOUDRED's bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This Pokemon's round ears serve as loudspeakers.
293.name: loudred

294.text: EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pokemon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
294.name: exploud

295.text: MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this Pokemon stores more energy in its body for evolving.
295.name: makuhita

296.text: HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokemon's powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
296.name: hariyama

297.text: AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these Pokemon managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
297.name: azurill

298.text: NOSEPASS's magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these Pokemon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
298.name: nosepass

299.text: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This Pokemon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
299.name: skitty

300.text: DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokemon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
300.name: delcatty

301.text: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pokemon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
301.name: sableye

302.text: MAWHILE's huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.
302.name: mawile

303.text: This Pokemon has a body of steel. To make its body, ARON feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
303.name: aron

304.text: LAIRON tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokemon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
304.name: lairon

305.text: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokemon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
305.name: aggron

306.text: MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this Pokemon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
306.name: meditite

307.text: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokemon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
307.name: medicham

308.text: ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its long body hair. This Pokemon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
308.name: electrike

309.text: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokemon creates thunderclouds.
309.name: manectric

310.text: PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokemon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
310.name: plusle

311.text: MINUN is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
311.name: minun

312.text: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This Pokemon is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.
312.name: volbeat

313.text: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT using a sweet fragrance. Once the VOLBEAT have gathered, this Pokemon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
313.name: illumise

314.text: ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this Pokemon brings serenity to living things.
314.name: roselia

315.text: Virtually all of GULPIN's body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This Pokemon's stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
315.name: gulpin

316.text: When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokemon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
316.name: swalot

317.text: CARVANHA's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokemon.
317.name: carvanha

318.text: Nicknamed 'the bully of the sea', SHARPEDO is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokemon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
318.name: sharpedo

319.text: WAILMER's nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful Pokemon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
319.name: wailmer

320.text: WAILORD is the largest of all identified Pokemon up to now. This giant Pokemon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
320.name: wailord

321.text: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn't notice being hit. However, it can't stand hunger for even a second. This Pokemon's body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
321.name: numel

322.text: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokemon's back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
322.name: camerupt

323.text: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this Pokemon spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
323.name: torkoal

324.text: SPOINK bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokemon cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
324.name: spoink

325.text: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokemon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
325.name: grumpig

326.text: All the SPINDA that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokemon give it the appearance of dancing.
326.name: spinda

327.text: TRAPINCH's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokemon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
327.name: trapinch

328.text: To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokemon's ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
328.name: vibrava

329.text: FLYGON is nicknamed 'the elemental  spirit of the desert'. Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this Pokemon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
329.name: flygon

330.text: CACNEA lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokemon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
330.name: cacnea

331.text: During the daytime, CACTURNE remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokemon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
331.name: cacturne

332.text: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This Pokemon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
332.name: swablu

333.text: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokemon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
333.name: altaria

334.text: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE's body. This Pokemon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
334.name: zangoose

335.text: SEVIPER shares a generations-long feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This Pokemon attacks using its sword- edged tail.
335.name: seviper

336.text: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this Pokemon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
336.name: lunatone

337.text: SOLROCK is a new species of Pokemon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this Pokemon releases intensely bright light.
337.name: solrock

338.text: BARBOACH's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokemon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
338.name: barboach

339.text: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokemon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
339.name: whiscash

340.text: CORPHISH were originally foreign Pokemon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokemon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
340.name: corphish

341.text: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokemon, making them desolate places.
341.name: crawdaunt

342.text: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokemon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
342.name: baltoy

343.text: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokemon moves about while levitating.
343.name: claydol

344.text: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokemon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles  shaped like flower petals.
344.name: lileep

345.text: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokemon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
345.name: cradily

346.text: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokemon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
346.name: anorith

347.text: ARMALDO's tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokemon's two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
347.name: armaldo

348.text: FEEBAS's fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokemon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
348.name: feebas

349.text: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokemon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
349.name: milotic

350.text: CASTFORM's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokemon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
350.name: castform

351.text: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this Pokemon can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
351.name: kecleon

352.text: SHUPPET is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this Pokemon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person's home.
352.name: shuppet

353.text: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokemon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
353.name: banette

354.text: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokemon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
354.name: duskull

355.text: DUSCLOPS's body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokemon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
355.name: dusclops

356.text: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS's neck are very popular with children. This Pokemon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
356.name: tropius

357.text: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokemon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
357.name: chimecho

358.text: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokemon.
358.name: absol

359.text: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokemon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
359.name: wynaut

360.text: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this Pokemon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
360.name: snorunt

361.text: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokemon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
361.name: glalie

362.text: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than  walking to get around. When groups of this Pokemon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
362.name: spheal

363.text: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokemon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
363.name: sealeo

364.text: WALREIN's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This Pokemon's thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
364.name: walrein

365.text: CLAMPERL's sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL's shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
365.name: clamperl

366.text: HUNTAIL's presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokemon's eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
366.name: huntail

367.text: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokemon's body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
367.name: gorebyss

368.text: RELICANTH is a Pokemon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokemon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
368.name: relicanth

369.text: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped Pokemon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean's waves.
369.name: luvdisc

370.text: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokemon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has  grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
370.name: bagon

371.text: Inside SHELGON's armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This Pokemon's shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
371.name: shelgon

372.text: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokemon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
372.name: salamence

373.text: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM's body. This Pokemon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
373.name: beldum

374.text: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokemon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
374.name: metagross

375.text: REGIROCK was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokemon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
375.name: regirock

376.text: REGICE's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokemon controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.
376.name: regice

377.text: REGISTEEL has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokemon eats.
377.name: registeel

378.text: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokemon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
378.name: latias

379.text: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokemon is intelligent and understands human speech.
379.name: latios

380.text: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This Pokemon saved people who were suffering from droughts.
380.name: kyogre

381.text: GROUDON has long been described in  mythology as the Pokemon that raised lands and expanded continents. This Pokemon took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.
381.name: groudon

382.text: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth's ozone layer,  never descending to the ground. This Pokemon appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
382.name: rayquaza

383.text: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokemon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
383.name: jirachi

384.text: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this Pokemon's chest appears to be its brain.
384.name: deoxys

385.text: There is a bud on this Pokemon's back. To support its weight, IVYSAUR's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
385.name: ivysaur

386.text: There is a large flower on VENUSAUR's back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
386.name: venusaur

387.text: CHARMELEON mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
387.name: charmeleon

388.text: CHARIZARD flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
388.name: charizard

389.text: SQUIRTLE's shell is not merely used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokemon to swim at high speeds.
389.name: squirtle

390.text: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as WARTORTLE ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokemon's toughness as a battler.
390.name: wartortle

391.text: BLASTOISE has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
391.name: blastoise

392.text: CATERPIE has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokemon releases a terrifically strong odor.
392.name: caterpie

393.text: The shell covering this Pokemon's body is as hard as an iron slab. METAPOD does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
393.name: metapod

394.text: BUTTERFREE has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
394.name: butterfree

395.text: KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
395.name: kakuna

396.text: PIDGEY has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
396.name: pidgey

397.text: PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokemon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
397.name: pidgeotto

398.text: SPEAROW has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
398.name: spearow

399.text: FEAROW is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
399.name: fearow

400.text: This Pokemon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once ARBOK wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
400.name: arbok

401.text: This Pokemon has electricity-storing pouches on its cheeks. These appear to become electrically charged during the night while PIKACHU sleeps. It occasionally discharges electricity when it is dozy after waking up.
401.name: pikachu

402.text: This Pokemon exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. RAICHU searches for electricity by planting its tail in the ground.
402.name: raichu

403.text: SANDSHREW has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The Pokemon can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.
403.name: sandshrew

404.text: SANDSLASH can roll up its body as if it were a ball covered with large spikes. In battle, this Pokemon will try to make the foe flinch by jabbing it with its spines. It then leaps at the stunned foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.
404.name: sandslash

405.text: NIDORAN has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokemon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
405.name: nidoranf

406.text: When NIDORINA are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokemon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
406.name: nidorina

407.text: NIDOQUEEN's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokemon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
407.name: nidoqueen

408.text: NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
408.name: nidorino

409.text: On every night of a full moon, groups of this Pokemon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired CLEFAIRY return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
409.name: clefairy

410.text: Inside VULPIX's body burns a flame that never goes out. During the daytime, when the temperatures rise, this Pokemon releases flames from its mouth to prevent its body from growing too hot.
410.name: vulpix

411.text: Legend has it that NINETALES came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This Pokemon is highly intelligent - it can understand human speech.
411.name: ninetales

412.text: When this Pokemon sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, JIGGLYPUFF cannot breathe, endangering its life.
412.name: jigglypuff

413.text: WIGGLYTUFF's body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this Pokemon can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, WIGGLYTUFF bounces along lightly like a balloon.
413.name: wigglytuff

414.text: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
414.name: zubat

415.text: GOLBAT bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim's blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and Pokemon.
415.name: golbat

416.text: ODDISH searches for fertile, nutrient- rich soil, then plants itself. During the daytime, while it is planted, this Pokemon's feet are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots of trees.
416.name: oddish

417.text: From its mouth GLOOM drips honey that smells absolutely horrible. Apparently, it loves the horrid stench. It sniffs the noxious fumes and then  drools even more of its honey.
417.name: gloom

418.text: VILEPLUME has the world's largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this Pokemon catches and devours them.
418.name: vileplume

419.text: PARAS has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this BUG Pokemon host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
419.name: paras

420.text: VENONAT is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
420.name: venonat

421.text: DUGTRIO are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
421.name: dugtrio

422.text: PERSIAN has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers   sense air movements to determine what is in the Pokemon's surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
422.name: persian

423.text: If it uses its mysterious power, PSYDUCK can't remember having done so. It apparently can't form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.
423.name: psyduck

424.text: GOLDUCK is the fastest swimmer among all Pokemon. It swims effortlessly, even in a rough, stormy sea. It sometimes rescues people from wrecked ships floundering in high seas.
424.name: golduck

425.text: When MANKEY starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
425.name: mankey

426.text: When PRIMEAPE becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.
426.name: primeape

427.text: GROWLITHE has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pokemon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
427.name: growlithe

428.text: ARCANINE is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this Pokemon's body is its source of power.
428.name: arcanine

429.text: POLIWAG has a very thin skin. It is possible to see the Pokemon's spiral innards right through the skin. Despite its thinness, however, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
429.name: poliwag

430.text: The surface of POLIWHIRL's body is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
430.name: poliwhirl

431.text: POLIWRATH's highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this Pokemon can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.
431.name: poliwrath

432.text: ABRA needs to sleep for eighteen hours a day. If it doesn't, this Pokemon loses its ability to use telekinetic powers. If it is attacked, ABRA escapes using TELEPORT while it is still sleeping.
432.name: abra

433.text: KADABRA holds a silver spoon in its hand. The spoon is used to amplify the alpha waves in its brain. Without the spoon, the Pokemon is said to be limited to half the usual amount of its telekinetic powers.
433.name: kadabra

434.text: ALAKAZAM's brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this Pokemon an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It has a thorough memory of everything that has occurred in the world.
434.name: alakazam

435.text: MACHOP exercises by hefting around a GRAVELER as if it were a barbell. There are some MACHOP that travel the world in a quest to master all kinds of martial arts.
435.name: machop

436.text: MACHOKE undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this Pokemon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.
436.name: machoke

437.text: MACHAMP is known as the Pokemon that has mastered every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown far over the horizon.
437.name: machamp

438.text: BELLSPROUT's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokemon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
438.name: bellsprout

439.text: WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the Pokemon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
439.name: weepinbell

440.text: VICTREEBEL has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this Pokemon swallows it whole.
440.name: victreebel

441.text: TENTACOOL absorbs sunlight and refracts it using water inside its body to convert it into beam energy. This Pokemon shoots beams from its crystal-like eyes.
441.name: tentacool

442.text: TENTACRUEL has tentacles that can be freely elongated and shortened at will. It ensnares prey with its tentacles and weakens the prey by dosing it with a harsh toxin. It can catch up to 80 prey at the same time.
442.name: tentacruel

443.text: When GEODUDE sleeps deeply, it buries itself halfway into the ground. It will not awaken even if hikers step on it unwittingly. In the morning, this Pokemon rolls downhill in search of food.
443.name: geodude

444.text: Rocks are GRAVELER's favorite food. This Pokemon will climb a mountain from the base to the summit, crunchingly feasting on rocks all the while. Upon reaching the peak, it rolls back down to the bottom.
444.name: graveler

445.text: GOLEM is known for rolling down from mountains. To prevent them from rolling into the homes of people downhill, grooves have been dug into the sides of mountains to serve as guideways for diverting this Pokemon's course.
445.name: golem

446.text: RAPIDASH usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pokemon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
446.name: rapidash

447.text: SLOWPOKE uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this Pokemon often forgets what it's doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.
447.name: slowpoke

448.text: SLOWBRO's tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
448.name: slowbro

449.text: MAGNEMITE floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This Pokemon becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.
449.name: magnemite

450.text: MAGNETON emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to electronics and precision instruments. Because of this, it is said that some towns warn people to keep this Pokemon inside a Poke Ball.
450.name: magneton

451.text: FARFETCH'D is always seen with a stick from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This Pokemon has been known to fight with others over sticks.
451.name: farfetchd

452.text: DODUO's two heads contain completely identical brains. A scientific study reported that on rare occasions, there will be examples of this Pokemon possessing different sets of brains.
452.name: doduo

453.text: Apparently, the heads aren't the only parts of the body that DODRIO has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.
453.name: dodrio

454.text: DEWGONG loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokemon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
454.name: dewgong
