855.text: LEDYBA communicate using a fluid that they secrete from where the legs join the body. They are said to convey feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.
855.name: ledyba

856.text: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live many LEDIAN. For good reason, they use the light of the stars as energy.
856.name: ledian

857.text: The web it spins can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that a SPINARAK determines its prey by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web.
857.name: spinarak

858.text: Its feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. It constricts its foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
858.name: ariados

859.text: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.
859.name: crobat

860.text: When it senses danger, it discharges positive and negative electricity from its two antennae. It lives in depths beyond sunlight's reach.
860.name: chinchou

861.text: The light-emitting orbs on its back are very bright. They are formed from a part of its dorsal fin. This Pokemon illuminates the inky darkness of deep seas.
861.name: lanturn

862.text: It is still inept at retaining electricity. When it is startled, it discharges power accidentally. It gets better at holding power as it grows older.
862.name: pichu

863.text: On nights with many shooting stars, CLEFFA can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance until daybreak, when they quench their thirst with the morning dew.
863.name: cleffa

864.text: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body steadily turns a deepening pink color.
864.name: igglybuff

865.text: As its energy, it uses the feelings of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokemon. It stores up happy feelings in its shell, then shares them out.
865.name: togepi

866.text: It is said to be a Pokemon that brings good fortune. When it spots someone who is pure of heart, a TOGETIC appears and shares its happiness with that person.
866.name: togetic

867.text: It runs up short trees that grow on the savanna to peck at new shoots. A NATU's eyes look as if they are always observing something.
867.name: natu

868.text: It has the enigmatic power of foreseeing the future. Some people in different lands have long believed that XATU are emissaries from another world.
868.name: xatu

869.text: Its fluffy wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more energy is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
869.name: mareep

870.text: Its fleece quality changes to generate strong static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare, slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.
870.name: flaaffy

871.text: It gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used its light to send signals back and forth with others far away.
871.name: ampharos

872.text: Its flower petals deepen in color through exposure to sunlight. When cloudy weather persists, it does a dance that is thought to be a ritual for summoning the sun.
872.name: bellossom

873.text: Its body is covered with water-repellent fur. Because of the fur, it can swim through water at high speed without being slowed by the water's resistance.
873.name: marill

874.text: It lives in water virtually all day long. Its body color and pattern act as camouflage that makes it tough for enemies to spot in water.
874.name: azumarill

875.text: It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. But since its forelegs remain green throughout the year, it is easily identified as a fake in the winter.
875.name: sudowoodo

876.text: The curled hair on its head proves its status as a king. It is said that the longer and curlier the hair, the more respect it earns from its peers.
876.name: politoed

877.text: This Pokemon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, a HOPPIP links leaves with others to prepare against being blown away.
877.name: hoppip

878.text: It blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. Because its flower's blooming changes with the temperature, it is sometimes used as a thermometer.
878.name: skiploom

879.text: JUMPLUFF ride warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. This Pokemon lands when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
879.name: jumpluff

880.text: Its tail ends with a dexterous, handlike appendage. However, because it uses the tail so much, AIPOM's real hands have become rather clumsy.
880.name: aipom

881.text: SUNKERN try to minimize movement to conserve the nutrients they have stored in their bodies for evolution. They will not eat, subsisting only on morning dew.
881.name: sunkern

882.text: SUNFLORA convert solar energy into nutrition. They are highly active in the warm daytime but suddenly stop moving as soon as the sun sets.
882.name: sunflora

883.text: It can see 360 degrees without moving its eyes. It is a great flier capable of making sudden stops and turning midair to quickly chase down targeted prey.
883.name: yanma

884.text: WOOPER usually live in water but come out onto land seeking food occasionally. On land, they coat their bodies with a gooey, toxic film.
884.name: wooper

885.text: A QUAGSIRE hunts by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in. Because it doesn't move, it does not get very hungry.
885.name: quagsire

886.text: An ESPEON is extremely loyal to any TRAINER it considers to be worthy. It is said to have developed precognitive powers to protect its TRAINER from harm.
886.name: espeon

887.text: UMBREON evolved from exposure to the moon's energy pulses. It lurks in darkness and waits for its foes to move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.
887.name: umbreon

888.text: MURKROW were feared as the alleged bearers of ill fortune. It shows strong interest in anything that sparkles. It will even try to steal rings from women.
888.name: murkrow

889.text: It undertakes research every day to solve the mysteries of the world. However, it apparently forgets everything if the SHELLDER on its head comes off.
889.name: slowking

890.text: A MISDREAVUS frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. It apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fear of foes as its nutrition.
890.name: misdreavus

891.text: This Pokemon is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN.
891.name: unown

892.text: Usually docile, a WOBBUFFET strikes back ferociously if its black tail is attacked. It makes its lair in caves where it waits for nightfall.
892.name: wobbuffet

893.text: A GIRAFARIG is an herbivore--it eats grass and tree shoots. While it is eating, its tail makes chewing and swallowing motions as if it were also eating.
893.name: girafarig

894.text: A PINECO hangs from a tree branch and waits for prey. While eating, if it is disturbed by someone shaking its tree, it falls on the ground and suddenly explodes.
894.name: pineco

895.text: It keeps itself inside its steel shell. The shell is opened when it is catching prey, but it is so quick that the shell's inside cannot be seen.
895.name: forretress

896.text: Its drill-tipped tail is used to burrow into the ground backwards. This Pokemon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
896.name: dunsparce

897.text: It glides without making a single sound. It grasps the face of its foe using its hind and large front claws, then stabs with its poison barb.
897.name: gligar

898.text: STEELIX live even further underground than ONIX. This Pokemon is known to dig toward the earth's core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
898.name: steelix

899.text: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, it sends smaller Pokemon scurrying in terror. The SNUBBULL does seem a little sad at making its foes flee.
899.name: snubbull

900.text: It has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The huge fangs are heavy, causing it to tilt its head. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite.
900.name: granbull

901.text: A QWILFISH uses the pressure of water it swallows to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming to be somewhat challenging.
901.name: qwilfish

902.text: A SCIZOR has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. It flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.
902.name: scizor

903.text: A SHUCKLE hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.
903.name: shuckle

904.text: They gather in forests seeking the sweet sap of trees. It is completely clad in a steel-hard shell. It is proud of its horn, which it uses to fling foes.
904.name: heracross

905.text: A SNEASEL scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. It seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
905.name: sneasel

906.text: It licks its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. A TEDDIURSA makes its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by BEEDRILL.
906.name: teddiursa

907.text: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an URSARING gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.
907.name: ursaring

908.text: It is a species of Pokemon that lives in volcanic areas. If its body cools, its skin hardens and immobilizes it. To avoid that, it sleeps near magma.
908.name: slugma

909.text: The shell on its back is made of hardened magma. Tens of thousands of years spent living in volcanic craters have turned MAGCARGO's bodies into magma.
909.name: magcargo

910.text: It roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under dried grass. It occasionally roots out hot springs.
910.name: swinub

911.text: A PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair for enduring freezing cold. It uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
911.name: piloswine

912.text: CORSOLA live in warm southern seas. If the sea becomes polluted, the beautiful coral stalks become discolored and crumble away in tatters.
912.name: corsola

913.text: A REMORAID uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.
913.name: remoraid

914.text: It ensnares its foe with its suction- cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.
914.name: octillery

915.text: It carries food bundled up in its tail. There was a famous explorer who managed to scale Mt. Everest thanks to a DELIBIRD sharing its food.
915.name: delibird

916.text: On sunny days, schools of MANTINE can be seen elegantly leaping over the waves. It is not bothered by the REMORAID that hitches rides.
916.name: mantine

917.text: A Pokemon that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from SKARMORY to make swords and knives.
917.name: skarmory

918.text: HOUNDOUR communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokemon's remarkable teamwork is simply unparalleled.
918.name: houndour

919.text: In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its horns raked sharply back serves a leadership role. They choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
919.name: houndoom

920.text: It sleeps quietly, deep on the seafloor. When it comes up to the surface, it creates a huge whirlpool that can swallow even ships.
920.name: kingdra

921.text: PHANPY's big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.
921.name: phanpy

922.text: A DONPHAN is so strong it can easily haul a dump truck. Its hide has toughened to a rock-hard state. An ordinary sort of attack won't even leave a scratch.
922.name: donphan

923.text: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
923.name: porygon2

924.text: STANTLER's magnificent antlers were once traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this Pokemon was hunted close to extinction.
924.name: stantler

925.text: A SMEARGLE marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this Pokemon have been found.
925.name: smeargle

926.text: TYROGUE become stressed out if they do not get to train every day. When raising this Pokemon, the TRAINER must establish a regular training schedule.
926.name: tyrogue

927.text: Its technique of kicking while spinning is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense. HITMONTOP travel faster spinning than they do walking.
927.name: hitmontop

928.text: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake's surface to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
928.name: smoochum

929.text: If it touches metal and discharges the electricity it has stored in its body, an ELEKID begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
929.name: elekid

930.text: If a MAGBY is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
930.name: magby

931.text: It gives over five gallons of milk daily. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.
931.name: miltank

932.text: If it senses sadness with its fluffy fur, a BLISSEY will rush over to the sad person, however far away, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.
932.name: blissey

933.text: RAIKOU embodies the speed of lightning. Its roars send shock waves shuddering through the air and ground as if lightning bolts were crashing down.
933.name: raikou

934.text: ENTEI embodies the passion of magma. It is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It blasts fire that consumes all that it touches.
934.name: entei

935.text: SUICUNE embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gliding elegance. It has the power to purify dirty water.
935.name: suicune

936.text: A LARVITAR is born deep under the ground. It must eat its way through the soil above and reach the surface for it to see its parentsfaces.
936.name: larvitar

937.text: A PUPITAR creates a gas inside its body that it ejects under compression to propel itself like a jet. Its body can withstand a collision with solid steel.
937.name: pupitar

938.text: A TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
938.name: tyranitar

939.text: LUGIA is so powerful even a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart houses. As a result, it chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
939.name: lugia

940.text: Its feathers--which glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light--are thought to bring joy. It is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
940.name: hooh

941.text: This Pokemon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
941.name: celebi

942.text: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest's trees.
942.name: treecko

943.text: Leaves grow out of this Pokemon's body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.
943.name: grovyle

944.text: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This Pokemon carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.
944.name: sceptile

945.text: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can't see its surroundings.
945.name: torchic

946.text: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.
946.name: combusken

947.text: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.
947.name: blaziken

948.text: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water's edge.
948.name: mudkip

949.text: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.
949.name: marshtomp

950.text: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
950.name: swampert

951.text: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.
951.name: poochyena

952.text: In the wild, MIGHTYENA live in a pack. They never defy their leader's orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
952.name: mightyena

953.text: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.
953.name: zigzagoon

954.text: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond- dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.
954.name: linoone

955.text: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.
955.name: wurmple

956.text: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a WURMPLE. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.
956.name: silcoon

957.text: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.
957.name: beautifly

958.text: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
958.name: cascoon

959.text: It is a nocturnal Pokemon that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.
959.name: dustox

960.text: This Pokemon lives in ponds with clean water. It is known to ferry small Pokemon across ponds by carrying them on the broad leaf on its head.
960.name: lotad

961.text: In the evening, it takes great delight in popping out of rivers and startling people. It feeds on aquatic moss that grows on rocks in the riverbed.
961.name: lombre

962.text: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.
962.name: ludicolo

963.text: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.
963.name: seedot

964.text: A forest-dwelling Pokemon that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.
964.name: nuzleaf

965.text: It is said to arrive on chilly, wintry winds. Feared from long ago as the guardian of forests, this Pokemon lives in a deep forest where people do not venture.
965.name: shiftry

966.text: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger SKARMORY on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.
966.name: taillow

967.text: A SWELLOW dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.
967.name: swellow

968.text: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.
968.name: wingull

969.text: It skims the tops of waves as it flies. When it spots prey, it uses its large beak to scoop up the victim with water. It protects its eggs in its beak.
969.name: pelipper

970.text: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and Pokemon with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.
970.name: ralts

971.text: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.
971.name: kirlia

972.text: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.
972.name: gardevoir

973.text: They gather on puddles after evening downpours, gliding across the surface of water as if sliding. It secretes honey with a sweet aroma from its head.
973.name: surskit

974.text: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can't fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.
974.name: masquerain

975.text: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many SHROOMISH feasting on composted soil.
975.name: shroomish

976.text: It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.
976.name: breloom

977.text: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn't change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.
977.name: slakoth

978.text: It can't keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn't, it can't sleep at night.
978.name: vigoroth

979.text: Hordes of SLAKING gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.
979.name: slaking

980.text: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.
980.name: nincada

981.text: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.
981.name: ninjask

982.text: A peculiar Pokemon that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.
982.name: shedinja

983.text: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.
983.name: whismur

984.text: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with ultrasonic waves at massive volume. It builds power by stomping the ground.
984.name: loudred

985.text: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.
985.name: exploud

986.text: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of MAKUHITA undertaking strenuous training.
986.name: makuhita

987.text: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. It's been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.
987.name: hariyama

988.text: Its tail, which is packed with nutrition, is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.
988.name: azurill

989.text: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.
989.name: nosepass

990.text: A SKITTY's adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp growl.
990.name: skitty

991.text: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.
991.name: delcatty

992.text: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A SABLEYE lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.
992.name: sableye

993.text: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.
993.name: mawile

994.text: A Pokemon that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.
994.name: aron

995.text: When two LAIRON meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.
995.name: lairon

996.text: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the AGGRON's age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.
996.name: aggron

997.text: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result of rigorous and dedicated yoga training, it has tempered its spiritual power so much it can fly.
997.name: meditite

998.text: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to foretell its foe's actions. It battles with elegant, dance- like movement.
998.name: medicham

999.text: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of sparks.
999.name: electrike

1000.text: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, MANECTRIC were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.
1000.name: manectric

1001.text: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow Pokemon. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.
1001.name: plusle

1002.text: At a meeting of Pokemon academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a PLUSLE and MINUN will promote circulation and boost vitality.
1002.name: minun

1003.text: With their taillights lit, VOLBEAT fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.
1003.name: volbeat

1004.text: A nocturnal Pokemon that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a VOLBEAT swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.
1004.name: illumise

1005.text: A ROSELIA that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.
1005.name: roselia

1006.text: This Pokemon's stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.
1006.name: gulpin

1007.text: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a SWALOT can't digest is its own stomach.
1007.name: swalot

1008.text: CARVANHA attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pokemon, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.
1008.name: carvanha

1009.text: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over 75 miles per hour.
1009.name: sharpedo

1010.text: While this Pokemon usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.
1010.name: wailmer

1011.text: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a WAILORD can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.
1011.name: wailord

1012.text: A NUMEL stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy Pokemon that can transport a 220-pound load. It has served humans at work since long ago.
1012.name: numel

1013.text: A Pokemon that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.
1013.name: camerupt

1014.text: It battles using energy it gets from burning coal. When loosing smoke from its nostrils, it lets off a sound that is similar to a locomotive's horn.
1014.name: torkoal

1015.text: A Pokemon that manipulates psychic power at will. It doesn't stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.
1015.name: spoink

1016.text: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
1016.name: grumpig

1017.text: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe's aim.
1017.name: spinda

1018.text: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.
1018.name: trapinch

1019.text: It looses ultrasonic waves by rubbing its wings together. Since a VIBRAVA's wings are still in the process of growing, it can only fly short distances.
1019.name: vibrava

1020.text: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.
1020.name: flygon

1021.text: CACNEA live in deserts with virtually no rainfall. It battles by swinging its thick, spiked arms. Once a year, a yellow flower blooms.
1021.name: cacnea

1022.text: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.
1022.name: cacturne

1023.text: A Pokemon that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, SWABLU flocks move closer to towns in the spring.
1023.name: swablu

1024.text: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.
1024.name: altaria

1025.text: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any SEVIPER.
1025.name: zangoose

1026.text: SEVIPER and ZANGOOSE are eternal rivals. It counters a ZANGOOSE's dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.
1026.name: seviper

1027.text: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This Pokemon was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.
1027.name: lunatone

1028.text: Solar energy is the source of this  Pokemon's power. On sunny days, groups of SOLROCK line up facing the sun and absorb its light.
1028.name: solrock

1029.text: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the BARBOACH's body.
1029.name: barboach

1030.text: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.
1030.name: whiscash

1031.text: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy Pokemon that can thrive in any environment.
1031.name: corphish

1032.text: A brutish Pokemon that loves to battle. A veteran CRAWDAUNT that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.
1032.name: crawdaunt

1033.text: A BALTOY moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals  adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.
1033.name: baltoy

1034.text: A CLAYDOL sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the Pokemon's manipulation of psychic power.
1034.name: claydol

1035.text: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.
1035.name: lileep

1036.text: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. CRADILY can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.
1036.name: cradily

1037.text: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.
1037.name: anorith

1038.text: ARMALDO usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.
1038.name: armaldo

1039.text: FEEBAS live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few TRAINERS raise it.
1039.name: feebas

1040.text: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all Pokemon, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
1040.name: milotic

1041.text: A Pokemon that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A KECLEON reverts to its original colors if it is startled.
1041.name: kecleon

1042.text: This Pokemon roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.
1042.name: shuppet

1043.text: An abandoned plush doll became this Pokemon. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.
1043.name: banette

1044.text: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal Pokemon that roams about under the cloak of darkness.
1044.name: duskull

1045.text: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.
1045.name: dusclops

1046.text: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.
1046.name: tropius

1047.text: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.
1047.name: chimecho

1048.text: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived Pokemon that has a life-span of 100 years.
1048.name: absol

1049.text: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.
1049.name: wynaut

1050.text: They tend to move about in groups of around five SNORUNT. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.
1050.name: snorunt

1051.text: A GLALIE has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.
1051.name: glalie

1052.text: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.
1052.name: spheal

1053.text: SEALEO live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.
1053.name: sealeo

1054.text: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
1054.name: walrein

1055.text: A CLAMPERL slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.
1055.name: clamperl

1056.text: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.
1056.name: huntail

1057.text: A GOREBYSS siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.
1057.name: gorebyss

1058.text: A Pokemon that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.
1058.name: relicanth

1059.text: LUVDISC make the branches of CORSOLA their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a LUVDISC as a gift to express one's feelings of love.
1059.name: luvdisc

1060.text: Although it is small, this Pokemon is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches head-butts with its ironlike skull.
1060.name: bagon

1061.text: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.
1061.name: shelgon

1062.text: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.
1062.name: salamence

1063.text: When BELDUM gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one Pokemon. They communicate with each other using brain waves.
1063.name: beldum

1064.text: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.
1064.name: metang

1065.text: METAGROSS has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this Pokemon is smarter than a supercomputer.
1065.name: metagross

1066.text: A Pokemon that is made entirely of rocks and boulders. If parts of its body chip off in battle, REGIROCK repairs itself by adding new rocks.
1066.name: regirock

1067.text: Its entire body is made of Antarctic ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an ice age.
1067.name: regice

1068.text: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.
1068.name: registeel

1069.text: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other Pokemon. They disappear if they sense enemies.
1069.name: latias

1070.text: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.
1070.name: latios

1071.text: KYOGRE has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with GROUDON, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.
1071.name: kyogre

1072.text: GROUDON has appeared in mythology as the creator of the land. It sleeps in magma underground and is said to make volcanoes erupt on awakening.
1072.name: groudon

1073.text: A Pokemon that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if KYOGRE and GROUDON were to fight.
1073.name: rayquaza

1074.text: JIRACHI is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.
1074.name: jirachi

1075.text: A Pokemon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
1075.name: deoxys

1076.text: This Pokemon is very popular as a pet. Its fur-covered tail is a symbol of its longevity.
1076.name: wartortle

1077.text: It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon.
1077.name: caterpie

1078.text: This Pokemon is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.
1078.name: kakuna

1079.text: Does not like to fight. It hides in tall grass and so on, foraging for food such as small bugs.
1079.name: pidgey

1080.text: Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.
1080.name: raticate

1081.text: It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.
1081.name: spearow

1082.text: Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a whole day without landing.
1082.name: fearow

1083.text: Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint.
1083.name: raichu

1084.text: Though small, it must be treated with caution because of its powerfully toxic barbs. The female has smaller horns.
1084.name: nidoranf

1085.text: It is easily angered. By swinging its well- developed horn wildly, it can even punch through diamond.
1085.name: nidorino

1086.text: Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find.
1086.name: clefairy

1087.text: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.
1087.name: wigglytuff

1088.text: It clamps down on its prey with needle- sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of blood in one gulp.
1088.name: golbat

1089.text: It scatters toxic spores from the mushroom cap. In China, the spores are used as herbal medicine.
1089.name: parasect

1090.text: Light and agile on its feet, and ferocious in temperament. When angered, it flies into an uncontrollable frenzy.
1090.name: mankey

1091.text: A Pokemon that is described in Chinese legends. It is said to race at an unbelievable speed.
1091.name: arcanine

1092.text: An adept swimmer, it knows the front crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster than the best human swimmers.
1092.name: poliwrath

1093.text: It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA.
1093.name: kadabra

1094.text: It does not like physical attacks very  much. Instead, it freely uses extrasensory powers to defeat foes.
1094.name: alakazam

1095.text: Its round form makes it easy to pick up. Some people have used them to hurl at each other in a snowball fight.
1095.name: geodude

1096.text: Be careful while hiking on mountain trails. GRAVELER may come rolling down the path without slowing.
1096.name: graveler

1097.text: Its body is light, and its legs are incredibly powerful. It can clear Ayers Rock in one leap.
1097.name: ponyta

1098.text: It can gallop at a top speed of 150 miles per hour. It can race as fast as a bullet train while ablaze.
1098.name: rapidash

1099.text: When a SLOWPOKE went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a SHELLDER. That made it evolve into SLOWBRO.
1099.name: slowbro

1100.text: It is usually undetectable because it blends in with the ground. Touching it can cause terrible poisoning.
1100.name: muk

1101.text: A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds.
1101.name: gastly

1102.text: A descendent of the legendary animal baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is skilled at hypnotism.
1102.name: drowzee

1103.text: A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT.
1103.name: voltorb

1104.text: It is called 'The Walking Tropical Rainforest.Each of the nuts has a face and a will of its own.
1104.name: exeggutor

1105.text: Blue plant vines cloak the Pokemon's identity in a tangled mass. It entangles anything that gets close.
1105.name: tangela

1106.text: The female raises its offspring in a pouch on its belly. It is skilled at attacking using COMET PUNCH.
1106.name: kangaskhan

1107.text: The horn on its head is sharp like a drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to make its nest.
1107.name: seaking

1108.text: This Pokemon has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature.
1108.name: starmie

1109.text: Its two long pincer horns are powerful. Once they grip an enemy, they won't release until the foe is torn.
1109.name: pinsir

1110.text: An extremely rare Pokemon that may evolve in a number of different ways depending on stimuli.
1110.name: eevee

1111.text: Using the most advanced technologies, scientists finally succeeded in making the first artificial Pokemon.
1111.name: porygon

1112.text: It swims freely through water. It catches prey with its scythe-like arms and drains the victim's fluids.
1112.name: kabutops

1113.text: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. With its long tail trailing behind, its flying form is magnificent.
1113.name: articuno

1114.text: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. While it is flying, it makes crackling and snapping sounds.
1114.name: zapdos

1115.text: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its orange wings that seem to be on fire.
1115.name: moltres

1116.text: Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in length. It grows larger by repeatedly shedding skin.
1116.name: dratini

1117.text: It is said to live in seas and lakes. Even though it has no wings, it has been seen flying occasionally.
1117.name: dragonair

1118.text: A Pokemon whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It turned vicious as a result.
1118.name: mewtwo

1119.text: A Pokemon of South America that was thought to have been extinct. It is very intelligent and learns any move.
1119.name: mew

1120.text: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp.
1120.name: lanturn

1121.text: If it has just had a baby, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
1121.name: miltank

1122.text: This DEOXYS has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
1122.name: deoxys

1123.text: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp stinger on its head that injects poison.
1123.name: weedle

1124.text: It flies at high speed and attacks using  the large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
1124.name: beedrill

1125.text: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokemon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
1125.name: pidgeotto

1126.text: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
1126.name: rattata

1127.text: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
1127.name: raticate

1128.text: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
1128.name: arbok

1129.text: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.
1129.name: sandshrew

1130.text: The female's horns develop slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
1130.name: nidorina

1131.text: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
1131.name: nidoqueen

1132.text: It stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more  powerful its secreted venom.
1132.name: nidoranm

1133.text: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
1133.name: nidoking

1134.text: With its magical and cute appeal, it has  many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
1134.name: clefairy

1135.text: It forms colonies in perpetually dark  places and uses ultrasonic waves to   identify and approach targets.
1135.name: zubat

1136.text: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
1136.name: oddish

1137.text: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
1137.name: paras

1138.text: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
1138.name: parasect

1139.text: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
1139.name: venomoth

1140.text: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
1140.name: dugtrio

1141.text: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokemon will use psychokinetic powers.
1141.name: psyduck

1142.text: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster Kappa.
1142.name: golduck

1143.text: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.
1143.name: primeape

1144.text: It is very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
1144.name: growlithe

1145.text: Its newly grown legs prevent it from walking well. It appears to prefer swimming over walking.
1145.name: poliwag

1146.text: Using its ability to read minds, it will sense impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
1146.name: abra

1147.text: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.
1147.name: kadabra

1148.text: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
1148.name: machop

1149.text: Its superpowerful punches are said to knock the victim flying clear over the horizon.
1149.name: machamp

1150.text: A carnivorous Pokemon that traps and eats bugs. It appears to use its root feet to replenish moisture.
1150.name: bellsprout

1151.text: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without taking damage.
1151.name: golem

1152.text: Its hooves are ten times harder than diamond. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
1152.name: ponyta

1153.text: The SHELLDER that latches onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's leftover scraps.
1153.name: slowbro

1154.text: Uses antigravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
1154.name: magnemite

1155.text: Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
1155.name: magneton

1156.text: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
1156.name: doduo

1157.text: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head is said to stay awake.
1157.name: dodrio

1158.text: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
1158.name: cloyster

1159.text: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokemon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
1159.name: gastly

1160.text: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
1160.name: haunter

1161.text: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.
1161.name: onix

1162.text: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
1162.name: krabby

1163.text: The large pincer has 10,000-horsepower crushing force. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
1163.name: kingler

1164.text: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
1164.name: electrode

1165.text: It is often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
1165.name: exeggcute

1166.text: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this Pokemon's real face.
1166.name: cubone

1167.text: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra-long, loping strides.
1167.name: hitmonlee

1168.text: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.
1168.name: hitmonchan

1169.text: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
1169.name: lickitung

1170.text: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
1170.name: koffing

1171.text: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two KOFFING can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
1171.name: weezing

1172.text: Its massive bones are 1,000 times harder than human bones. Its TACKLE can knock a semitrailer flying.
1172.name: rhyhorn

1173.text: A rare and elusive Pokemon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch one.
1173.name: chansey

1174.text: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. The vines sway as it walks.
1174.name: tangela

1175.text: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is three years old.
1175.name: kangaskhan

1176.text: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of 'The Water Queen.'
1176.name: goldeen

1177.text: An enigmatic Pokemon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
1177.name: staryu

1178.text: If interrupted while it is miming, it will suddenly DOUBLESLAP the offender with its broad hands.
1178.name: mrmime

1179.text: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one of itself.
1179.name: scyther

1180.text: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
1180.name: electabuzz

1181.text: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly amidst flames.
1181.name: magmar

1182.text: If it fails to crush the foe in its pincers, it will swing around and toss the opponent.
1182.name: pinsir

1183.text: A Pokemon that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people on its back.
1183.name: lapras

1184.text: Capable of copying an opponent's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
1184.name: ditto

1185.text: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature can soar to over 1,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
1185.name: flareon

1186.text: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically regenerated from fossils.
1186.name: omanyte

1187.text: Despite having strong fangs and tentacles, it went extinct when its heavy shell made it unable to catch prey.
1187.name: omastar

1188.text: A Pokemon that was regenerated from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor long ago.
1188.name: kabuto

1189.text: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains their fluids.
1189.name: kabutops

1190.text: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokemon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated, sawlike fangs.
1190.name: aerodactyl

1191.text: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
1191.name: snorlax

1192.text: Long considered a mythical Pokemon until recently, when a small colony was found living underwater.
1192.name: dratini

1193.text: Only a very few people ever see this Pokemon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
1193.name: dragonite

1194.text: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
1194.name: mew

1195.text: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.
1195.name: sunkern

1196.text: The BERRIES it stores in its vaselike shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
1196.name: shuckle

1197.text: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
1197.name: hitmontop

1198.text: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
1198.name: swampert

1199.text: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.
1199.name: wurmple

1200.text: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.
1200.name: silcoon

1201.text: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
1201.name: beautifly

1202.text: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
1202.name: dustox

1203.text: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates LUDICOLO's cells, making it more powerful.
1203.name: ludicolo

1204.text: If it remains still, it becomes impossible to distinguish from real nuts. It delights in surprising foraging PIDGEY.
1204.name: seedot

1205.text: When it stamps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.
1205.name: loudred

1206.text: It emits a variety of sounds from the  holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.
1206.name: exploud

1207.text: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a flotation device in water.
1207.name: azurill

1208.text: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.
1208.name: skitty

1209.text: The favorite of trend-conscious female TRAINERS, they are used in competition for their style and fur.
1209.name: delcatty

1210.text: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.
1210.name: aron

1211.text: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.
1211.name: aggron

1212.text: It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
1212.name: illumise

1213.text: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.
1213.name: sharpedo

1214.text: It is among the largest of all Pokemon. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.
1214.name: wailord

1215.text: It burns coal inside its shell. If it is attacked, it belches thick, black smoke and flees.
1215.name: torkoal

1216.text: It apparently dies if it stops bouncing about. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL on its head.
1216.name: spoink

1217.text: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.
1217.name: grumpig

1218.text: No two SPINDA are said to have identical patterns. It confuses foes with its stumbling motions.
1218.name: spinda

1219.text: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is ALTARIA's humming.
1219.name: altaria

1220.text: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.
1220.name: lunatone

1221.text: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.
1221.name: lileep

1222.text: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.
1222.name: feebas

1223.text: MILOTIC is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
1223.name: milotic

1224.text: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.
1224.name: kecleon

1225.text: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.
1225.name: chimecho

1226.text: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning SPHEAL on its nose.
1226.name: sealeo

1227.text: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
1227.name: walrein

1228.text: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
1228.name: beldum

1229.text: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won't leave a scratch.
1229.name: metang

1230.text: It is formed by two METANG fusing. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
1230.name: metagross

1231.text: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.
1231.name: regirock

1232.text: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the South Pole.
1232.name: regice

1233.text: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
1233.name: registeel

1234.text: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.
1234.name: latios

1235.text: This Pokemon is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.
1235.name: kyogre

1236.text: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.
1236.name: rayquaza

1237.text: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.
1237.name: jirachi

1238.text: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
1238.name: deoxys

1239.text: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
1239.name: pikachu

1240.text: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
1240.name: raichu

1241.text: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.
1241.name: clefairy

1242.text: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.
1242.name: clefable

1243.text: It loves the blood of humans and Pokemon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
1243.name: golbat

1244.text: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can't remember doing so, however.
1244.name: psyduck

1245.text: A Pokemon that lives in lakes. It swims faster than any human swimming champion.
1245.name: golduck

1246.text: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.
1246.name: abra

1247.text: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.
1247.name: kadabra

1248.text: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.
1248.name: alakazam

1249.text: MACHOKE's boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
1249.name: machoke

1250.text: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
1250.name: machamp

1251.text: With 80 tentacles for ensnaring victims, it prevents escape until the prey is weakened by poison.
1251.name: tentacruel

1252.text: Many live on mountain trails and remain half buried while keeping an eye on climbers.
1252.name: geodude

1253.text: GRAVELER make their homes on sheer cliff faces by gouging out numerous horizontal holes.
1253.name: graveler

1254.text: It sheds its hide once a year. Its boulderlike body is so tough, even dynamite can't harm it.
1254.name: golem

1255.text: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.
1255.name: ponyta

1256.text: This Pokemon's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.
1256.name: gastly

1257.text: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.
1257.name: haunter

1258.text: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.
1258.name: onix

1259.text: It swims elegantly by flittering its tail fin as if it were a dress. It has the look of a queen.
1259.name: goldeen

1260.text: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.
1260.name: mrmime

1261.text: It is said to be the world's weakest Pokemon. No one knows why it has managed to survive.
1261.name: magikarp

1262.text: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.
1262.name: gyarados

1263.text: It always stands on one foot. Even when attacked, it does not brace itself using both feet.
1263.name: hoothoot

1264.text: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.
1264.name: noctowl

1265.text: Having four wings enables it to fly faster and more quietly. It turns active when the night comes.
1265.name: crobat

1266.text: The electric pouches on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.
1266.name: pichu

1267.text: Its silhouette is like a star. It is believed to arrive riding on shooting stars.
1267.name: cleffa

1268.text: Using its tail as a float, it dives underwater. It likes eating plants that grow on river bottoms.
1268.name: marill

1269.text: It lives in rivers and lakes. In water, its coloring and patterns trick the vision of foes.
1269.name: azumarill

1270.text: Despite appearing to be a tree, its body is closer to rocks and stones. It is very weak to water.
1270.name: sudowoodo

1271.text: It uses its tail to pluck fruits that are out of reach. Its tail is more adept than its real hands.
1271.name: aipom

1272.text: It lives in cold water, half burying itself in mud at the bottom to sleep.
1272.name: wooper

1273.text: It is believed that seeing this Pokemon at night will bring about ominous occurrences.
1273.name: murkrow

1274.text: It loves to sneak up on people late at night, then startle them with its shrieklike cry.
1274.name: misdreavus

1275.text: Its tail also has a small brain. It bites to repel any foe trying to sneak up on it from behind.
1275.name: girafarig

1276.text: It gathers in forests to search for tree sap, its favorite food. It's strong enough to hurl foes.
1276.name: heracross

1277.text: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.
1277.name: remoraid

1278.text: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
1278.name: octillery

1279.text: When the waves are calm, one may encounter a swarm of MANTINE swimming as if they are in flight.
1279.name: mantine

1280.text: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
1280.name: silcoon

1281.text: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
1281.name: cascoon

1282.text: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
1282.name: medicham

1283.text: ROSELIA raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.
1283.name: roselia

1284.text: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
1284.name: whiscash

1285.text: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
1285.name: feebas

1286.text: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
1286.name: milotic

1287.text: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
1287.name: chimecho

1288.text: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.
1288.name: turtwig

1289.text: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.
1289.name: chimchar

1290.text: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.
1290.name: monferno

1291.text: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.
1291.name: infernape

1292.text: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokemon. It stays within a huge flock.
1292.name: staravia

1293.text: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.
1293.name: staraptor

1294.text: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.
1294.name: kricketot

1295.text: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
1295.name: luxray

1296.text: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
1296.name: roserade

1297.text: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.
1297.name: cranidos

1298.text: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
1298.name: rampardos

1299.text: A Pokemon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.
1299.name: shieldon

1300.text: A Pokemon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.
1300.name: combee

1301.text: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.
1301.name: buizel

1302.text: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
1302.name: cherubi

1303.text: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.
1303.name: cherrim

1304.text: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.
1304.name: shellos

1305.text: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
1305.name: gastrodon

1306.text: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.
1306.name: buneary

1307.text: An extremely cautious Pokemon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
1307.name: lopunny

1308.text: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
1308.name: mismagius

1309.text: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokemon's nest and claims it as its own.
1309.name: purugly

1310.text: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.
1310.name: chingling

1311.text: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.
1311.name: bronzong

1312.text: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body's fluid levels by eliminating excess.
1312.name: bonsly

1313.text: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.
1313.name: happiny

1314.text: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.
1314.name: gabite

1315.text: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.
1315.name: munchlax

1316.text: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
1316.name: lucario

1317.text: A friendly Pokemon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.
1317.name: mantyke

1318.text: It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.
1318.name: snover

1319.text: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.
1319.name: abomasnow

1320.text: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.
1320.name: manaphy

1321.text: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.
1321.name: shaymin

1322.text: It is described in mythology as the Pokemon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
1322.name: arceus

1323.text: If it looses crackling power from the electric pouches on its cheeks, it is being wary.
1323.name: pikachu

1324.text: It flies using the wings on its back to collect moonlight. This Pokemon is difficult to find.
1324.name: clefairy

1325.text: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
1325.name: zubat

1326.text: It is controlled by a mushroom grown larger than the bug body. It is said to prefer damp places.
1326.name: parasect

1327.text: It never remembers using its odd powers, so it always tilts its head in puzzlement.
1327.name: psyduck

1328.text: The flippers of its well-developed limbs give it shocking speed. It is the best swimmer among Pokemon.
1328.name: golduck

1329.text: Even while asleep, it maintains a telepathic radar. It teleports when it is threatened.
1329.name: abra

1330.text: Its highly developed brain is on par with a supercomputer. It can use all forms of psychic abilities.
1330.name: alakazam

1331.text: Its muscles never cramp however much it trains. It lives in the mountains away from humans.
1331.name: machop

1332.text: It can knock a train flying with a punch. However, it is terrible at delicate work using its fingers.
1332.name: machamp

1333.text: It drifts in sea currents. Countless fishermen are hurt by its poison stingers.
1333.name: tentacool

1334.text: It alerts others to danger by stridently flashing the red orbs on its head.
1334.name: tentacruel

1335.text: It tumbles down slopes, heedless of any body parts chipping off. It eats a ton of rocks daily.
1335.name: graveler

1336.text: It has astounding acceleration. From a standstill, it can reach top speed within 10 steps.
1336.name: rapidash

1337.text: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It feeds on electricity.
1337.name: magnemite

1338.text: It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. A group can set off a magnetic storm.
1338.name: magneton

1339.text: A Pokemon born from poison gases. It defeats even the largest foes by enveloping them in gas.
1339.name: gastly

1340.text: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey's life force.
1340.name: gengar

1341.text: It squirms through the ground using its long and rugged body. It always eats while burrowing.
1341.name: onix

1342.text: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.
1342.name: lickitung

1343.text: Its body is clad in a thick hide, and its tackles topple buildings. Unfortunately, it is not smart.
1343.name: rhyhorn

1344.text: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
1344.name: rhydon

1345.text: It lays several eggs a day and won't share them with those who have evil in their hearts.
1345.name: chansey

1346.text: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.
1346.name: tangela

1347.text: To protect its family, it will fight with its drill-sharp horn. It lives in hollowed rocks in streams.
1347.name: seaking

1348.text: It is nearly impossible to parry its attacking scythes. Its movements are like a ninja's.
1348.name: scyther

1349.text: Half of all blackouts occur when this Pokemon appears at power plants and eats electricity.
1349.name: electabuzz

1350.text: It is unable to swim against even slow-moving currents. It always splashes about for some reason.
1350.name: magikarp

1351.text: It controls 10,000-volt power and can raise all the fur on its body as if it were sharp needles.
1351.name: jolteon

1352.text: The world's first artificially created Pokemon. It can travel through electronic space.
1352.name: porygon

1353.text: It stops eating only to sleep. It doesn't feel full unless it eats nearly 900 pounds a day.
1353.name: snorlax

1354.text: It switches its standing foot so quickly, it can't be seen. It cries at the same time every day.
1354.name: hoothoot

1355.text: If it flips its head upside down, it's a sign that it is engaged in very complex thinking.
1355.name: noctowl

1356.text: A Pokemon that gained vastly enhanced flying performance by having its legs turn into wings.
1356.name: crobat

1357.text: Its shell is said to be stuffed with happiness that it shares with kindhearted people.
1357.name: togepi

1358.text: It is said to appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called 'joy dust.'
1358.name: togetic

1359.text: It stands along paths pretending to be a tree. If it starts raining, it seems to disappear.
1359.name: sudowoodo

1360.text: It lives atop giant trees. It wraps its tail around a branch so it won't fall off while asleep.
1360.name: aipom

1361.text: A dim-witted Pokemon. It doesn't care if it bumps its head into boats or rocks while swimming.
1361.name: quagsire

1362.text: Its fur has the look and feel of velvet. The orb on its forehead glows when it uses psycho-power.
1362.name: espeon

1363.text: It appears near travelers to lure them into deep forests. It is said to carry misfortune.
1363.name: murkrow

1364.text: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
1364.name: unown

1365.text: It sails on the winds with its limbs extended to strike from the sky. It aims for the prey's face.
1365.name: gligar

1366.text: With powerful legs and claws, it generates enough power to hurl foes over great distances.
1366.name: heracross

1367.text: It is extremely vicious and will not stop attacking until its foe is incapable of moving.
1367.name: sneasel

1368.text: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
1368.name: swinub

1369.text: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
1369.name: piloswine

1370.text: It clings to MANTINE to feed on the big Pokemon's scraps. This is an adaptation to avoid foes.
1370.name: remoraid

1371.text: It obscures its foe's vision by spitting a cloud of murky ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
1371.name: octillery

1372.text: It swims elegantly, mindless of REMORAID hitching on to its broad fins. It has a docile nature.
1372.name: mantine

1373.text: It conveys its feelings using different cries. It works in a pack to cleverly take down prey.
1373.name: houndour

1374.text: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees F. It is healthy if it is breathing yellow flames.
1374.name: magby

1375.text: It is a Pokemon that delivers happiness. Eating its egg is said to make one kind to everyone.
1375.name: blissey

1376.text: It spits a white silk that turns sticky when it contacts air. It is used to immobilize foes.
1376.name: wurmple

1377.text: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
1377.name: beautifly

1378.text: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
1378.name: cascoon

1379.text: It acts as a delivery service by carrying small Pokemon in its bill. It bobs on the waves to rest.
1379.name: pelipper

1380.text: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
1380.name: ralts

1381.text: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer's feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
1381.name: kirlia

1382.text: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
1382.name: gardevoir

1383.text: Its tail is filled with nutrients necessary for growth. It plays by bouncing on its tail.
1383.name: azurill

1384.text: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokemon always keeps its face pointing north.
1384.name: nosepass

1385.text: It never misses its daily yoga workouts, and it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
1385.name: meditite

1386.text: Through daily meditation, it hones its spiritual power. It can sense what others are thinking.
1386.name: medicham

1387.text: The beautiful flowers on its arms have toxic thorns. Don't even think about picking those flowers.
1387.name: roselia

1388.text: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.
1388.name: swablu

1389.text: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
1389.name: altaria

1390.text: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
1390.name: whiscash

1391.text: It is the world's most beautiful Pokemon. There are many works of art featuring MILOTIC.
1391.name: milotic

1392.text: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
1392.name: tropius

1393.text: The shell is hardened soil. Some Pokemon come to peck the berries growing on the trees on its back.
1393.name: grotle
