1394.text: Groups of this Pokemon migrating in search of water have been mistaken for 'moving forests.'
1394.name: torterra

1395.text: It lives along shores in northern countries. A skilled swimmer, it dives for over 10 minutes to hunt.
1395.name: piplup

1396.text: Its wings deliver wicked blows that snap even the thickest of trees. It searches for prey in icy seas.
1396.name: prinplup

1397.text: Usually with a large flock, it is barely noticeable when alone. Its cries are very strident.
1397.name: starly

1398.text: While its movements out of water are sluggish, it can swim as fast as any FEEBAS.
1398.name: bibarel

1399.text: Its forelegs have a muscle-based system of generating electricity. Its body shines if endangered.
1399.name: shinx

1400.text: It rests its forelegs on others to communicate with rhythmic electric pulses from its claws.
1400.name: luxio

1401.text: It lives alongside clear ponds. It scatters pollen that induces harsh sneezing and runny noses.
1401.name: budew

1402.text: When attacked, they form a wall with their shieldlike faces to protect their young.
1402.name: bastiodon

1403.text: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of floral honey.
1403.name: mothim

1404.text: When endangered, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
1404.name: vespiquen

1405.text: It makes electricity with pouches in its cheeks and shoots charges from its tail. It lives atop trees.
1405.name: pachirisu

1406.text: It is docile as a bud, but turns cheerful when it blooms. It folds back into a bud if sunlight wanes.
1406.name: cherrim

1407.text: It lives along bodies of water. Its body shape has changed to suit its habitat.
1407.name: shellos

1408.text: It tugs on the hands of children to steal them away. However, it gets pulled around instead.
1408.name: drifloon

1409.text: It is very conscious of its looks and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
1409.name: lopunny

1410.text: It makes its MURKROW cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.
1410.name: honchkrow

1411.text: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokemon.
1411.name: glameow

1412.text: It sprays a nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear to repel attackers.
1412.name: stunky

1413.text: X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared, however.
1413.name: bronzor

1414.text: It can summon rain clouds. People long ago revered it as the bringer of plentiful harvests.
1414.name: bronzong

1415.text: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.
1415.name: mimejr

1416.text: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It imitates human speech.
1416.name: chatot

1417.text: It once lived in the tropics. To avoid the cold, it lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat.
1417.name: gible

1418.text: It habitually digs up and hoards gems in its nest. Its loot is constantly targeted by thieves.
1418.name: gabite

1419.text: Its body is lithe yet powerful. It can crest three mountains and cross two canyons in one night.
1419.name: riolu

1420.text: Its huge mouth is almost seven feet across. It has enough power to completely crush a car.
1420.name: hippowdon

1421.text: It lives in arid lands. It buries itself in sand and lies in wait for unsuspecting prey.
1421.name: skorupi

1422.text: Its body is encased in a sturdy shell. Its head rotates 180 degrees, eliminating blind spots.
1422.name: drapion

1423.text: Inflating its poison sacs, it makes an eerie blubbering sound for intimidation.
1423.name: croagunk

1424.text: The toxin made in its poison sacs is pumped to the knuckle claws through tubes down its arms.
1424.name: toxicroak

1425.text: Hanging from branches using its tentacles, it looks like a plant. It awaits prey, mouth wide open.
1425.name: carnivine

1426.text: The way its two tail fins flutter while it swims has earned it the nickname 'BEAUTIFLY of the Sea.'
1426.name: finneon

1427.text: Scientists discovered that the distinctive patterns on its back differ by region.
1427.name: mantyke

1428.text: It sends signals to others by carving odd patterns in frost- covered trees and ice.
1428.name: weavile

1429.text: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
1429.name: rhyperior

1430.text: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.
1430.name: togekiss

1431.text: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.
1431.name: yanmega

1432.text: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.
1432.name: glaceon

1433.text: It is thought that UXIE, MESPRIT and AZELF all came from the same egg.
1433.name: azelf

1434.text: A Pokemon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.
1434.name: giratina

1435.text: A Pokemon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.
1435.name: phione

1436.text: Water makes up 80% of its body. This Pokemon is easily affected by its environment.
1436.name: manaphy

1437.text: Folklore has it that on moonless nights, this Pokemon will make people see horrific nightmares.
1437.name: darkrai

1438.text: It is said that CHARIZARD's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
1438.name: charizard

1439.text: By flapping its wings with all its might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
1439.name: pidgeot

1440.text: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of GEODUDE at once.
1440.name: machop

1441.text: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
1441.name: slowbro

1442.text: When DODUO evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.
1442.name: dodrio

1443.text: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe MEW to be the ancestor of Pokemon.
1443.name: mew

1444.text: LANTURN's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed 'The Deep-Sea Star.'
1444.name: lanturn

1445.text: Being bitten by SHELLDER gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
1445.name: slowking

1446.text: No two SPINDA have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
1446.name: spinda

1447.text: It is formed by two BELDUM joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
1447.name: metang

1448.text: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy TURTWIG, the shell should feel moist.
1448.name: turtwig

1449.text: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a STARAVIA cries noisily.
1449.name: staravia

1450.text: When UXIE flew, people gained the ability to solve problems. It was the birth of knowledge.
1450.name: uxie

1451.text: When MESPRIT flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.
1451.name: mesprit

1452.text: When AZELF flew, people gained the determination to do things. It was the birth of willpower.
1452.name: azelf

1453.text: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokemon.
1453.name: manaphy

1454.text: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
1454.name: bulbasaur

1455.text: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
1455.name: charmander

1456.text: It is very hotheaded by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.
1456.name: charmeleon

1457.text: If CHARIZARD becomes furious, the flame at the tip of its tail flares up in a light blue shade.
1457.name: charizard

1458.text: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it prepares to evolve. It stays motionless in the shell.
1458.name: metapod

1459.text: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
1459.name: kakuna

1460.text: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
1460.name: beedrill

1461.text: It usually hides in tall grass. Because it dislikes fighting, it protects itself by kicking up sand.
1461.name: pidgey

1462.text: It has outstanding vision. However high it flies, it is able to distinguish the movements of its prey.
1462.name: pidgeotto

1463.text: Its well-developed chest muscles make it strong enough to whip up a gusty windstorm with just a few flaps.
1463.name: pidgeot

1464.text: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
1464.name: rattata

1465.text: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnawing on them.
1465.name: raticate

1466.text: It flaps its short wings to flush out insects from tall grass. It then plucks them with its stubby beak.
1466.name: spearow

1467.text: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
1467.name: fearow

1468.text: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
1468.name: arbok

1469.text: This intelligent Pokemon roasts hard berries with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
1469.name: pikachu

1470.text: If it fell from a great height, this Pokemon could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
1470.name: sandshrew

1471.text: In an attempt to hide itself, it will run around at top speed to kick up a blinding dust storm.
1471.name: sandslash

1472.text: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely potent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.
1472.name: nidoranf

1473.text: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.
1473.name: nidoqueen

1474.text: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.
1474.name: nidoranm

1475.text: It swings its big tail around during battle. If its foe flinches, it will charge with its sturdy body.
1475.name: nidoking

1476.text: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.
1476.name: clefable

1477.text: As it develops, its single white tail gains color and splits into six. It is quite warm and cuddly.
1477.name: vulpix

1478.text: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
1478.name: zubat

1479.text: However hard its victim's hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
1479.name: golbat

1480.text: Awakened by moonlight, it roams actively at night. In the day, it stays quietly underground.
1480.name: oddish

1481.text: It is doused with mushroom spores when it is born. As its body grows, mushrooms sprout from its back.
1481.name: paras

1482.text: It stays mostly in dark, damp places, the preference not of the bug, but of the big mushroom on its back.
1482.name: parasect

1483.text: Its eyes also function as radar units. It catches and eats small bugs that hide in darkness.
1483.name: venonat

1484.text: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
1484.name: meowth

1485.text: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
1485.name: persian

1486.text: It is extremely ill-tempered. Groups of them will attack any handy target for no reason.
1486.name: mankey

1487.text: If approached while asleep, it may awaken and angrily give chase in a groggy state of semi-sleep.
1487.name: primeape

1488.text: This legendary Chinese Pokemon is considered magnificent. Many people are enchanted by its grand mane.
1488.name: arcanine

1489.text: Because it is inept at walking on its newly grown legs, it always  swims around in water.
1489.name: poliwag

1490.text: The swirl on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it may gradually cause drowsiness.
1490.name: poliwhirl

1491.text: This strong and skilled swimmer is even capable of crossing the Pacific Ocean just by kicking.
1491.name: poliwrath

1492.text: It possesses strong spiritual power. The more danger it faces, the stronger its psychic power.
1492.name: kadabra

1493.text: Closing both its eyes heightens all its other senses. This enables it to use its abilities to their extremes.
1493.name: alakazam

1494.text: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable Pokemon never gets tired.
1494.name: machoke

1495.text: Acid that has dissolved many prey becomes sweeter, making it even more effective at attracting prey.
1495.name: victreebel

1496.text: When the tide goes out, dehydrated TENTACOOL remains can be found washed up on the shore.
1496.name: tentacool

1497.text: Its 80 tentacles absorb water and stretch almost endlessly to constrict its prey and enemies.
1497.name: tentacruel

1498.text: Most people may not notice, but a closer look should reveal that there are many GEODUDE around.
1498.name: geodude

1499.text: It sheds its skin once a year. The discarded shell immediately hardens and crumbles away.
1499.name: golem

1500.text: It is a weak runner immediately after birth. It gradually becomes faster by chasing after its parents.
1500.name: ponyta

1501.text: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredibly fast.
1501.name: rapidash

1502.text: If the tail-biting SHELLDER is thrown off in a harsh battle, it reverts to being an ordinary SLOWPOKE.
1502.name: slowbro

1503.text: It is attracted by electromagnetic waves. It may approach Trainers if they are using their Pokegear.
1503.name: magnemite

1504.text: Three MAGNEMITE are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.
1504.name: magneton

1505.text: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant stalks grow, it uses its own stalk to thwart them.
1505.name: farfetchd

1506.text: By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.
1506.name: doduo

1507.text: It collects data and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and fall into a state of immobility.
1507.name: dodrio

1508.text: Although it can't walk well on land, it is a graceful swimmer. It especially loves being in frigid seas.
1508.name: seel

1509.text: As it moves, it loses bits of its body, from which new GRIMER emerge. This worsens the stench around it.
1509.name: grimer

1510.text: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
1510.name: gengar

1511.text: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.
1511.name: onix

1512.text: If you think that you had a good dream but you can't remember it, a DROWZEE has probably eaten it.
1512.name: drowzee

1513.text: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
1513.name: hypno

1514.text: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer's size makes it difficult to aim properly.
1514.name: kingler

1515.text: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
1515.name: electrode

1516.text: Their shells are very durable. Even if they crack, they can survive without spilling their contents.
1516.name: exeggcute

1517.text: If it is sad or lonely, the skull it wears shakes and emits a plaintive and mournful sound.
1517.name: cubone

1518.text: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out messages to others.
1518.name: marowak

1519.text: Its tongue has well-developed nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deftly manipulated.
1519.name: lickitung

1520.text: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
1520.name: koffing

1521.text: Its rugged hide protects it from even the heat of lava. However, the hide also makes it insensitive.
1521.name: rhydon

1522.text: The vines that cloak its entire body are always jiggling. They effectively unnerve its foes.
1522.name: tangela

1523.text: If attacked by a larger enemy, it quickly swims to safety by adeptly controlling its well-developed dorsal fin.
1523.name: horsea

1524.text: An examination of its cells revealed the presence of a gene not found in HORSEA. It became a hot topic.
1524.name: seadra

1525.text: During spawning season, SEAKING gather from all over, causing rivers to appear a brilliant red.
1525.name: seaking

1526.text: At night, the middle of its body slowly flickers with the same rhythm as a human heartbeat.
1526.name: staryu

1527.text: The middle section of its body is called the core. It glows in a different color each time it is seen.
1527.name: starmie

1528.text: A skilled mime from birth, it gains the ability to create invisible objects as it matures.
1528.name: mrmime

1529.text: It rocks its body rhythmically. It appears to alter the rhythm depending on how it is feeling.
1529.name: jynx

1530.text: It dislikes cold places, so it blows scorching flames to make the environment suitable for itself.
1530.name: magmar

1531.text: With its pincer horns, it digs burrows to sleep in at night. In the morning, damp soil clings to its body.
1531.name: pinsir

1532.text: They say that during past strife, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.
1532.name: gyarados

1533.text: It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.
1533.name: ditto

1534.text: When VAPOREON's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
1534.name: vaporeon

1535.text: It is a manmade Pokemon. Since it doesn't breathe, people are eager to try it in any environment.
1535.name: porygon

1536.text: Apparently, it cracked SHELLDER's shell with its sharp fangs and sucked out the insides.
1536.name: omastar

1537.text: On rare occasions, some have been found as fossils which they became while hiding on the ocean floor.
1537.name: kabuto

1538.text: A vicious Pokemon from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding.
1538.name: aerodactyl

1539.text: What sounds like its cry may actually be its snores or the rumblings of its hungry belly.
1539.name: snorlax

1540.text: The magnificent, seemingly translucent wings of this legendary bird Pokemon are said to be made of ice.
1540.name: articuno

1541.text: This legendary bird Pokemon causes savage thunderstorms by flapping its glittering wings.
1541.name: zapdos

1542.text: This legendary Pokemon scatters embers with every flap of its wings. It is a thrilling sight to behold.
1542.name: moltres

1543.text: It is said that this Pokemon constantly flies over the immense seas and rescues drowning people.
1543.name: dragonite

1544.text: Because its battle abilities were raised to the ultimate level, it thinks only of defeating its foes.
1544.name: mewtwo

1545.text: Apparently, it appears only to those people who are pure of heart and have a strong desire to see it.
1545.name: mew

1546.text: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.
1546.name: bayleef

1547.text: A very cautious Pokemon, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.
1547.name: sentret

1548.text: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
1548.name: ledyba

1549.text: BELLOSSOM gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
1549.name: bellossom

1550.text: The tip of its tail, which contains oil that is lighter than water, lets it swim without drowning.
1550.name: marill

1551.text: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. But they do enjoy gentle breezes.
1551.name: hoppip

1552.text: Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores-- it can even float around the world.
1552.name: jumpluff

1553.text: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
1553.name: sunflora

1554.text: When agitated, this Pokemon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
1554.name: umbreon

1555.text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
1555.name: unown

1556.text: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
1556.name: steelix

1557.text: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
1557.name: snubbull

1558.text: The berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
1558.name: shuckle

1559.text: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen berries.
1559.name: ursaring

1560.text: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.
1560.name: slugma

1561.text: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
1561.name: magcargo

1562.text: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if REMORAID attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.
1562.name: mantine

1563.text: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
1563.name: skarmory

1564.text: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
1564.name: phanpy

1565.text: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, however.
1565.name: porygon2

1566.text: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
1566.name: smeargle

1567.text: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble from its mouth and nostrils.
1567.name: magby

1568.text: Anyone who takes even one taste of BLISSEY's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.
1568.name: blissey

1569.text: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to contain its sheer power, it races headlong around the land.
1569.name: entei

1570.text: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.
1570.name: lugia

1571.text: Legends claim this Pokemon flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent, seven-colored wings.
1571.name: hooh

1572.text: Its saliva can decompose anything. It wraps its long tongue around things to coat them with its sticky saliva.
1572.name: lickilicky

1573.text: When it remains still, it appears to be a large shrub. Unsuspecting prey that wander near get ensnared by its vines.
1573.name: tangrowth

1574.text: If the bud on its back starts to smell sweet, it is evidence that the large flower will soon bloom.
1574.name: ivysaur

1575.text: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.
1575.name: venusaur

1576.text: Breathing intense, hot flames, it can melt almost anything. Its breath inflicts terrible pain on enemies.
1576.name: charizard

1577.text: The shell, which hardens soon after it is born, is resilient. If you poke it, it will bounce back out.
1577.name: squirtle

1578.text: It prepares for evolution by hardening its shell as much as possible to protect its soft body.
1578.name: metapod

1579.text: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heaviest of rains.
1579.name: butterfree

1580.text: It attacks using a two-inch poison barb on its head. It can usually be found under the leaves it eats.
1580.name: weedle

1581.text: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
1581.name: kakuna

1582.text: It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison.
1582.name: beedrill

1583.text: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flapping up sand.
1583.name: pidgey

1584.text: It renders its prey immobile using  well-developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.
1584.name: pidgeotto

1585.text: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.
1585.name: raticate

1586.text: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.
1586.name: fearow

1587.text: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
1587.name: ekans

1588.text: With a very vengeful nature, it won't give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
1588.name: arbok

1589.text: Although not very combative, it will torment its foes with poison spikes if it is threatened in any way.
1589.name: nidoranf

1590.text: It has a calm and caring nature. Because its horn grows slowly, it prefers not to fight.
1590.name: nidorina

1591.text: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. It will strike first if it senses any danger.
1591.name: nidoranm

1592.text: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.
1592.name: nidorino

1593.text: Its tail is thick and powerful. If it binds an enemy, it can render the victim helpless quite easily.
1593.name: nidoking

1594.text: Its very sensitive ears let it distinguish distant sounds. As a result, it prefers quiet places.
1594.name: clefable

1595.text: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
1595.name: ninetales

1596.text: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.
1596.name: jigglypuff

1597.text: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
1597.name: zubat

1598.text: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.
1598.name: golbat

1599.text: As its body grows, large mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.
1599.name: paras

1600.text: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches and eats small bugs at night that are attracted by light.
1600.name: venonat

1601.text: The powder on its wings is poisonous if it is dark in hue. If it is light in hue, it causes paralysis.
1601.name: venomoth

1602.text: If a DIGLETT digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
1602.name: diglett

1603.text: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and secretly hoards.
1603.name: meowth

1604.text: The direction of its belly spiral differs by area. The equator is thought to have an effect on this.
1604.name: poliwag

1605.text: Although an energetic, skilled swimmer that uses all of its muscles, it lives on dry land.
1605.name: poliwrath

1606.text: If it decides to teleport randomly, it evokes the illusion that it has created copies of itself.
1606.name: abra

1607.text: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.
1607.name: machop

1608.text: The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.
1608.name: machoke

1609.text: It plants its feet deep underground to replenish water. It can't escape its enemy while it's rooted.
1609.name: bellsprout

1610.text: If its prey is bigger than its mouth, it slices up the victim with sharp leaves, then eats every morsel.
1610.name: weepinbell

1611.text: This horrifying plant Pokemon attracts prey with aromatic honey, then melts them in its mouth.
1611.name: victreebel

1612.text: It drifts aimlessly in waves. Very difficult to see in water, it may not be noticed until it stings.
1612.name: tentacool

1613.text: It uses its arms to steadily climb steep mountain paths. It swings its fists around if angered.
1613.name: geodude

1614.text: It is capable of blowing itself up. It uses this explosive force to jump from mountain to mountain.
1614.name: golem

1615.text: Its hind legs, which have hooves that are harder than diamond, kick back at any presence it senses behind it.
1615.name: ponyta

1616.text: With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just 10 steps.
1616.name: rapidash

1617.text: A sweet sap leaks from its tail's tip. Although not nutritious, the tail is pleasant to chew on.
1617.name: slowpoke

1618.text: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to SHELLDER's seeping poison.
1618.name: slowbro

1619.text: The MAGNEMITE are united by a magnetism so powerful, it dries all moisture in its vicinity.
1619.name: magneton

1620.text: If it eats the plant stalk it carries as emergency rations, it runs off in search of a new stalk.
1620.name: farfetchd

1621.text: It races through grassy plains with powerful strides, leaving footprints up to four inches deep.
1621.name: doduo

1622.text: If one of the heads gets to eat, the others will be satisfied, too, and they will stop squabbling.
1622.name: dodrio

1623.text: In daytime, it is often found asleep on the seabed in shallow waters. Its nostrils close while it swims.
1623.name: seel

1624.text: It loves frigid seas with ice floes. It uses its long tail to change swimming direction quickly.
1624.name: dewgong

1625.text: Wherever GRIMER has passed, so many germs are left behind that no plants will ever grow again.
1625.name: grimer

1626.text: Its body is made of a powerful poison. Touching it accidentally will cause a fever that requires bed rest.
1626.name: muk

1627.text: Grains of sand trapped in its shells mix with its body fluids to form beautiful pearls.
1627.name: shellder

1628.text: CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
1628.name: cloyster

1629.text: The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walking sideways.
1629.name: krabby

1630.text: Using telepathy only they can employ, they always form a cluster of six EXEGGCUTE.
1630.name: exeggcute

1631.text: If a head drops off, it emits a telepathic call in search of others to form an EXEGGCUTE cluster.
1631.name: exeggutor

1632.text: It collects bones from an unknown place. Some whisper that a MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world.
1632.name: marowak

1633.text: It doesn't care if there is anything in its way. It just charges and destroys all obstacles.
1633.name: rhyhorn

1634.text: Its brain developed when it began walking on hind legs. Its thick hide protects it even in magma.
1634.name: rhydon

1635.text: Being few in number and difficult to capture, it is said to bring happiness to the Trainer who catches it.
1635.name: chansey

1636.text: To protect its young, it will never give up during battle, no matter how badly wounded it is.
1636.name: kangaskhan

1637.text: Its big, developed fins move rapidly, allowing it to swim backward while still facing forward.
1637.name: horsea

1638.text: A strong swimmer, it is capable of swimming nonstop up fast streams at a steady speed of five knots per hour.
1638.name: goldeen

1639.text: Regardless of the environment it lives in, its body grows to form a symmetrical geometric shape.
1639.name: starmie

1640.text: Its fingertips emit a peculiar force field that hardens air to create an actual wall.
1640.name: mrmime

1641.text: When it moves, it leaves only a blur. If it hides in grass, its protective coloration makes it invisible.
1641.name: scyther

1642.text: It speaks a language similar to that of humans. However, it seems to use dancing to communicate.
1642.name: jynx

1643.text: The fiery surface of its body gives off a wavering, rippling glare that is similar to the sun.
1643.name: magmar

1644.text: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like PIDGEOTTO to catch it mid-jump.
1644.name: magikarp

1645.text: Its irregularly configured DNA is affected by its surroundings. It evolves if its environment changes.
1645.name: eevee

1646.text: This Pokemon from ancient times is said to have navigated the sea by adeptly twisting its 10 tentacles.
1646.name: omanyte

1647.text: This Pokemon lived in ancient times. On rare occasions, it has been discovered as a living fossil.
1647.name: kabuto

1648.text: With sharp claws, this ferocious, ancient Pokemon rips apart prey and sucks their body fluids.
1648.name: kabutops

1649.text: Its stomach's digestive juices can dissolve any kind of poison. It can even eat things off the ground.
1649.name: snorlax

1650.text: One of the legendary bird Pokemon, it chills moisture in the atmosphere to create snow while flying.
1650.name: articuno

1651.text: This legendary bird Pokemon is said to appear only when a thundercloud parts into two halves.
1651.name: zapdos

1652.text: This legendary bird Pokemon is said to bring early spring to the wintry lands it visits.
1652.name: moltres

1653.text: This marine Pokemon has an impressive build that lets it freely fly over raging seas without trouble.
1653.name: dragonite

1654.text: It usually remains motionless to conserve energy, so that it may unleash its full power in battle.
1654.name: mewtwo

1655.text: MEGANIUM's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.
1655.name: meganium

1656.text: This Pokemon is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.
1656.name: quilava

1657.text: It is hard for it to support its weight out of water, so it sometimes gets down on all fours. But it moves fast.
1657.name: feraligatr

1658.text: There is no telling where the tail begins. Despite its short legs, it is quick and likes to chase RATTATA.
1658.name: furret

1659.text: When the weather turns cold, lots of LEDYBA gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
1659.name: ledyba

1660.text: The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest.
1660.name: crobat

1661.text: When numerous meteors illuminate the night sky, sightings of CLEFFA strangely increase.
1661.name: cleffa

1662.text: Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously--anytime, anywhere.
1662.name: igglybuff

1663.text: In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past.
1663.name: xatu

1664.text: The end of its tail serves as a buoy that keeps it from drowning, even in a vicious current.
1664.name: marill

1665.text: When it plays in water, it rolls up its elongated ears to prevent their insides from getting wet.
1665.name: azumarill

1666.text: Drifts on seasonal winds and spreads its cotton-like spores all over the world to make more offspring.
1666.name: jumpluff

1667.text: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.
1667.name: yanma

1668.text: It is said that when chased, it lures its attacker onto dark mountain trails where the foe will get lost.
1668.name: murkrow

1669.text: Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell.
1669.name: girafarig

1670.text: It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
1670.name: pineco

1671.text: It's said that if an ONIX lives for 100 years, its composition becomes diamondlike as it evolves into a STEELIX.
1671.name: steelix

1672.text: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its bite is powerful.
1672.name: granbull

1673.text: Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature.
1673.name: scizor

1674.text: It is usually docile, but if it is disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.
1674.name: heracross

1675.text: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and scavenges any leftovers it can find.
1675.name: sneasel

1676.text: In a south-sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these Pokemon.
1676.name: corsola

1677.text: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
1677.name: octillery

1678.text: It nests at the edge of sharp cliffs. It spends all day carrying food to its awaiting chicks.
1678.name: delibird

1679.text: Swimming freely in open seas, it may fly out of the water and over the waves if it builds up enough speed.
1679.name: mantine

1680.text: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
1680.name: stantler

1681.text: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
1681.name: smoochum

1682.text: Even in the most vicious storm, this Pokemon plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.
1682.name: elekid

1683.text: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don't underestimate it.
1683.name: magby

1684.text: It has a very compassionate nature. If it sees a sick Pokemon, it will nurse the sufferer back to health.
1684.name: blissey

1685.text: A Pokemon that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.
1685.name: raikou

1686.text: This Pokemon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears.
1686.name: suicune

1687.text: When CELEBI disappears deep in a forest, it is said to leave behind an egg it brought from the future.
1687.name: celebi

1688.text: It leaps from tree branch to tree branch quite swiftly. It shows astounding agility.
1688.name: grovyle

1689.text: Inside its body is a place where it keeps a small flame. Hug it! It will be as warm as a hot-water bottle.
1689.name: torchic

1690.text: It chases its prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it turns tail if the prey strikes back.
1690.name: poochyena

1691.text: It gets interested in everything, which is why it zigs and zags. It is good at finding items.
1691.name: zigzagoon

1692.text: Having wrapped silk around the branches of a tree, it quiescently awaits evolution.
1692.name: silcoon

1693.text: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
1693.name: cascoon

1694.text: It scatters its fine dust all over when it is attacked. It is a nocturnal Pokemon.
1694.name: dustox

1695.text: When it gets cold, they migrate, flying over 180 miles a day. It hunts for tasty prey.
1695.name: taillow

1696.text: If two of these meet, they cannot get too close because their noses repel each other.
1696.name: nosepass

1697.text: It's adorable when it chases its own tail. It's difficult to earn its trust.
1697.name: skitty

1698.text: You can tell its age by the length of its iron horns. It claims an entire mountain as its territory.
1698.name: aggron

1699.text: Its nest can be found where a thunderbolt hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.
1699.name: manectric

1700.text: It emits light from its tail to communicate. It loves the sweet aroma given off by ILLUMISE.
1700.name: volbeat

1701.text: ROSELIA that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
1701.name: roselia

1702.text: It is the largest of all identified Pokemon. They jump as a pack to herd their prey.
1702.name: wailord

1703.text: The chances of two SPINDA having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.
1703.name: spinda

1704.text: Its wings bring cottony clouds to mind. It grooms with springwater and loves to sit on heads.
1704.name: swablu

1705.text: BARBOACH uses its whiskers to taste things just as a person uses his or her tongue to taste things.
1705.name: barboach

1706.text: It lives in warm seas. Its heavy body weighs it down so it won't get washed away in rough weather.
1706.name: cradily

1707.text: An ancestral Pokemon that lived in the ocean. Over time, its eight feet transformed into wings.
1707.name: anorith

1708.text: It's said that a glimpse of a MILOTIC and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you're feeling.
1708.name: milotic

1709.text: It has the ability to foretell natural disasters. Its life span is over a hundred years.
1709.name: absol

1710.text: It crosses the oceans by rolling itself on drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warm when the temperature is below freezing.
1710.name: spheal

1711.text: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.
1711.name: huntail

1712.text: Its pink body becomes more vivid with the rise of water temperatures in the springtime.
1712.name: gorebyss

1713.text: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
1713.name: relicanth

1714.text: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a LUVDISC to someone you love.
1714.name: luvdisc

1715.text: It surrounds its body in an iron-hard shell to accumulate enough power to evolve.
1715.name: shelgon

1716.text: When two BELDUM fuse together, a magnetic nervous system places their brains in union.
1716.name: metang

1717.text: A GROTLE that lives in the forest is said to have its own secret springwater.
1717.name: grotle

1718.text: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic TORTERRA dwelled.
1718.name: torterra

1719.text: It avoids unnecessary disputes, but it will decimate anything that threatens its pride.
1719.name: empoleon

1720.text: When STARAVIA evolve into STARAPTOR, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
1720.name: staraptor

1721.text: It lives in groups by the water.  It chews up boulders and trees around its nest with its incisors.
1721.name: bidoof

1722.text: LUXRAY's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
1722.name: luxray

1723.text: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.
1723.name: roserade

1724.text: When attacked, they form a wall. Their rock-hard faces serve to protect them from the attacks.
1724.name: bastiodon

1725.text: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it's hot, its cloak is thinner.
1725.name: burmy

1726.text: It is said that a WORMADAM that evolves on a cold day will have a thicker cloak.
1726.name: wormadam

1727.text: At night, COMBEE sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
1727.name: combee

1728.text: It is very difficult to dodge the consecutive strikes of its two tails.
1728.name: ambipom

1729.text: You can tell how it feels by the way it rolls its ears. When it's scared, both ears are rolled up.
1729.name: buneary

1730.text: It sheds its fur twice a year. Its winter fur is soft and fluffy.
1730.name: lopunny

1731.text: Its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.
1731.name: garchomp

1732.text: It attacks people and Pokemon that cross the desert. This has only furthered its bad reputation.
1732.name: drapion

1733.text: Fluid squeezed from its finger, albeit poisonous, is a significant ingredient in remedies for lower back pain.
1733.name: croagunk

1734.text: It walks around on its tentacles in search of a tree branch where it can dangle down and ambush prey.
1734.name: carnivine

1735.text: Swimming and fluttering its two tail fins, it looks like a BEAUTIFLY. At night, the patterns on its tail fins softly shine.
1735.name: finneon

1736.text: It has space in its throat to store saliva. It can also roll up its tongue and store it in the same spot.
1736.name: lickilicky

1737.text: The beat of its wings is so powerful that it accidentally dislodges full-grown trees when it takes off in flight.
1737.name: yanmega

1738.text: It causes small ice crystals to form by lowering the temperature of the surrounding atmosphere.
1738.name: glaceon

1739.text: It flourished worldwide during the ice age but its population declined when the masses of ice began to dwindle.
1739.name: mamoswine

1740.text: This feared Pokemon is said to travel to worlds unknown. Some even believe that it takes lost spirits along with it.
1740.name: dusknoir

1741.text: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as FROSLASS
1741.name: froslass

1742.text: According to some sources, this Pokemon provided people with the intelligence necessary to solve various problems.
1742.name: uxie

1743.text: This Pokemon is said to have endowed the human heart with emotions, such as sorrow and joy.
1743.name: mesprit

1744.text: This Pokemon is said to have endowed humans with the determination needed to face any of life's difficulties.
1744.name: azelf

1745.text: This Pokemon completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.
1745.name: dialga

1746.text: Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places or even other dimensions.
1746.name: palkia

1747.text: It is believed to have shaped REGIROCK, REGICE, and REGISTEEL out of clay, ice, and magma.
1747.name: regigigas

1748.text: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokemon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.bulbasaur
1748.name: arceus

1749.text: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.
1749.name: snivy

1750.text: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokmon flees.
1750.name: lillipup

1751.text: These Pokmon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.
1751.name: liepard

1752.text: This Pokmon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.
1752.name: pansage

1753.text: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600 F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.
1753.name: pansear

1754.text: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
1754.name: simisear

1755.text: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
1755.name: simipour

1756.text: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.
1756.name: munna

1757.text: Each follows its Trainers orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.
1757.name: pidove

1758.text: It can return to its Trainers location regardless of the distance separating them.
1758.name: tranquill

1759.text: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.
1759.name: blitzle

1760.text: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.
1760.name: boldore

1761.text: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.
1761.name: swoobat

1762.text: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.
1762.name: tympole

1763.text: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.
1763.name: sawk

1764.text: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.
1764.name: sewaddle

1765.text: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, theyll start fighting instantly. These Pokmon are very hostile.
1765.name: basculin

1766.text: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
1766.name: darumaka

1767.text: This Pokmon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.
1767.name: dwebble

1768.text: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.
1768.name: sigilyph

1769.text: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
1769.name: minccino

1770.text: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokmon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.
1770.name: gothorita

1771.text: These bird Pokmon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.
1771.name: ducklett

1772.text: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.
1772.name: deerling

1773.text: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.
1773.name: escavalier

1774.text: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.
1774.name: frillish

1775.text: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
1775.name: alomomola

1776.text: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.
1776.name: ferrothorn

1777.text: It can manipulate an opponents memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
1777.name: beheeyem

1778.text: This ominous Pokmon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
1778.name: lampent

1779.text: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.
1779.name: cubchoo

1780.text: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
1780.name: beartic

1781.text: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
1781.name: cryogonal

1782.text: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
1782.name: shelmet

1783.text: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.
1783.name: bisharp

1784.text: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.
1784.name: mandibuzz

1785.text: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.
1785.name: heatmor

1786.text: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.
1786.name: deino

1787.text: This brutal Pokmon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.
1787.name: hydreigon

1788.text: This Pokmon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
1788.name: larvesta

1789.text: This legendary Pokmon battled against humans to protect Pokmon. Its personality is calm and composed.
1789.name: cobalion

1790.text: This Pokmon came to the defense of Pokmon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
1790.name: terrakion

1791.text: This Pokmon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
1791.name: virizion

1792.text: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
1792.name: thundurus

1793.text: This Pokmon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
1793.name: reshiram

1794.text: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.
1794.name: keldeo

1795.text: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
1795.name: genesect

1796.text: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
1796.name: rattata

1797.text: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
1797.name: sandshrew

1798.text: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
1798.name: sandslash

1799.text: It is very wary and rarely shows itself to people. Its ears can hear a pin drop over half a mile away.
1799.name: clefable

1800.text: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
1800.name: vulpix

1801.text: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
1801.name: jigglypuff

1802.text: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
1802.name: wigglytuff

1803.text: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
1803.name: zubat

1804.text: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
1804.name: golbat

1805.text: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
1805.name: psyduck

1806.text: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.
1806.name: golduck

1807.text: A Pokmon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
1807.name: growlithe

1808.text: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
1808.name: arcanine

1809.text: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.
1809.name: magnemite

1810.text: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.
1810.name: magneton

1811.text: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.
1811.name: dewgong

1812.text: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moons X-rays. It appears among filth.
1812.name: grimer

1813.text: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.
1813.name: onix

1814.text: When it extends its over-six-foot- long tongue, its tail quivers. There is a possibility they are connected.
1814.name: lickitung

1815.text: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
1815.name: weezing

1816.text: The blue vines shrouding its body are covered in a growth of fine hair. It is known to be ticklish.
1816.name: tangela

1817.text: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.
1817.name: staryu

1818.text: It windmills its arms to slightly boost its punches. Foes have been known to escape in the meantime.
1818.name: electabuzz

1819.text: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly.
1819.name: magmar

1820.text: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokmon on its back. It understands human speech.
1820.name: lapras

1821.text: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.
1821.name: eevee

1822.text: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.
1822.name: crobat

1823.text: It is often seen when shooting stars fill the night skies. Its said to arrive riding on a shooting star.
1823.name: cleffa

1824.text: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.
1824.name: igglybuff

1825.text: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tails light.
1825.name: ampharos

1826.text: The oil-filled end of its tail floats on water. It keeps Marill from drowning even in a strong current.
1826.name: marill

1827.text: It can spend all day in water, since it can inhale and store a large volume of air.
1827.name: azumarill

1828.text: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. A year after a cold summer, their population explodes.
1828.name: sunkern

1829.text: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.
1829.name: yanma

1830.text: Its fur is so sensitive, it can sense minute shifts in the air and predict the weather.
1830.name: espeon

1831.text: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.
1831.name: shuckle

1832.text: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
1832.name: swinub

1833.text: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently cant live in polluted waters.
1833.name: corsola

1834.text: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the Remoraid is deep in the sea.
1834.name: remoraid

1835.text: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
1835.name: octillery

1836.text: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.
1836.name: elekid

1837.text: A Pokmon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.
1837.name: larvitar

1838.text: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
1838.name: slakoth

1839.text: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
1839.name: vigoroth

1840.text: The worlds laziest Pokmon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
1840.name: slaking

1841.text: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
1841.name: lairon

1842.text: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
1842.name: roselia

1843.text: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
1843.name: wailmer

1844.text: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
1844.name: camerupt

1845.text: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
1845.name: trapinch

1846.text: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
1846.name: vibrava

1847.text: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as The Desert Spirit.
1847.name: flygon

1848.text: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
1848.name: seviper

1849.text: A new Pokmon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
1849.name: solrock

1850.text: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
1850.name: castform

1851.text: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
1851.name: absol

1852.text: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
1852.name: spheal

1853.text: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
1853.name: sealeo

1854.text: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the suns warm touch.
1854.name: budew

1855.text: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
1855.name: roserade

1856.text: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
1856.name: vespiquen

1857.text: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
1857.name: drifblim

1858.text: There are researchers who believe this Pokmon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
1858.name: bronzor

1859.text: As soon as the tail claws close, its needle tips secrete poison. It can survive a year without food.
1859.name: skorupi

1860.text: Possessing a sturdy build, it takes pride in its strength, taking down foes without using toxins.
1860.name: drapion

1861.text: People organize tours to see this Pokmon frolic and skim the tops of waves with Remoraid.
1861.name: mantyke

1862.text: A group tried to use scientific means to make Magnezone evolve, but their efforts ended in failure.
1862.name: magnezone

1863.text: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
1863.name: lickilicky

1864.text: Its arms are made of plants that bind themselves to things. They grow back right away if cut.
1864.name: tangrowth

1865.text: Heedless of enemy attacks, it closes in, shoves its tails onto the foe, then looses high voltage.
1865.name: electivire

1866.text: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.
1866.name: magmortar

1867.text: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.
1867.name: leafeon

1868.text: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.
1868.name: victini

1869.text: They avoid attacks by sinking into the shadows of thick foliage. They retaliate with masterful whipping techniques.
1869.name: servine

1870.text: They raise their heads to intimidate opponents but only give it their all when fighting a powerful opponent.
1870.name: serperior

1871.text: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
1871.name: tepig

1872.text: Whatever it eats becomes fuel for the flame in its stomach. When it is angered, the intensity of the flame increases.
1872.name: pignite

1873.text: The scalchop on its stomach is made from the same elements as claws. It detaches the scalchop for use as a blade.
1873.name: oshawott

1874.text: Scalchop techniques differ from one Dewott to another. It never neglects maintaining its scalchops.
1874.name: dewott

1875.text: Part of the armor on its anterior legs becomes a giant sword. Its cry alone is enough to intimidate most enemies.
1875.name: samurott

1876.text: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. They feel insecure without a lookout.
1876.name: patrat

1877.text: They make the patterns on their bodies shine in order to threaten predators. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.
1877.name: watchog

1878.text: It loyally follows its Trainers orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokmon.
1878.name: herdier

1879.text: This extremely wise Pokmon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.
1879.name: stoutland

1880.text: It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.
1880.name: panpour

1881.text: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.
1881.name: musharna

1882.text: This ill-tempered Pokmon is dangerous because when its angry, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
1882.name: zebstrika

1883.text: The solar energy absorbed by its bodys orange crystals is magnified internally and fired from its mouth.
1883.name: gigalith

1884.text: Suction from its nostrils enables it to stick to cave walls during sleep. It leaves a heart-shaped mark behind.
1884.name: woobat

1885.text: Its auditory sense is astounding. It has a radarlike ability to understand its surroundings through slight sounds.
1885.name: audino

1886.text: They use concrete pillars as walking canes. They know moves that enable them to swing the pillars freely in battle.
1886.name: conkeldurr

1887.text: When they encounter foes bigger than themselves, they try to throw them. They always travel in packs of five.
1887.name: throh

1888.text: Highly aggressive, it uses the claws near its neck to dig into its opponents and poison them.
1888.name: scolipede

1889.text: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.
1889.name: cottonee

1890.text: Riding whirlwinds, they appear. These Pokmon sneak through gaps into houses and cause all sorts of mischief.
1890.name: whimsicott

1891.text: It can expand the focus of its eyes, enabling it to see objects in the far distance as if it were using binoculars.
1891.name: krookodile

1892.text: When weakened in battle, it transforms into a stone statue. Then it sharpens its mind and fights on mentally.
1892.name: darmanitan

1893.text: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
1893.name: scraggy

1894.text: They pretend to be elaborate coffins to teach lessons to grave robbers. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
1894.name: cofagrigus

1895.text: Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.
1895.name: carracosta

1896.text: It runs better than it flies. It catches prey by running at speeds comparable to those of an automobile.
1896.name: archeops

1897.text: They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot a poisonous liquid from their right-hand fingertips.
1897.name: garbodor

1898.text: These remarkably intelligent Pokmon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.
1898.name: reuniclus

1899.text: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.
1899.name: swanna

1900.text: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
1900.name: vanillish

1901.text: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.
1901.name: sawsbuck

1902.text: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokmon targets Shelmet.
1902.name: karrablast

1903.text: For some reason, this Pokmon resembles a Pok Ball. They release poison spores to repel those who try to catch them.
1903.name: foongus

1904.text: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.
1904.name: jellicent

1905.text: They stick their spikes into cave walls and absorb the minerals they find in the rock.
1905.name: ferroseed

1906.text: Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears dont return.
1906.name: klang

1907.text: This Pokmon had never been seen until it appeared from far in the desert 50 years ago.
1907.name: elgyem

1908.text: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise.
1908.name: mienfoo

1909.text: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.
1909.name: mienshao

1910.text: They fight at Bisharps command. They cling to their prey and inflict damage by sinking their blades into it.
1910.name: pawniard

1911.text: Durant dig nests in mountains. They build their complicated, interconnected tunnels into mazes.
1911.name: durant

1912.text: Since their two heads do not get along and compete with each other for food, they always eat too much.
1912.name: zweilous

1913.text: This Pokmon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
1913.name: zekrom

1914.text: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.
1914.name: landorus

1915.text: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.
1915.name: kyurem

1916.text: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
1916.name: meloetta

1917.text: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.
1917.name: charmander

1918.text: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
1918.name: charmeleon

1919.text: It is said that Charizards fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
1919.name: charizard

1920.text: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
1920.name: caterpie

1921.text: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
1921.name: weedle

1922.text: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
1922.name: beedrill

1923.text: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
1923.name: pidgeotto

1924.text: By flapping its wings with all its might, Pidgeot can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
1924.name: pidgeot

1925.text: It searches for food all day. It gnaws on hard objects to wear down its fangs, which grow constantly during its lifetime.
1925.name: rattata

1926.text: With its long fangs, this surprisingly violent Pokmon can gnaw away even thick concrete with ease.
1926.name: raticate

1927.text: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
1927.name: spearow

1928.text: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
1928.name: ekans

1929.text: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
1929.name: arbok

1930.text: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
1930.name: pikachu

1931.text: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
1931.name: nidoranf

1932.text: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than Nidorinos.
1932.name: nidorina

1933.text: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.
1933.name: nidoqueen

1934.text: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
1934.name: nidorino

1935.text: Each of its nine tails is imbued with supernatural power, and it can live for a thousand years.
1935.name: ninetales

1936.text: Looking into its cute, round eyes makes it start singing a song so pleasant listeners cant help but fall asleep.
1936.name: jigglypuff

1937.text: Its fine fur feels so pleasant, those who accidentally touch it cannot take their hands away.
1937.name: wigglytuff

1938.text: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.
1938.name: zubat

1939.text: Flitting around in the dead of night, it sinks its fangs into its prey and drains a nearly fatal amount of blood.
1939.name: golbat

1940.text: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.
1940.name: oddish

1941.text: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.
1941.name: vileplume

1942.text: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.
1942.name: paras

1943.text: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.
1943.name: venomoth

1944.text: A Pokmon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
1944.name: diglett

1945.text: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
1945.name: dugtrio

1946.text: A very haughty Pokmon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
1946.name: persian

1947.text: When headaches stimulate its brain cells, which are usually inactive, it can use a mysterious power.
1947.name: psyduck

1948.text: When its forehead shines mysteriously, Golduck can use the full extent of its power.
1948.name: golduck

1949.text: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.
1949.name: primeape

1950.text: Extremely loyal to its Trainer, it will bark at those who approach the Trainer unexpectedly and run them out of town.
1950.name: growlithe

1951.text: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.
1951.name: poliwag

1952.text: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.
1952.name: poliwhirl

1953.text: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.
1953.name: abra

1954.text: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.
1954.name: kadabra

1955.text: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.
1955.name: alakazam

1956.text: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of Geodude at once.
1956.name: machop

1957.text: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
1957.name: machoke

1958.text: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
1958.name: machamp

1959.text: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.
1959.name: bellsprout

1960.text: A Pokmon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.
1960.name: weepinbell

1961.text: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honey-like scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.
1961.name: victreebel

1962.text: Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.
1962.name: tentacool

1963.text: It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.
1963.name: tentacruel

1964.text: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokmon can stop it without difficulty.
1964.name: graveler

1965.text: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
1965.name: rapidash

1966.text: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.
1966.name: slowpoke

1967.text: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.
1967.name: slowbro

1968.text: The stronger electromagnetic waves from the three linked Magnemite are enough to dry out surrounding moisture.
1968.name: magneton

1969.text: It cant live without the stalk it holds. Thats why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
1969.name: farfetchd

1970.text: When Doduo evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.
1970.name: dodrio

1971.text: Its streamlined body has low resistance, and it swims around cold oceans at a speed of eight knots.
1971.name: dewgong

1972.text: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.
1972.name: shellder

1973.text: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.
1973.name: cloyster

1974.text: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
1974.name: gengar

1975.text: Opening its large mouth, it ingests massive amounts of soil and creates long tunnels.
1975.name: onix

1976.text: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
1976.name: drowzee

1977.text: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.
1977.name: krabby

1978.text: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
1978.name: kingler

1979.text: It looks just like a Pok Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on contact.
1979.name: voltorb

1980.text: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
1980.name: electrode

1981.text: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.
1981.name: cubone

1982.text: From its birth, this savage Pokmon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
1982.name: marowak

1983.text: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.
1983.name: hitmonlee

1984.text: Being licked by its long, saliva-covered tongue leaves a tingling sensation. Extending its tongue retracts its tail.
1984.name: lickitung

1985.text: Inhaling toxic fumes from trash and mixing them inside its body lets it spread an even fouler stench.
1985.name: weezing

1986.text: Its powerful tackles can destroy anything. However, it is too slow witted to help people work.
1986.name: rhyhorn

1987.text: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
1987.name: rhydon

1988.text: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional-medicine ingredients.
1988.name: seadra

1989.text: Though it appears very elegant when swimming with fins unfurled, it can jab powerfully with its horn.
1989.name: goldeen

1990.text: As long as its red core remains, it can regenerate its body instantly, even if its torn apart.
1990.name: staryu

1991.text: Its core shines in many colors and sends radio signals into space to communicate with something.
1991.name: starmie

1992.text: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.
1992.name: mrmime

1993.text: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.
1993.name: jynx

1994.text: The scorching fire exhaled by Magmar forms heat waves around its body, making it hard to see the Pokmon clearly.
1994.name: magmar

1995.text: It grips prey with its powerful pincers and will not let go until the prey is torn in half.
1995.name: pinsir

1996.text: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
1996.name: tauros

1997.text: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.
1997.name: magikarp

1998.text: By storing electricity in its body, it can shoot its bristlelike fur like a barrage of missiles.
1998.name: jolteon

1999.text: A man-made Pokmon created using advanced scientific means. It can move freely in cyberspace.
1999.name: porygon

2000.text: A Pokmon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.
2000.name: omanyte

2001.text: It is thought that this Pokmon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.
2001.name: omastar

2002.text: It is thought that this Pokmon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.
2002.name: kabutops

2003.text: A Pokmon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
2003.name: aerodactyl

2004.text: When its belly is full, it becomes too lethargic to even lift a finger, so it is safe to bounce on its belly.
2004.name: snorlax

2005.text: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.
2005.name: dragonair

2006.text: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.
2006.name: meganium

2007.text: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.
2007.name: quilava

2008.text: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
2008.name: typhlosion

2009.text: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.
2009.name: totodile

2010.text: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.
2010.name: sentret

2011.text: It marks time precisely. Some countries consider it to be a wise friend, versed in the worlds ways.
2011.name: hoothoot
