2012.text: It is so timid, it cant move if it isnt with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.
2012.name: ledyba

2013.text: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.
2013.name: ledian

2014.text: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.
2014.name: spinarak

2015.text: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.
2015.name: chinchou

2016.text: It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.
2016.name: togepi

2017.text: To share its happiness, it flies around the world seeking kind- hearted people.
2017.name: togetic

2018.text: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.
2018.name: natu

2019.text: When cold weather increases static electricity, its wool doubles in size and the tip of its tail glows slightly.
2019.name: mareep

2020.text: Not even downy wool will grow on its rubbery, nonconductive patches of skin that prevent electrical shock.
2020.name: flaaffy

2021.text: The tip of its tail shines so brightly it can be used to send sea-navigation beacons to distant foreign shores.
2021.name: ampharos

2022.text: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.
2022.name: politoed

2023.text: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.
2023.name: skiploom

2024.text: It lives high among the treetops. It can use its tail as freely and cleverly as its hands.
2024.name: aipom

2025.text: By flapping its wings at high speed, it can fly freely through the air. Even sudden stops are no problem.
2025.name: yanma

2026.text: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
2026.name: slowking

2027.text: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
2027.name: unown

2028.text: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.
2028.name: wobbuffet

2029.text: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.
2029.name: girafarig

2030.text: It clamps on to its chosen prey then jabs the stinger on its tail into the prey while its stunned with surprise.
2030.name: gligar

2031.text: The iron it ingested with the soil it swallowed transformed its body and made it harder than diamonds.
2031.name: steelix

2032.text: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
2032.name: qwilfish

2033.text: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.
2033.name: scizor

2034.text: No matter how heavy its opponents, it flings them far away with its prized horn.
2034.name: heracross

2035.text: A smart and sneaky Pokmon, it makes its opponents flinch by suddenly showing the claws hidden in its paws.
2035.name: sneasel

2036.text: It lets honey soak into its paws so it can lick them all the time. Every set of paws tastes unique.
2036.name: teddiursa

2037.text: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.
2037.name: ursaring

2038.text: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.
2038.name: magcargo

2039.text: Rooting the tip of its snout into the ground, it searches for food. Sometimes it even digs up a hot spring.
2039.name: swinub

2040.text: With its excellent sense of smell, its even able to find mushrooms that are buried under frozen ground.
2040.name: piloswine

2041.text: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.
2041.name: kingdra

2042.text: It attacks by curling up then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
2042.name: donphan

2043.text: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
2043.name: porygon2

2044.text: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.
2044.name: tyrogue

2045.text: It is said that kids who drink Miltanks milk grow up to become hearty, healthy adults.
2045.name: miltank

2046.text: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.
2046.name: raikou

2047.text: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.
2047.name: hooh

2048.text: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
2048.name: treecko

2049.text: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
2049.name: blaziken

2050.text: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
2050.name: mightyena

2051.text: Often targeted by bird Pokmon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
2051.name: wurmple

2052.text: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
2052.name: beautifly

2053.text: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
2053.name: dustox

2054.text: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
2054.name: swellow

2055.text: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
2055.name: nincada

2056.text: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
2056.name: whismur

2057.text: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
2057.name: makuhita

2058.text: The reason it does not have a nest is that it simply searches for a clean, comfortable place then sleeps there.
2058.name: delcatty

2059.text: In order to build up its steel body, it eats iron ore. This pesky Pokmon is known to eat railroad tracks.
2059.name: aron

2060.text: Lairon fight over territory, and when their steel bodies collide, sparks fly.
2060.name: lairon

2061.text: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
2061.name: medicham

2062.text: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
2062.name: gulpin

2063.text: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
2063.name: carvanha

2064.text: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
2064.name: cacnea

2065.text: Discovered in ancient ruins, it moves by spinning around and forms a group when it finds others.
2065.name: baltoy

2066.text: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
2066.name: armaldo

2067.text: Temperature and weather affect its cellular structure, so this Pokmon changes form according to the weather.
2067.name: castform

2068.text: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
2068.name: duskull

2069.text: It appears from deep in the mountains to warn people about upcoming disasters it has sensed with its horn.
2069.name: absol

2070.text: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.
2070.name: walrein

2071.text: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
2071.name: clamperl

2072.text: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
2072.name: salamence

2073.text: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.
2073.name: beldum

2074.text: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
2074.name: latias

2075.text: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
2075.name: groudon

2076.text: A comparison revealed that Bidoofs front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattatas.
2076.name: bidoof

2077.text: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
2077.name: bibarel

2078.text: Sensitive to changing temperatures, the bud blooms when its warm, releasing toxic pollen.
2078.name: budew

2079.text: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
2079.name: burmy

2080.text: When evolving, its body takes in surrounding materials. As a result, there are many body variations.
2080.name: wormadam

2081.text: While it loves floral honey, it wont gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
2081.name: mothim

2082.text: This Pokmon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
2082.name: combee

2083.text: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
2083.name: floatzel

2084.text: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
2084.name: cherubi

2085.text: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
2085.name: gastrodon

2086.text: By extending its rolled-up ears and striking the ground, it can bound so high it surprises itself.
2086.name: buneary

2087.text: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isnt fed.
2087.name: glameow

2088.text: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.
2088.name: purugly

2089.text: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.
2089.name: mimejr

2090.text: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others feet and cause them to stumble.
2090.name: happiny

2091.text: Its tongue is just like a humans. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.
2091.name: chatot

2092.text: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.
2092.name: gible

2093.text: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
2093.name: munchlax

2094.text: It lives in arid regions and can go without food for a year while waiting for prey.
2094.name: skorupi

2095.text: The croaking that Toxicroak produces before a battle is for churning the poison it has stored in its poison sac.
2095.name: toxicroak

2096.text: Using its tentacles to lash itself to trees, it lies in wait for prey, luring it close with sweet-smelling drool.
2096.name: carnivine

2097.text: It crawls along the seafloor using its long front fins like legs. It competes for food with Lanturn.
2097.name: lumineon

2098.text: They communicate by clawing signs in boulders and work together to surround enemies.
2098.name: weavile

2099.text: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.
2099.name: rhyperior

2100.text: Even if one of its arms is eaten, its fine. The Pokmon regenerates quickly and will go right back to normal.
2100.name: tangrowth

2101.text: The instant it presses the tips of its tails onto an opponent, it sends over 20,000 volts of electricity into the foe.
2101.name: electivire

2102.text: With cells similar to those of plants, it performs photosynthesis inside its body and creates pure air.
2102.name: leafeon

2103.text: It dances silently through the sky. When it approaches prey, it can land a critical hit in an instant.
2103.name: gliscor

2104.text: When the temperature rose at the end of the ice age, most Mamoswine disappeared.
2104.name: mamoswine

2105.text: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.
2105.name: porygonz

2106.text: When Uxie flew, people gained the ability to solve problems. It was the birth of knowledge.
2106.name: uxie

2107.text: When Mesprit flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.
2107.name: mesprit

2108.text: When Azelf flew, people gained the determination to do things. It was the birth of willpower.
2108.name: azelf

2109.text: A legendary Pokmon of Sinnoh. It is said that time flows when Dialgas heart beats.
2109.name: dialga

2110.text: A legendary Pokmon of Sinnoh. It is said that space becomes more stable with Palkias every breath.
2110.name: palkia

2111.text: Its body is made of rugged steel. However, it is partially melted in spots because of its own heat.
2111.name: heatran

2112.text: On nights around the quarter moon, the aurora from its tail extends and undulates beautifully.
2112.name: cresselia

2113.text: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.
2113.name: darkrai

2114.text: The flowers all over its body burst into bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude.
2114.name: shaymin

2115.text: It is said to have emerged from an egg in a place where there was nothing then shaped the world.
2115.name: arceus

2116.text: A flaring beard of fire is proof that it is fired up. It is adept at using many different moves.
2116.name: emboar

2117.text: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.
2117.name: purrloin

2118.text: It strikes its enemies with a thorn-covered tail. The leaf on its head is bitter.
2118.name: simisage

2119.text: The hexagonal-shaped hole is its ear. It has a tendency to walk in the direction the sound is coming from.
2119.name: roggenrola

2120.text: By putting power into its bumps, it creates vibrations and increases the power of its punches.
2120.name: seismitoad

2121.text: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.
2121.name: swadloon

2122.text: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its preys location and state.
2122.name: venipede

2123.text: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But, when predators approach, it moves to stab them with poison spikes.
2123.name: whirlipede

2124.text: When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokmon flee.
2124.name: maractus

2125.text: When its boulder is broken in battles for territory, it feels unsure and begins to weaken.
2125.name: crustle

2126.text: It was revived from an ancient fossil. Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and hopped from one branch to another.
2126.name: archen

2127.text: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
2127.name: trubbish

2128.text: It stares intently at everything. It can become so obsessed with watching that it doesnt notice attacks.
2128.name: gothita

2129.text: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainers life span, it cries in sadness.
2129.name: gothitelle

2130.text: Theoretically, this Pokmon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58 F.
2130.name: vanillite

2131.text: It glides on its outstretched membrane while shocking foes with the electricity stored in the pouches on its cheeks.
2131.name: emolga

2132.text: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.
2132.name: amoonguss

2133.text: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.
2133.name: galvantula

2134.text: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.
2134.name: klink

2135.text: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.
2135.name: klinklang

2136.text: Its large tusks have a tendency to break, but each time they grow back, they grow in harder and sturdier.
2136.name: axew

2137.text: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.
2137.name: haxorus

2138.text: When its body dries out, it weakens. So it wraps a membrane around itself for protection while it spits poison.
2138.name: accelgor

2139.text: When its opponent cant be paralyzed, it contorts itself with unexpected speed and flops away.
2139.name: stunfisk

2140.text: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
2140.name: druddigon

2141.text: They are known to charge so wildly that if a train were to enter their territory, they would send it flying.
2141.name: bouffalant

2142.text: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
2142.name: rufflet

2143.text: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokmon from freezing.
2143.name: volcarona

2144.text: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.
2144.name: tornadus

2145.text: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
2145.name: charizard

2146.text: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
2146.name: metapod

2147.text: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
2147.name: butterfree

2148.text: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
2148.name: pidgey

2149.text: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.
2149.name: pidgeotto

2150.text: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
2150.name: pidgeot

2151.text: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
2151.name: rattata

2152.text: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
2152.name: raticate

2153.text: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
2153.name: spearow

2154.text: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
2154.name: fearow

2155.text: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
2155.name: pikachu

2156.text: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
2156.name: sandshrew

2157.text: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
2157.name: sandslash

2158.text: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokmon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
2158.name: nidoranf

2159.text: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
2159.name: nidorina

2160.text: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
2160.name: nidoqueen

2161.text: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
2161.name: nidoranm

2162.text: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
2162.name: nidorino

2163.text: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.
2163.name: nidoking

2164.text: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
2164.name: clefable

2165.text: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
2165.name: vulpix

2166.text: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
2166.name: jigglypuff

2167.text: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they wont want to be separated.
2167.name: wigglytuff

2168.text: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
2168.name: zubat

2169.text: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
2169.name: golbat

2170.text: Growing out of the bugs back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
2170.name: paras

2171.text: A mushroom grown larger than the hosts body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
2171.name: parasect

2172.text: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
2172.name: venonat

2173.text: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.
2173.name: venomoth

2174.text: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
2174.name: meowth

2175.text: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
2175.name: golduck

2176.text: Its unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and cant distinguish friends from foes.
2176.name: mankey

2177.text: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.
2177.name: poliwag

2178.text: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
2178.name: poliwhirl

2179.text: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
2179.name: poliwrath

2180.text: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.
2180.name: kadabra

2181.text: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
2181.name: machop

2182.text: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
2182.name: machamp

2183.text: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
2183.name: victreebel

2184.text: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.
2184.name: tentacool

2185.text: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
2185.name: tentacruel

2186.text: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
2186.name: geodude

2187.text: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesnt mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
2187.name: graveler

2188.text: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.
2188.name: golem

2189.text: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
2189.name: ponyta

2190.text: Very competitive, this Pokmon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
2190.name: rapidash

2191.text: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.
2191.name: magnemite

2192.text: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
2192.name: magneton

2193.text: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
2193.name: farfetchd

2194.text: A two-headed Pokmon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.
2194.name: doduo

2195.text: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.
2195.name: dodrio

2196.text: A Pokmon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
2196.name: seel

2197.text: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.
2197.name: dewgong

2198.text: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.
2198.name: grimer

2199.text: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.
2199.name: muk

2200.text: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
2200.name: drowzee

2201.text: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
2201.name: hypno

2202.text: It was discovered when Pok Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
2202.name: voltorb

2203.text: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
2203.name: exeggcute

2204.text: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
2204.name: exeggutor

2205.text: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
2205.name: cubone

2206.text: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
2206.name: marowak

2207.text: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
2207.name: hitmonchan

2208.text: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
2208.name: lickitung

2209.text: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.
2209.name: koffing

2210.text: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
2210.name: weezing

2211.text: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.
2211.name: chansey

2212.text: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole life long.
2212.name: tangela

2213.text: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
2213.name: horsea

2214.text: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.
2214.name: seadra

2215.text: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.
2215.name: goldeen

2216.text: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
2216.name: seaking

2217.text: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
2217.name: starmie

2218.text: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.
2218.name: mrmime

2219.text: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
2219.name: jynx

2220.text: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.
2220.name: electabuzz

2221.text: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it cant tear, it tosses far.
2221.name: pinsir

2222.text: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.
2222.name: tauros

2223.text: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
2223.name: lapras

2224.text: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
2224.name: ditto

2225.text: A rare Pokmon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
2225.name: eevee

2226.text: It prefers beautiful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.
2226.name: vaporeon

2227.text: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on end if it becomes charged with electricity.
2227.name: jolteon

2228.text: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
2228.name: flareon

2229.text: A man-made Pokmon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.
2229.name: porygon

2230.text: A prehistoric Pokmon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.
2230.name: omanyte

2231.text: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.
2231.name: omastar

2232.text: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
2232.name: kabuto

2233.text: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.
2233.name: kabutops

2234.text: A legendary bird Pokmon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
2234.name: articuno

2235.text: A legendary bird Pokmon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
2235.name: zapdos

2236.text: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokmon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
2236.name: moltres

2237.text: It is called the Mirage Pokmon because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
2237.name: dratini

2238.text: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokmon.
2238.name: mew

2239.text: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.
2239.name: bayleef

2240.text: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
2240.name: cyndaquil

2241.text: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
2241.name: sentret

2242.text: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
2242.name: furret

2243.text: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.
2243.name: hoothoot

2244.text: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
2244.name: ledyba

2245.text: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
2245.name: ledian

2246.text: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
2246.name: crobat

2247.text: Lanturns light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed The Deep-Sea Star.
2247.name: lanturn

2248.text: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
2248.name: pichu

2249.text: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
2249.name: igglybuff

2250.text: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
2250.name: xatu

2251.text: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.
2251.name: flaaffy

2252.text: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.
2252.name: azumarill

2253.text: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
2253.name: politoed

2254.text: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.
2254.name: hoppip

2255.text: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
2255.name: skiploom

2256.text: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
2256.name: jumpluff

2257.text: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.
2257.name: sunkern

2258.text: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this Pokmons face become more vivid and lively.
2258.name: sunflora

2259.text: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It wont miss prey--even those behind it.
2259.name: yanma

2260.text: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the rivers bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
2260.name: quagsire

2261.text: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one anothers stashes.
2261.name: murkrow

2262.text: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.
2262.name: misdreavus

2263.text: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
2263.name: unown

2264.text: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesnt need to sleep.
2264.name: girafarig

2265.text: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
2265.name: forretress

2266.text: When spotted, this Pokmon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
2266.name: dunsparce

2267.text: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
2267.name: gligar

2268.text: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
2268.name: steelix

2269.text: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
2269.name: snubbull

2270.text: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
2270.name: granbull

2271.text: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
2271.name: qwilfish

2272.text: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
2272.name: sneasel

2273.text: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because theyre soaked with honey.
2273.name: teddiursa

2274.text: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
2274.name: ursaring

2275.text: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
2275.name: slugma

2276.text: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
2276.name: magcargo

2277.text: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
2277.name: corsola

2278.text: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
2278.name: remoraid

2279.text: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.
2279.name: mantine

2280.text: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
2280.name: skarmory

2281.text: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
2281.name: houndoom

2282.text: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
2282.name: kingdra

2283.text: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
2283.name: phanpy

2284.text: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
2284.name: donphan

2285.text: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
2285.name: porygon2

2286.text: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
2286.name: stantler

2287.text: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
2287.name: smeargle

2288.text: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
2288.name: hitmontop

2289.text: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
2289.name: smoochum

2290.text: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it cant store the energy it makes.
2290.name: elekid

2291.text: Its small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
2291.name: magby

2292.text: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
2292.name: miltank

2293.text: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
2293.name: raikou

2294.text: A Pokmon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
2294.name: entei

2295.text: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
2295.name: suicune

2296.text: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
2296.name: lugia

2297.text: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
2297.name: hooh

2298.text: This Pokmon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
2298.name: celebi

2299.text: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next days weather.
2299.name: treecko

2300.text: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
2300.name: sceptile

2301.text: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
2301.name: torchic

2302.text: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
2302.name: combusken

2303.text: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
2303.name: mudkip

2304.text: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
2304.name: marshtomp

2305.text: A Pokmon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
2305.name: poochyena

2306.text: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
2306.name: mightyena

2307.text: It walks in zigzag fashion. Its good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
2307.name: zigzagoon

2308.text: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
2308.name: linoone

2309.text: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
2309.name: wurmple

2310.text: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
2310.name: silcoon

2311.text: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
2311.name: beautifly

2312.text: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
2312.name: cascoon

2313.text: A nocturnal Pokmon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
2313.name: dustox

2314.text: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokmon that cant swim.
2314.name: lotad

2315.text: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It cant help breaking out into a dance.
2315.name: ludicolo

2316.text: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
2316.name: nuzleaf

2317.text: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
2317.name: taillow

2318.text: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
2318.name: swellow

2319.text: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
2319.name: wingull

2320.text: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
2320.name: pelipper

2321.text: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
2321.name: masquerain

2322.text: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
2322.name: breloom

2323.text: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it cant sit still for one second.
2323.name: vigoroth

2324.text: The worlds laziest Pokmon. It moves to another spot when theres no food left within its reach.
2324.name: slaking

2325.text: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal ones spirit.
2325.name: shedinja

2326.text: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
2326.name: whismur

2327.text: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
2327.name: loudred

2328.text: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
2328.name: exploud

2329.text: A Pokmon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
2329.name: azurill

2330.text: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
2330.name: nosepass

2331.text: It cant stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
2331.name: skitty

2332.text: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
2332.name: delcatty

2333.text: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
2333.name: aron

2334.text: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
2334.name: meditite

2335.text: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
2335.name: electrike

2336.text: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
2336.name: plusle

2337.text: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumises sweet aroma.
2337.name: volbeat

2338.text: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
2338.name: illumise

2339.text: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
2339.name: swalot

2340.text: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
2340.name: carvanha

2341.text: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as The Bully of the Sea.
2341.name: sharpedo

2342.text: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
2342.name: wailmer

2343.text: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
2343.name: numel

2344.text: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
2344.name: spoink

2345.text: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
2345.name: spinda

2346.text: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
2346.name: trapinch

2347.text: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
2347.name: flygon

2348.text: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the days desert heat.
2348.name: cacturne

2349.text: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
2349.name: zangoose

2350.text: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
2350.name: seviper

2351.text: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
2351.name: lunatone

2352.text: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
2352.name: barboach

2353.text: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokmon from its pond.
2353.name: crawdaunt

2354.text: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokmon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
2354.name: claydol

2355.text: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
2355.name: lileep

2356.text: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
2356.name: cradily

2357.text: It is a kind of Pokmon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
2357.name: anorith

2358.text: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
2358.name: armaldo

2359.text: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
2359.name: feebas

2360.text: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
2360.name: milotic

2361.text: This Pokmon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
2361.name: castform

2362.text: It can freely change its bodys color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesnt change, however.
2362.name: kecleon

2363.text: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
2363.name: duskull

2364.text: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
2364.name: dusclops

2365.text: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
2365.name: tropius

2366.text: They cant swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When theyre happy, they clap fins.
2366.name: spheal

2367.text: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
2367.name: sealeo

2368.text: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when its held.
2368.name: clamperl

2369.text: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
2369.name: huntail

2370.text: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
2370.name: gorebyss

2371.text: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
2371.name: relicanth

2372.text: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokmon will be blessed with eternal love.
2372.name: luvdisc

2373.text: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
2373.name: shelgon

2374.text: With four linked brains, its more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
2374.name: metagross

2375.text: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
2375.name: regirock

2376.text: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body cant be melted, even by magma.
2376.name: regice

2377.text: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
2377.name: registeel

2378.text: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
2378.name: latias

2379.text: A highly intelligent Pokmon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
2379.name: latios

2380.text: A mythical Pokmon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.
2380.name: kyogre

2381.text: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.
2381.name: groudon

2382.text: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
2382.name: rayquaza

2383.text: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
2383.name: jirachi

2384.text: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokmon.
2384.name: deoxys

2385.text: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
2385.name: turtwig

2386.text: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
2386.name: grotle

2387.text: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain cant extinguish the fire.
2387.name: chimchar

2388.text: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
2388.name: infernape

2389.text: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
2389.name: prinplup

2390.text: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
2390.name: empoleon

2391.text: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
2391.name: starly

2392.text: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokmon.
2392.name: staraptor

2393.text: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
2393.name: bidoof

2394.text: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
2394.name: bibarel

2395.text: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
2395.name: kricketot

2396.text: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
2396.name: kricketune

2397.text: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
2397.name: luxio

2398.text: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.
2398.name: luxray

2399.text: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
2399.name: cranidos

2400.text: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
2400.name: rampardos

2401.text: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
2401.name: shieldon

2402.text: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
2402.name: bastiodon

2403.text: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
2403.name: burmy

2404.text: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
2404.name: wormadam

2405.text: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
2405.name: mothim

2406.text: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
2406.name: pachirisu

2407.text: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
2407.name: buizel

2408.text: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
2408.name: floatzel

2409.text: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
2409.name: cherubi

2410.text: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
2410.name: cherrim

2411.text: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
2411.name: shellos

2412.text: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
2412.name: gastrodon

2413.text: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
2413.name: ambipom

2414.text: A Pokmon formed by the spirits of people and Pokmon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
2414.name: drifloon

2415.text: It carries people and Pokmon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
2415.name: drifblim

2416.text: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
2416.name: buneary

2417.text: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
2417.name: lopunny

2418.text: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
2418.name: mismagius

2419.text: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called Summoner of Night.
2419.name: honchkrow

2420.text: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
2420.name: glameow

2421.text: It would claim another Pokmons nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
2421.name: purugly

2422.text: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
2422.name: chingling

2423.text: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
2423.name: skuntank

2424.text: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its bodys fluid levels.
2424.name: bonsly

2425.text: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemys movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
2425.name: mimejr

2426.text: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
2426.name: happiny

2427.text: It mimics the cries of other Pokmon to trick them into thinking its one of them. This way they wont attack it.
2427.name: chatot

2428.text: A Pokmon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
2428.name: spiritomb

2429.text: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
2429.name: garchomp

2430.text: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
2430.name: munchlax

2431.text: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
2431.name: riolu

2432.text: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
2432.name: lucario

2433.text: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
2433.name: hippopotas

2434.text: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
2434.name: skorupi

2435.text: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
2435.name: drapion

2436.text: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
2436.name: croagunk

2437.text: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
2437.name: carnivine

2438.text: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
2438.name: lumineon

2439.text: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
2439.name: mantyke

2440.text: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
2440.name: weavile

2441.text: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
2441.name: magnezone

2442.text: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
2442.name: lickilicky

2443.text: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
2443.name: rhyperior

2444.text: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
2444.name: tangrowth

2445.text: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
2445.name: electivire

2446.text: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
2446.name: magmortar

2447.text: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
2447.name: togekiss

2448.text: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
2448.name: yanmega

2449.text: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
2449.name: gliscor

2450.text: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokmon. It began acting oddly, however.
2450.name: porygonz

2451.text: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
2451.name: probopass

2452.text: Known as The Being of Knowledge. It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.
2452.name: uxie

2453.text: Known as The Being of Emotion. It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
2453.name: mesprit

2454.text: Known as The Being of Willpower. It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
2454.name: azelf

2455.text: A Pokmon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
2455.name: dialga

2456.text: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.
2456.name: palkia

2457.text: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
2457.name: heatran

2458.text: It is said to have made Pokmon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
2458.name: regigigas

2459.text: This Pokmon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
2459.name: giratina

2460.text: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
2460.name: cresselia

2461.text: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
2461.name: phione

2462.text: It chases people and Pokmon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
2462.name: darkrai

2463.text: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
2463.name: shaymin

2464.text: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokmon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
2464.name: arceus

2465.text: This Pokmon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
2465.name: victini

2466.text: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
2466.name: snivy

2467.text: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
2467.name: servine

2468.text: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperiors noble eyes.
2468.name: serperior

2469.text: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
2469.name: emboar

2470.text: The scalchop on its stomach isnt just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
2470.name: oshawott

2471.text: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.
2471.name: dewott

2472.text: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
2472.name: samurott

2473.text: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
2473.name: lillipup

2474.text: This very loyal Pokmon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokmon.
2474.name: herdier

2475.text: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
2475.name: stoutland

2476.text: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
2476.name: purrloin

2477.text: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
2477.name: liepard

2478.text: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokmon is wild tempered.
2478.name: simisage

2479.text: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
2479.name: simisear

2480.text: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
2480.name: simipour

2481.text: This Pokmon appears before people and Pokmon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
2481.name: munna

2482.text: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokmon.
2482.name: musharna

2483.text: This very forgetful Pokmon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
2483.name: pidove

2484.text: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
2484.name: tranquill

2485.text: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females flying abilities surpass those of the males.
2485.name: unfezant

2486.text: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
2486.name: blitzle

2487.text: When this ill-tempered Pokmon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
2487.name: zebstrika

2488.text: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
2488.name: roggenrola

2489.text: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
2489.name: boldore

2490.text: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
2490.name: gigalith

2491.text: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
2491.name: woobat

2492.text: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
2492.name: swoobat

2493.text: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
2493.name: excadrill

2494.text: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
2494.name: audino

2495.text: These Pokmon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
2495.name: timburr

2496.text: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
2496.name: gurdurr

2497.text: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
2497.name: tympole

2498.text: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
2498.name: palpitoad

2499.text: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
2499.name: seismitoad

2500.text: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
2500.name: throh

2501.text: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
2501.name: sawk

2502.text: This Pokmon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
2502.name: sewaddle

2503.text: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
2503.name: swadloon

2504.text: Upon finding a small Pokmon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
2504.name: leavanny

2505.text: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
2505.name: venipede

2506.text: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
2506.name: whimsicott

2507.text: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
2507.name: petilil

2508.text: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
2508.name: lilligant

2509.text: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
2509.name: basculin

2510.text: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
2510.name: krokorok

2511.text: Very violent Pokmon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
2511.name: krookodile

2512.text: Darumakas droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
2512.name: darumaka

2513.text: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
2513.name: darmanitan

2514.text: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokmon that prey on its flower seeds.
2514.name: maractus

2515.text: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokmon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
2515.name: dwebble

2516.text: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
2516.name: crustle

2517.text: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
2517.name: sigilyph

2518.text: These Pokmon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
2518.name: yamask

2519.text: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
2519.name: cofagrigus

2520.text: About 100 million years ago, these Pokmon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
2520.name: tirtouga

2521.text: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
2521.name: carracosta

2522.text: Revived from a fossil, this Pokmon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokmon.
2522.name: archen

2523.text: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
2523.name: archeops

2524.text: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
2524.name: garbodor

2525.text: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
2525.name: zorua

2526.text: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
2526.name: minccino

2527.text: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
2527.name: cinccino

2528.text: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
2528.name: gothita

2529.text: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
2529.name: gothorita

2530.text: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
2530.name: gothitelle

2531.text: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
2531.name: solosis

2532.text: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
2532.name: ducklett

2533.text: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
2533.name: swanna

2534.text: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
2534.name: deerling

2535.text: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbucks horns.
2535.name: sawsbuck

2536.text: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
2536.name: emolga

2537.text: These mysterious Pokmon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
2537.name: karrablast

2538.text: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
2538.name: escavalier

2539.text: It lures people in with its Pok Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Pok Ball is unknown.
2539.name: foongus

2540.text: They show off their Pok Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokmon are fooled by this.
2540.name: amoonguss

2541.text: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
2541.name: frillish

2542.text: Its body is mostly seawater. Its said theres a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
2542.name: jellicent

2543.text: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokmon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
2543.name: alomomola

2544.text: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
2544.name: ferroseed

2545.text: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
2545.name: ferrothorn

2546.text: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
2546.name: klink

2547.text: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
2547.name: klang

2548.text: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
2548.name: klinklang

2549.text: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponents brain, causing unendurable headaches.
2549.name: elgyem

2550.text: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns havent been decoded.
2550.name: beheeyem

2551.text: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
2551.name: axew

2552.text: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
2552.name: fraxure

2553.text: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
2553.name: haxorus

2554.text: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
2554.name: cubchoo

2555.text: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
2555.name: beartic

2556.text: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
2556.name: cryogonal

2557.text: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
2557.name: shelmet

2558.text: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
2558.name: accelgor

2559.text: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
2559.name: stunfisk

2560.text: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
2560.name: mienfoo

2561.text: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
2561.name: mienshao

2562.text: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
2562.name: druddigon

2563.text: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
2563.name: golett

2564.text: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokmon by the ancient people who made them.
2564.name: golurk

2565.text: Blades comprise this Pokmons entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
2565.name: pawniard

2566.text: This pitiless Pokmon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
2566.name: bisharp

2567.text: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
2567.name: bouffalant

2568.text: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
2568.name: rufflet

2569.text: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
2569.name: vullaby

2570.text: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
2570.name: mandibuzz

2571.text: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durants steel bodies and consume their insides.
2571.name: heatmor

2572.text: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
2572.name: durant

2573.text: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
2573.name: deino

2574.text: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
2574.name: zweilous

2575.text: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
2575.name: hydreigon

2576.text: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
2576.name: larvesta

2577.text: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
2577.name: volcarona

2578.text: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokmon obey it.
2578.name: cobalion

2579.text: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokmon is spoken of in legends.
2579.name: terrakion

2580.text: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
2580.name: virizion

2581.text: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
2581.name: tornadus

2582.text: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
2582.name: thundurus

2583.text: This legendary Pokmon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
2583.name: reshiram

2584.text: This legendary Pokmon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
2584.name: zekrom

2585.text: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as The Guardian of the Fields.
2585.name: landorus

2586.text: This legendary ice Pokmon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
2586.name: kyurem

2587.text: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
2587.name: keldeo

2588.text: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokmon that hear them happy or sad.
2588.name: meloetta

2589.text: This ancient bug Pokmon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
2589.name: genesect

2590.text: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
2590.name: quilladin

2591.text: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
2591.name: delphox

2592.text: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
2592.name: froakie

2593.text: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
2593.name: frogadier

2594.text: These friendly Pokmon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
2594.name: fletchling

2595.text: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
2595.name: fletchinder

2596.text: When under attack from bird Pokmon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
2596.name: scatterbug

2597.text: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
2597.name: vivillon

2598.text: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
2598.name: litleo

2599.text: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabb holds is most likely part of its body.
2599.name: flabebe

2600.text: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
2600.name: floette

2601.text: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
2601.name: florges

2602.text: Thought to be one of the first Pokmon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
2602.name: skiddo

2603.text: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
2603.name: pancham

2604.text: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it wont put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
2604.name: pangoro

2605.text: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
2605.name: furfrou

2606.text: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
2606.name: espurr

2607.text: Apparently this Pokmon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
2607.name: honedge

2608.text: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokmon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokmon.
2608.name: aegislash

2609.text: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
2609.name: spritzee

2610.text: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
2610.name: aromatisse

2611.text: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
2611.name: inkay

2612.text: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
2612.name: barbaracle

2613.text: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
2613.name: skrelp

2614.text: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
2614.name: clawitzer

2615.text: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
2615.name: helioptile

2616.text: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
2616.name: tyrantrum

2617.text: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
2617.name: sylveon

2618.text: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
2618.name: hawlucha

2619.text: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
2619.name: carbink

2620.text: The weakest Dragon-type Pokmon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesnt dry out.
2620.name: goomy

2621.text: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it cant see anything.
2621.name: sliggoo
