3743.text: While it's unexpectedly quiet and friendly, if it's not fed any trash for a while, it will smash its Trainer's furnishings and eat up the fragments.
3743.name: mukalola

3744.text: The energy of Mega Evolution awakened it. It sinks into another dimension, where it keeps a patient watch for its chance to attack.
3744.name: gengarmega

3745.text: Its custom is to mourn its lost companions. Mounds of dirt by the side of the road mark the graves of the Marowak.
3745.name: marowakalola

3746.text: Thanks to Mega Evolution, its child grows. But as the child is good only at fighting and nothing else, its mother feels uneasy about its future.
3746.name: kangaskhanmega

3747.text: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, its wings become unusually developed. It flies at speeds of approximately 30 mph.
3747.name: pinsirmega

3748.text: When it Mega Evolves, it becomes more vicious than ever before. Some say that's because its excess of power is causing it pain.
3748.name: aerodactylmega

3749.text: Supporting a giant heavy jewel, it can't change direction very nimbly and is vulnerable to attack from behind.
3749.name: sableyemega

3750.text: As a consequence of Mega Evolution, its combative instincts exploded. The yellow marks it bears are scars from a long history of battles.
3750.name: sharpedomega

3751.text: This is Castform's form when basking in fair weather. Its body is warm and toasty.
3751.name: castformsunny

3752.text: This is Castform's form during a downpour of rain. Its body retains moisture and gets slippery.
3752.name: castformrainy

3753.text: As the energy of Mega Evolution fills it, its fur bristles. What you see on its back are not true wings, and this Pokmon isn't able to fly.
3753.name: absolmega

3754.text: It envelops prey in its mouth, freezing them instantly. But its jaw is dislocated, so it's unable to eat them.
3754.name: glaliemega

3755.text: Mega Evolution fuels its brutality, and it may even turn on the Trainer who raised it. It's been dubbed "the blood-soaked crescent."
3755.name: salamencemega

3756.text: Mega Evolution stimulated its brain. It emerged as a ruthless Pokmon that will clutch at any means of ensuring its victories.
3756.name: metagrossmega

3757.text: The difference in color from one Shellos to another seems to be a result of their diet. No large changes can be seen in their capabilities
3757.name: shelloseast

3758.text: Experiments are being conducted to discover what happens when a Gastrodon is raised in a location other than the sea where it was born.
3758.name: gastrodoneast

3759.text: Its vaunted wings become scythes, sending it mad with rage. It swings its scythes wildly and slices the ground to pieces
3759.name: garchompmega

3760.text: It readies itself to face its enemies by focusing its mental energies. Its fighting style can be summed up in a single word: heartless.
3760.name: lucariomega

3761.text: This is Zygarde's form when about 10% of its cells have been gathered. It runs across the land at speeds greater than 60 mph.
3761.name: zygarde10

3762.text: This is Zygarde's 100% form. It has enough power to overwhelm even Xerneas or Yveltal.
3762.name: zygardecomplete

3763.text: It creates an electric charge by rubbing its feathers together. It dances over to its enemies and delivers shocking electrical punches.
3763.name: oricoriopompom

3764.text: This Oricorio has sipped pink nectar. Its enemies' hearts melt at the sight of its gently swaying hips.
3764.name: oricoriopau

3765.text: It summons the dead with its dreamy dancing. From their malice, it draws power with which to curse its enemies.
3765.name: oricoriosensu

3766.text: It goads its enemies into attacking, withstands the hits, and in return, delivers a headbutt, crushing their bones with its rocky mane.
3766.name: lycanrocmidnight

3767.text: At their appearance, even Gyarados will flee. When they team up to use Water Gun, its power exceeds that of Hydro Pump.
3767.name: wishiwashischool

3768.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3768.name: silvallyfighting

3769.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3769.name: silvallyflying

3770.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3770.name: silvallypoison

3771.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3771.name: silvallyground

3772.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3772.name: silvallyrock

3773.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3773.name: silvallybug

3774.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3774.name: silvallyghost

3775.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3775.name: silvallysteel

3776.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3776.name: silvallyfire

3777.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3777.name: silvallywater

3778.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3778.name: silvallygrass

3779.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3779.name: silvallyelectric

3780.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3780.name: silvallypsychic

3781.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3781.name: silvallyice

3782.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3782.name: silvallydragon

3783.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3783.name: silvallydark

3784.text: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokmon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
3784.name: silvallyfairy

3785.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3785.name: miniormeteororange

3786.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3786.name: miniormeteoryellow

3787.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3787.name: miniormeteorgreen

3788.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3788.name: miniormeteorblue

3789.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3789.name: miniormeteorindigo

3790.text: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokmon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
3790.name: miniormeteorviolet

3791.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3791.name: miniorred

3792.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3792.name: miniororange

3793.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3793.name: minioryellow

3794.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3794.name: miniorgreen

3795.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3795.name: miniorblue

3796.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3796.name: miniorindigo

3797.text: If its core stays exposed, it will soon die off. It's possible that it may survive if it's put into a Pok Ball quickly enough.
3797.name: miniorviolet

3798.text: If its neck is broken or its rag torn during an attack, it works through the night to patch it.
3798.name: mimikyubusted

3799.text: This gorgeous Magearna looks as it did at the time of its invention. Its luxurious decoration pleased the king's daughter.
3799.name: magearnaoriginal

3800.text: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.
3800.name: caterpie

3801.text: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.
3801.name: metapod

3802.text: Its wings are covered in toxic scales. If it finds bird Pokmon going after Caterpie, Butterfree sprinkles its scales on them to drive them off.
3802.name: butterfree

3803.text: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokmon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.
3803.name: rattata

3804.text: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.
3804.name: raticate

3805.text: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to otherseven large Pokmonif it has to protect its territory.
3805.name: spearow

3806.text: Carrying food through Fearows territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!
3806.name: fearow

3807.text: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
3807.name: ekans

3808.text: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.
3808.name: arbok

3809.text: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.
3809.name: pikachu

3810.text: As electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes more aggressive. One theory is that the electricity buildup is actually causing stress.
3810.name: raichu

3811.text: It lives in areas of limited rainfall. When danger approaches, it curls up into a ball to protect its soft stomach.
3811.name: sandshrew

3812.text: Its claws and horns often break off. The broken claws and horns can be used to carve plows for tilling farm fields.
3812.name: sandslash

3813.text: Theyre popular, but theyre rare. Trainers who show them off recklessly may be targeted by thieves.
3813.name: clefairy

3814.text: It cant help but hear a pin drop from over half a mile away, so it lives deep in the mountains where there arent many people or Pokmon.
3814.name: clefable

3815.text: Its beautiful tails have made it very popular. However, if its not brushed diligently, it will be a mass of tangles before you know it.
3815.name: vulpix

3816.text: It is vindictive and relentless by nature. Those who cross it even once will be cursed for a thousand years, along with their descendants.
3816.name: ninetales

3817.text: Recordings of Jigglypuffs strange lullabies can be purchased from department stores. These CDs can be found near the bedding area.
3817.name: jigglypuff

3818.text: Thanks to its bouncy body and fine fur, this Pokmon is sought after. Holding one in your arms while you sleep feels great.
3818.name: wigglytuff

3819.text: It has no eyeballs, so it cant see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
3819.name: zubat

3820.text: Every once in a while, youll see a Golbat thats missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokmon.
3820.name: golbat

3821.text: Whether its due to a lack of moisture or a lack of nutrients, in Alola the mushrooms on Paras dont grow up quite right.
3821.name: paras

3822.text: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.
3822.name: parasect

3823.text: It travels through tunnels that it digs underground. It hates sunlight, so it comes out only after the sun goes down.
3823.name: diglett

3824.text: While the three of them normally get along splendidly, on rare occasions a huge fight will break out over which head gets to eat first.
3824.name: dugtrio

3825.text: When visiting a junkyard, you may catch sight of it having an intense fight with Murkrow over shiny objects.
3825.name: meowth

3826.text: Although the jewel on its forehead appears to be a different color than those of Alolan Persian, its mostly made of the same material.
3826.name: persian

3827.text: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.
3827.name: psyduck

3828.text: Even fast-swimming fish Pokmon can be disabled by Golduck. It brings them to a standstill and seizes them.
3828.name: golduck

3829.text: The smallest of things could cause it to lose its temper. Because it doesnt hold in its stress, this Pokmon can live a long time.
3829.name: mankey

3830.text: It will never forgive opponents who have angered it. Even after it has beaten them down until they cant move, it never ever forgives.
3830.name: primeape

3831.text: While its quite friendly toward humans once its grown used to them, in the wild it must be quite fierce to defend its territory from Rockruff.
3831.name: growlithe

3832.text: Legends tell of its fighting alongside a general and conquering a whole country.
3832.name: arcanine

3833.text: Despite the danger, it wants to come up on land. So it does its best to waddle along, but when an enemy finds it, it rushes back to the water.
3833.name: poliwag

3834.text: Although it has become capable of living on land, it spends its time in the water, where its prey, fish Pokmon, are plentiful.
3834.name: poliwhirl

3835.text: Its quite a gifted swimmer, even among Water-type Pokmon, but it normally spends its time on land.
3835.name: poliwrath

3836.text: It uses various psychic powers even while its sleeping, so you cant tell whether or not its awake.
3836.name: abra

3837.text: It stares at a silver spoon to amplify its psychic powers before it lets loose. Apparently, gold spoons are no good.
3837.name: kadabra

3838.text: Alakazam uses its psychic powers to make the spoons it carries. Each spoon is an original that theres only one of in the whole world.
3838.name: alakazam

3839.text: Once this Pokmon has gained enough confidence and muscle from training with its friends, it challenges Makuhita to a battle.
3839.name: machop

3840.text: When it encounters an enemy thats truly mighty, this Pokmon removes the power-save belt from its waist and unleashes its full power.
3840.name: machoke

3841.text: It grasps its opponents with its four arms and twists them up in an intricate hold. People call it the Machamp special.
3841.name: machamp

3842.text: It drifts through the sea searching for prey. Its poisonous tentacles break off sometimes, but after a while, they grow back.
3842.name: tentacool

3843.text: It fires off ultrasonic waves from its red orbs to weaken its prey, and then it wraps them up in its 80 tentacles.
3843.name: tentacruel

3844.text: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until theyre totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.
3844.name: geodude

3845.text: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.
3845.name: graveler

3846.text: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.
3846.name: golem

3847.text: There are some places where Slowpoke is worshiped because of a long-standing belief that whenever Slowpoke yawns, it rains.
3847.name: slowpoke

3848.text: Spacing out is basically all it does. It turns back into Slowpoke if its tail, along with Shellder, breaks off.
3848.name: slowbro

3849.text: Its frequently the cause of power outages, which is why some power plants send out electrical signals that it cant stand.
3849.name: magnemite

3850.text: Delicate equipment can malfunction in areas inhabited by Magneton, which send out mysterious electrical signals.
3850.name: magneton

3851.text: It has always been supposed that Seel live only in cold seas. Their having shown up in Alola is a mystery.
3851.name: seel

3852.text: It swims through the ocean at a speed of eight knots, searching for Pokmon that will become its prey. Its especially fond of Wishiwashi.
3852.name: dewgong

3853.text: It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a sterile environment, the germs within its body cant multiply, and it dies.
3853.name: grimer

3854.text: Their food sources have decreased, and their numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds are being built to prevent their extinction.
3854.name: muk

3855.text: The sand that accumulates inside its shell eventually becomes a pearl. But the pearl gets in the way, so it spits it out and discards it.
3855.name: shellder

3856.text: If areas of Cloysters very hard shell get damaged, those areas swell, gradually growing into large sharp spikes.
3856.name: cloyster

3857.text: Its said that gas emanating from a graveyard was possessed by the grievances of the deceased and thus became a Pokmon.
3857.name: gastly

3858.text: On moonless nights, Haunter searches for someone to curse, so its best not to go out walking around.
3858.name: haunter

3859.text: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.
3859.name: gengar

3860.text: It can be spotted near recreational facilities, intending to eat the pleasant dreams of children who enjoyed themselves there that day.
3860.name: drowzee

3861.text: In Alola, Komala is Hypnos main target. It rarely harms people.
3861.name: hypno

3862.text: Six of them form a single Pokmon. Should one of the six be lost, the next morning there will once more be six.
3862.name: exeggcute

3863.text: It engages its enemies using psychic powers. Each of its three heads fires off psychokinetic energy, tripling its power.
3863.name: exeggutor

3864.text: At night, it weeps loudly for its dead mother, but those cries only attract its natural enemyMandibuzz.
3864.name: cubone

3865.text: It throws bones at Mandibuzz to knock it down. Its thought that Marowak is trying to avenge its parent.
3865.name: marowak

3866.text: It checks out whatevers around it by licking everything. If you dont clean off a spot where its licked you, youll break out in a rash!
3866.name: lickitung

3867.text: It seems that other Pokmons efforts to take its delicious, nutritious egg away from it caused Chansey to get faster at fleeing.
3867.name: chansey

3868.text: Kangaskhan protects its child by keeping it in its pouch. It has zero forgiveness for those who harm its child and will beat them down.
3868.name: kangaskhan

3869.text: Although known for their splendid tail fins, Goldeen apparently compete among themselves to see whose horn is thickest and sharpest.
3869.name: goldeen

3870.text: Its horn spins like a drill to steadily hollow out rockseven harder ones. The coloration of the male is more vivid.
3870.name: seaking

3871.text: In many places, there are folktales of stardust falling into the ocean and becoming Staryu.
3871.name: staryu

3872.text: Its sparkling core is called the gem of the sea. This core can be made into high-priced accessories that are traded in secret.
3872.name: starmie

3873.text: Its pantomime skills are wonderful. You may become enraptured while watching it, but next thing you know, Mr. Mime has made a real wall.
3873.name: mrmime

3874.text: Its two sharp scythes are more than just weapons. It uses them with dexterity to dress its prey before eating.
3874.name: scyther

3875.text: It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. The precise movements of Jynx living in Alola are truly wonderful.
3875.name: jynx

3876.text: Electricity permeates its body. It swings its arms round and round to charge up electricity before unleashing a punch.
3876.name: electabuzz

3877.text: Its entire body is burning. When it breathes, the temperature rises. When it sneezes, flames shoot out!
3877.name: magmar

3878.text: It gets into territorial disputes with Vikavolt. For some reason, it apparently gets along well with Heracross in Alola.
3878.name: pinsir

3879.text: They live in groups. The one with the longest, thickest, and most-scarred horns is the boss of the herd.
3879.name: tauros

3880.text: In the distant past, they were fairly strong, but they have become gradually weaker over time.
3880.name: magikarp

3881.text: It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the surrounding area to ash. There are some regions where its called the deity of destruction.
3881.name: gyarados

3882.text: It likes swimming around with people on its back. In the Alola region, its an important means of transportation over water.
3882.name: lapras

3883.text: While it can transform into anything, each Ditto apparently has its own strengths and weaknesses when it comes to transformations.
3883.name: ditto

3884.text: The question of why only Eevee has such unstable genes has still not been solved.
3884.name: eevee

3885.text: Clean, clear waters are its usual habitat. When its about to be attacked by an invading enemy, it dives into the water to hide.
3885.name: vaporeon

3886.text: Its lungs contain an organ that creates electricity. The crackling sound of electricity can be heard when it exhales.
3886.name: jolteon

3887.text: If it inhales deeply, thats a sign its about to attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!
3887.name: flareon

3888.text: This Pokmon was created using the cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so many parts of it have since become obsolete.
3888.name: porygon

3889.text: Omanyte lived in the seas of antiquity. Its fossils have been found bearing bite marks from Archeops, so apparently Archeops preyed on it.
3889.name: omanyte

3890.text: Its heavy shell is thought to be the reason this ancient Pokmon died out. Its apparently a distant ancestor of Octillery.
3890.name: omastar

3891.text: This Pokmon thrived 300 million years ago. Its said that living specimens can still be seen in a certain regiona rare sight.
3891.name: kabuto

3892.text: Its body had begun to change so it could function on land. But it didnt adapt in time and went extinct.
3892.name: kabutops

3893.text: Restored from DNA found in amber, this Pokmon exhibited ferocity that was greater than expected. Some casualties resulted.
3893.name: aerodactyl

3894.text: It doesnt do anything other than eat and sleep. When prompted to make a serious effort, though, it apparently displays awesome power.
3894.name: snorlax

3895.text: Its still weak, so it lurks on the floor of bodies of water, eating whatever food sinks down and living a quiet life.
3895.name: dratini

3896.text: Lakes where Dragonair live are filled with offerings from people, because they believe this Pokmon is able to control the weather.
3896.name: dragonair

3897.text: It flies over raging seas as if they were nothing. Observing this, a ships captain dubbed this Pokmon the sea incarnate.
3897.name: dragonite

3898.text: Every day, it tilts its head in the same rhythm. A long time ago, people raised these Pokmon to serve as clocks.
3898.name: hoothoot

3899.text: With eyes that can see in pitch-darkness, it never lets its prey escape. Some even call it the emperor of dark nights.
3899.name: noctowl

3900.text: This Pokmon is very sensitive to cold. In the warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.
3900.name: ledyba

3901.text: Its said that the patterns on its back are related to the stars in the night sky, but the details of that relationship remain unclear.
3901.name: ledian

3902.text: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that wont break even if you set a rock on them.
3902.name: spinarak

3903.text: Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.
3903.name: ariados

3904.text: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you wont notice any pain or realize youve been bitten.
3904.name: crobat

3905.text: Its two antennae glow softly to lure in prey, making it a useful Pokmon for night fishing.
3905.name: chinchou

3906.text: When the bacteria living inside its antennae absorb Lanturns bodily fluids, a strong luminescent effect is produced.
3906.name: lanturn

3907.text: It still cant use electricity well. When its surprised or excited, it discharges electricity unintentionally.
3907.name: pichu

3908.text: On nights with many shooting stars, they gather in packs and dance in circles. If you should see them, something good will happen!
3908.name: cleffa

3909.text: Its always practicing its singing because it wants to improve. Even when its asleep, it keeps singing in its dreams!
3909.name: igglybuff

3910.text: Although it still cant fly, its jumping power is outstanding. It jumps way up into trees and plucks the buds from the branches.
3910.name: natu

3911.text: Its said that while this Pokmon has the power to predict the future, its not powerful enough to change the future it sees.
3911.name: xatu

3912.text: Clothing made from Mareeps fleece is easily charged with static electricity, so a special process is used on it.
3912.name: mareep

3913.text: In the places on its body where fleece doesnt grow, its skin is rubbery and doesnt conduct electricity. Those spots are safe to touch.
3913.name: flaaffy

3914.text: The light from its tail can be seen from space. This is why you can always tell exactly where it is, which is why it usually keeps the light off.
3914.name: ampharos

3915.text: Its so popular with the elderly that theres a magazine devoted to this Pokmon. Fans obsess over the particular length and angle of its arms.
3915.name: sudowoodo

3916.text: Although its cries sound like screams, a composer created a beautiful ballad that was influenced by the sounds.
3916.name: politoed

3917.text: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
3917.name: aipom

3918.text: Although it originally had no powers at all, people say its precognitive faculties were awakened by its need to protect itself.
3918.name: espeon

3919.text: This Pokmon is nocturnal. Even in total darkness, its large eyes can spot its prey clearly!
3919.name: umbreon

3920.text: It has a weakness for shiny things. Its been known to sneak into the nests of Gabitenoted collectors of jewelsin search of treasure.
3920.name: murkrow

3921.text: Its constantly coming up with new ideas that would change the world, but as soon as it hits upon a new idea, it forgets it.
3921.name: slowking

3922.text: What gives meaning to its life is surprising others. If you set your ear against the red orbs around its neck, you can hear shrieking.
3922.name: misdreavus

3923.text: Motionless, it hangs from trees, waiting for its bug Pokmon prey to come to it. Its favorite in Alola is Cutiefly.
3923.name: pineco

3924.text: When something approaches it, it fires off fragments of its steel shell in attack. This is not a conscious action but a conditioned reflex.
3924.name: forretress

3925.text: It travels by digging through the ground. Diglett and Dunsparce share one anothers tunnels happily.
3925.name: dunsparce

3926.text: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.
3926.name: snubbull

3927.text: While it has powerful jaws, it doesnt care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.
3927.name: granbull

3928.text: Its body is like steel. Its tough, heavy pincers are more suited to smashing enemies than grabbing them.
3928.name: scizor

3929.text: Its proud of its thick horn. In Alola, its biggest rival is Vikavolt, which its always fighting with.
3929.name: heracross

3930.text: They will cooperate to steal eggs from the nests of bird Pokmon, but fights break out to determine which one gets to eat the eggs.
3930.name: sneasel

3931.text: The pink of Corsola that live in Alola is deep and vibrant, thanks to seas filled with nutrition.
3931.name: corsola

3932.text: This Pokmon clings to Mantine and shares in its prosperity. When its Mantine is attacked, Remoraid will fight alongside it!
3932.name: remoraid

3933.text: The ink it spits when escaping is special. It contains a substance that dulls the sense of smell, so Pokmon with keen noses get lost.
3933.name: octillery

3934.text: It shares its food with people who are stranded. Because Delibird is omnivorous, sometimes it gives those people bug Pokmon.
3934.name: delibird

3935.text: Postcards and posters featuring Mantine leaping elegantly above the waves are popular souvenirs of Alola.
3935.name: mantine

3936.text: The wing feathers it sheds can be processed and made into knives whose sharpness is recognized by the finest chefs.
3936.name: skarmory

3937.text: It cooperates with others skillfully. When it becomes your partner, its very loyal to you as its Trainer and will obey your orders.
3937.name: houndour

3938.text: They spew flames mixed with poison to finish off their opponents. They divvy up their prey evenly among the members of their pack.
3938.name: houndoom

3939.text: AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesnt need to know.
3939.name: porygon2

3940.text: The fluid of Smeargles tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokmons emotions change.
3940.name: smeargle

3941.text: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.
3941.name: smoochum

3942.text: When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekids mood improves. It can be useful to record that sound and play it when Elekids feeling down.
3942.name: elekid

3943.text: When flames drip from its nose, that means it has a cold. Have it lie down for a nice rest in some magma.
3943.name: magby

3944.text: It produces over five gallons of milk a day. The higher the quality of the pastures it lives in, the richer and tastier its milk becomes.
3944.name: miltank

3945.text: Their eggs are such a delicacy that some say eating one will bring you happiness. These eggs fetch the highest prices on the market.
3945.name: blissey

3946.text: Born underground, it eats its way through dirt to the surface, where its parents are. It doesnt deal well with the bright light it finds there.
3946.name: larvitar

3947.text: This troublesome Pokmon cant wait to evolve, so it relieves its stress by wildly propelling itself around using compressed gas.
3947.name: pupitar

3948.text: It wanders through the mountains seeking opponents to fight. If it finds an opponent thats not worthy, Tyranitar ignores it and wanders on.
3948.name: tyranitar

3949.text: With its long, thin wings, it catches updrafts and flies like a glider high up into the sky.
3949.name: wingull

3950.text: It places small Pokmon into its spacious beak and carries them around. No one knows where its taking them.
3950.name: pelipper

3951.text: If its in a pinch, it will secrete a sweet liquid from the tip of its head. Syrup made from gathering that liquid is tasty on bread.
3951.name: surskit

3952.text: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns of its eyespots. If that doesnt work, it deftly makes its escape on its set of four wings.
3952.name: masquerain

3953.text: It practices its slaps by repeatedly slapping tree trunks. It has been known to slap an Exeggutor and get flung away.
3953.name: makuhita

3954.text: Although they enjoy comparing their strength, theyre also kind. They value etiquette, praising opponents they battle.
3954.name: hariyama

3955.text: It moves less than an inch a year, but when its in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
3955.name: nosepass

3956.text: It digs through the ground with its hard claws and crunches down gems with its thick pointy teeth. Carbink is its favorite food.
3956.name: sableye

3957.text: A cunning and terrifying Pokmon, its cuteness makes opponents let down their guardand then it swallows them whole with its huge jaws.
3957.name: mawile

3958.text: Friction between the air and its fur produces static electricity. When Electrike runs, it makes a crackling sound.
3958.name: electrike

3959.text: Manectric can be found beneath unnatural thunderclouds. People say it can run at the same speed as lightning striking.
3959.name: manectric

3960.text: Theyre such cowards that they wont hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!
3960.name: carvanha

3961.text: People believe that carrying one of its discarded fangs will prevent mishaps at sea, so the fangs are made into accessories.
3961.name: sharpedo

3962.text: It swims along with its mouth open and swallows down seawater along with its food. It sprays excess water out of its nostrils.
3962.name: wailmer

3963.text: They eat so many fish Pokmon that when Wailord become too numerous, fishermen have to chase them off.
3963.name: wailord

3964.text: You can tell how its feeling by the smoke spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity is a sign of good health.
3964.name: torkoal

3965.text: Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a long time makes it feel sick.
3965.name: spinda

3966.text: Its jaws are strong enough to crush rocks but so heavy that it cant get up if it flips over. Sandile seize those moments as their chance.
3966.name: trapinch

3967.text: It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.
3967.name: vibrava

3968.text: By flapping their wings, Flygon cause sandstorms that conceal Krookodile. The team then splits the prey they catch.
3968.name: flygon

3969.text: Its entire body is gooey. When pecked at by bird Pokmon, it slips and slides its way to freedom.
3969.name: barboach

3970.text: Whiscash shakes the ground at high intensities to intimidate its opponents. It swallows its prey wholealong with mud from the swamp floor.
3970.name: whiscash

3971.text: Individuals that have been set free by Trainers who could no longer raise them have become common, and they can now be found in Alola.
3971.name: corphish

3972.text: Its temperament is rough and it loves to fight, but as soon as its pincers break off, it turns cowardly. It stays timid until they grow back.
3972.name: crawdaunt

3973.text: Depictions of Pokmon similar to Baltoy have been found on the walls of caves where primitive humans lived.
3973.name: baltoy

3974.text: If it gets wet, its body melts. When rain starts to fall, it wraps its whole body up with its psychic powers to protect itself.
3974.name: claydol

3975.text: In ancient times, it lived in warm seas. It disguised itself as seaweed to ambush its prey and devoured them whole when they got close.
3975.name: lileep

3976.text: Normally, it lived on shallow sea shoals. When the tide went out, this Pokmon came up on land to search for prey.
3976.name: cradily

3977.text: When restored Anorith are released into the ocean, they dont thrive, because the water composition has changed since their era.
3977.name: anorith

3978.text: It lived on land and went out into the sea to hunt for prey. Its sharp claws were its greatest weapon.
3978.name: armaldo

3979.text: They look ragged, so no one catches them. They look like theyd taste bad, so predators wont eat them. And their numbers continue to grow.
3979.name: feebas

3980.text: While Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokmon, Trainers who like Feebas and have raised it are seemingly disappointed by Milotic.
3980.name: milotic

3981.text: Although its form changes with the weather, that is apparently the result of a chemical reaction and not the result of its own free will.
3981.name: castform

3982.text: It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.
3982.name: kecleon

3983.text: It eats up emotions like malice, jealousy, and resentment, so some people are grateful for its presence.
3983.name: shuppet

3984.text: Its a stuffed toy that was thrown away and became possessed, ever searching for the one who threw it away so it can exact its revenge.
3984.name: banette

3985.text: The bunches of fruit growing around the necks of Tropius in Alola are especially sweet compared to those in other regions.
3985.name: tropius

3986.text: The only thing unlucky about Absol is its appearance. It protects fields and warns people of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.
3986.name: absol

3987.text: It feeds mainly on ice and snow. Its only able to survive in a limited number of places in the warm Alola region.
3987.name: snorunt

3988.text: It freezes its prey and chews them whole. However, it prefers to eat Pokmon like Vanillite that are already frozen.
3988.name: glalie

3989.text: Despite its appearance, its carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesnt let go until they stop moving.
3989.name: clamperl

3990.text: Its not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.
3990.name: huntail

3991.text: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.
3991.name: gorebyss

3992.text: Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was given a name that is a variation of the name of the person who discovered it.
3992.name: relicanth

3993.text: There was an era when it was overfished due to the rumor that having one of its heart-shaped scales would enable you to find a sweetheart.
3993.name: luvdisc

3994.text: Whenever it sees bird Pokmon flying through the sky, it becomes envious and smashes its surroundings to bits with headbutts.
3994.name: bagon

3995.text: The cells within its body are changing at a bewildering pace. Its hard shell is made from the same substance as bone.
3995.name: shelgon

3996.text: Overjoyed at finally being able to fly, it flies all over the place and usually doesnt land until its completely exhausted and needs to sleep.
3996.name: salamence

3997.text: Instead of blood, magnetism flows through its body. When its feeling bad, try giving it a magnet.
3997.name: beldum

3998.text: With its two brains, it fires powerful psychic energy to stop its prey in their tracks.
3998.name: metang

3999.text: It boasts not only psychic powers but also fantastic strength. It grabs its prey with its four legs and holds them in place with its claws.
3999.name: metagross

4000.text: A primeval Pokmon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.
4000.name: cranidos

4001.text: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokmon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.
4001.name: rampardos

4002.text: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokmon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.
4002.name: shieldon

4003.text: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokmon was successfully restored.
4003.name: bastiodon

4004.text: While they normally live in the sea, they can function on land, too, until their skin dries out.
4004.name: shellos

4005.text: Long ago, it had a shell on its back. Theres now a vestigial plate on its back thats hard but thin.
4005.name: gastrodon

4006.text: In their search for comfortable trees, they get into territorial disputes with groups of Passimian. They win about half the time.
4006.name: ambipom

4007.text: Its round body is stuffed with souls and expands each time it leads someone away.
4007.name: drifloon

4008.text: Theres a rumor that if you catch a Drifblim floating on the wind at dusk, youll be carried away to the afterlife.
4008.name: drifblim

4009.text: Its arms and legs are weak, but when it rolls its ears up tight and then unleashes them with its full force, it can smash boulders to dust.
4009.name: buneary

4010.text: Lopunny regrows its coat twice a year. Mufflers and hats made from its fur are really warm.
4010.name: lopunny

4011.text: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokmon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.
4011.name: mismagius

4012.text: It will absolutely not forgive failure from or betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.
4012.name: honchkrow

4013.text: It discharges moisture from its eyes, making it look like its cryingapparently an effective way of getting enemies to let down their guard.
4013.name: bonsly

4014.text: It does its absolute best to mimic the movements and expressions of its opponents, but its still not very good at it.
4014.name: mimejr

4015.text: Usually its a well-behaved Pokmon, but if you take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss and throw a big old tantrum.
4015.name: happiny

4016.text: It reacts to anything that movesflies right at it and bites it. Sometimes it injures itself, but it doesnt care too much.
4016.name: gible

4017.text: It loves shiny things. When it finds a Sableye trying to catch a Carbink, Gabite becomes furiously angry and attacks the Sableye.
4017.name: gabite

4018.text: It flies at the speed of sound while searching for prey, and it has midair battles with Salamence as the two compete for food.
4018.name: garchomp

4019.text: It hides food under its long fur, but it sometimes forgets about it and causes a stinky disturbance.
4019.name: munchlax

4020.text: It knows how people and Pokmon feel by looking at their auras. It doesnt approach dangerous opponents.
4020.name: riolu

4021.text: It concentrates its mental energy and fires off mysterious waves called auras, which can crush boulders of large size to dust.
4021.name: lucario

4022.text: When night falls, their pink patterns begin to shine. Theyre popular with divers, so there are resorts that feed them to keep them close.
4022.name: finneon

4023.text: Deep down at the bottom of the ocean, prey is scarce. Lumineon get into fierce disputes with Lanturn over food.
4023.name: lumineon

4024.text: Its highly friendly and easily tamed. Tours that take people swimming with Mantyke are a super-popular beach activity.
4024.name: mantyke

4025.text: One Weavile will trip a Sandshrew and flip it over, and then another Weavile will deal the finishing blow with its sharp claws.
4025.name: weavile

4026.text: It uses radar to monitor its territory. Intruders are quickly disposed of with a hyper beam.
4026.name: magnezone

4027.text: A contest is under way to determine which one can stick its tongue out the farthest. The current record is...more than 82 feet.
4027.name: lickilicky

4028.text: It grips its tail, which spews electricity, and then beats down opponents with the power of its electrified fist.
4028.name: electivire

4029.text: There are still quite a few factories that rely on the flames provided by Magmortar to process metals.
4029.name: magmortar

4030.text: Although it doesnt like disputes, it will sharpen the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has to protect its friends.
4030.name: leafeon

4031.text: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below 75 degrees Fahrenheit.
4031.name: glaceon

4032.text: Its behavior is noticeably unstable, which is apparently due to the incompetence of the engineer who updated its programming.
4032.name: porygonz

4033.text: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and dont come back.
4033.name: probopass

4034.text: It freezes hikers who have come to climb snowy mountains and carries them back to its home. It only goes after men it thinks are handsome.
4034.name: froslass

4035.text: This Pokmon has excellent judgment. If it decides it cant defeat an opponent, it immediately turns tail and vamooses.
4035.name: lillipup

4036.text: The longer its black fur grows, the harder and more impervious it gets. Claws and fangs cant easily penetrate it.
4036.name: herdier

4037.text: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a little uncomfortable.
4037.name: stoutland

4038.text: The hexagonal hole is its ear. Deep in that ear is an energy core, so if you stick your hand in there, Roggenrola will be very angry!
4038.name: roggenrola

4039.text: The energy overflowing from its body has turned into orange crystals that are hard enough to smash diamonds.
4039.name: boldore

4040.text: When it fires off energy with all its might, the power creates countless fissures on its body.
4040.name: gigalith

4041.text: To protect itself, it shoots cotton from its body. When it gets wet in the rain, its cotton grows moist and heavy, and it cant move as well.
4041.name: cottonee

4042.text: This nuisance sneaks into peoples homes, where it hides important things and scatters cotton all over the place.
4042.name: whimsicott

4043.text: Some say if you dry the leaves on its head, boil them down, and drink the infusion, your vigor will return, so Petilil is popular with the elderly.
4043.name: petilil

4044.text: The fragrance of its flower differs slightly depending on the soil where it grew up. Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.
4044.name: lilligant

4045.text: Savage, violent Pokmon, red and blue Basculin are always fighting each other over territory.
4045.name: basculin

4046.text: Alola, where its warm all year round, is a comfortable environment for this Pokmon. Sometimes youll even see it outside of deserts.
4046.name: sandile

4047.text: Krokorok really hates it when its body gets cold. On nights when the temperature drops, it digs deep into the desert sands.
4047.name: krokorok

4048.text: When it spots prey, even at a distance of over 30 miles, it swims through the desert as if it were water, then jumps out and chomps them.
4048.name: krookodile

4049.text: They move in small groups, walking around lazily. Anyone who makes eye contact gets smacked with a headbutt.
4049.name: scraggy

4050.text: It was restored from an ancient fossil. Tirtouga lived in the sea but came up onto the land to search for prey.
4050.name: tirtouga

4051.text: Its jaws are terrifyingly powerful. It could eat Omastar and Omanyte whole and not be bothered in the slightest by their shells.
4051.name: carracosta

4052.text: Once thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokmon, some of the latest research suggests that may not be the case.
4052.name: archen

4053.text: This ancient Pokmons plumage is delicate, so if anyone other than an experienced professional tries to restore it, they will fail.
4053.name: archeops

4054.text: Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes. Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will come drooling.
4054.name: trubbish

4055.text: It locks opponents in place with its left hand, immobilizing them by entirely dousing their bodies with poisonous liquid.
4055.name: garbodor

4056.text: This Pokmon has a cowardly disposition, so when its not around friends, it basically always stays transformed as something else.
4056.name: zorua

4057.text: It doesnt just transform itselfit also has the power to make hundreds of people see its illusions.
4057.name: zoroark

4058.text: A clean freak that will not allow even the slightest mess, it uses its tail like a mop to thoroughly clean any and all filth.
4058.name: minccino

4059.text: The white parts of its coat are covered in an oil secreted from its body, so this Pokmon can slide right away from its enemies attacks.
4059.name: cinccino

4060.text: It exhales cold air that is at 58 degrees Fahrenheit. When its in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.
4060.name: vanillite

4061.text: It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.
4061.name: vanillish

4062.text: It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love from skiers and snowboarders.
4062.name: vanilluxe

4063.text: They store up electricity to fly through the air. When thunder cracks at night, sometimes there are almost enough of them to blot out the sky.
4063.name: emolga

4064.text: It wraps its veillike arms and legs around prey swimming by and drags them down to the depths of the ocean.
4064.name: frillish

4065.text: Jellicent is always hanging around fancy cruise ships and tankers, hoping to drag away its prey.
4065.name: jellicent

4066.text: Fishermen take them along on long voyages, because if you have an Alomomola with you, therell be no need for a doctor or medicine.
4066.name: alomomola

4067.text: It controls tremendous psychic power. Most reports of alien sightings are actually just people mistaking Elgyem for an alien.
4067.name: elgyem

4068.text: With its psychic powers, it rewrites its opponents memories. You, too, may have already had your memories rewritten.
4068.name: beheeyem

4069.text: They can often be seen in packs in the morning, slowly moving their bodies through a series of poses.
4069.name: mienfoo

4070.text: It overwhelms its opponents with continuous attacks and then slowly stores up power before delivering the finishing blow.
4070.name: mienshao

4071.text: The red skin on its face is harder than rock. In narrow caves, it squares off against its enemies and charges face-first right into them.
4071.name: druddigon

4072.text: Some say that ancient people invented Golurk to serve as a laborer. It follows its masters orders faithfully.
4072.name: golurk

4073.text: After shredding its prey, it sharpens its blades on a stone by the river. Each Pawniard has its own favorite sharpening stone.
4073.name: pawniard

4074.text: No matter how strong the Bisharp, its said that if the blade on its head is chipped, it will retire from its position as the boss.
4074.name: bisharp

4075.text: With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck out their insides.
4075.name: rufflet

4076.text: The more scars it has on its front, the more heroic its considered to be. Those with many scars on their back are mocked by the flock.
4076.name: braviary

4077.text: Mandibuzz gives it the bones it wears. Vullabys wings are short, so it cant fly yet, but it jumps around, dreaming of wide open skies.
4077.name: vullaby

4078.text: It skillfully arranges the bones of its prey to construct its nest. Most of the bones are Cubone.
4078.name: mandibuzz

4079.text: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
4079.name: larvesta

4080.text: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as the rage of the sun.
4080.name: volcarona

4081.text: While its an amiable Pokmon, if you touch it unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an instant, and youll be burned.
4081.name: fletchling

4082.text: It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug Pokmon, frightened by the flames, come flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.
4082.name: fletchinder

4083.text: Its tough wings dont allow fire to pass through them. A long time ago, firefighters outfits were made from Talonflame wings.
4083.name: talonflame

4084.text: When theyre young, they live with a pride. Once theyre able to hunt prey on their own, theyre kicked out and have to make their own way.
4084.name: litleo

4085.text: The males are usually lazy, but when attacked by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends with no regard for its own safety.
4085.name: pyroar

4086.text: Its not safe without the power of a flower, but it will keep traveling around until it finds one with the color and shape it wants.
4086.name: flabebe

4087.text: It raises flowers and uses them as weapons. The more gorgeous the blossom, the more power it contains.
4087.name: floette

4088.text: It controls the flowers it grows. The petal blizzards that Florges triggers are overwhelming in their beauty and power.
4088.name: florges

4089.text: It follows Pangoro around like a henchman. When Pancham makes a big mistake, its leaf gets taken away.
4089.name: pancham

4090.text: This rowdy Pokmon boasts great physical strength. Many Trainers are also smitten by its lively character.
4090.name: pangoro

4091.text: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrous fur into the most exquisite style.
4091.name: furfrou

4092.text: It draws prey near with its blinking lights and then wraps them up in its long tentacles and holds them in place.
4092.name: inkay

4093.text: When it comes to strong hypnosis, theres an endless number of people who utilize Malamar for their nefarious deeds.
4093.name: malamar

4094.text: It vanishes into seaweed and remains perfectly still to avoid attacks from large Pokmon. Rotten seaweed is its main food source.
4094.name: skrelp

4095.text: This vicious Pokmon sprays a poisonous liquid on opponents that come near. For whatever reason, it gets along really well with Dhelmise.
4095.name: dragalge

4096.text: Its claws occasionally fall off, and it keeps a low profile until they grow back. The meat of its claws is so delicious!
4096.name: clauncher

4097.text: It compresses the water it has sucked up and then projects it with enough power to punch a hole right through a thick sheet of iron.
4097.name: clawitzer

4098.text: Its large jaw has incredible destructive power. Some theories suggest that its restored form is different from its form of long ago.
4098.name: tyrunt

4099.text: Complete restoration is impossible, allowing room for theories that its entire body was once covered in a feather-like coat.
4099.name: tyrantrum

4100.text: It lived in cold areas in ancient times. Its said that when Amaura whinnies, auroras appear in the night sky.
4100.name: amaura

4101.text: An Aurorus was found frozen solid within a glacier, just as it appeared long ago, which became quite a big event in the news.
4101.name: aurorus

4102.text: Once a fight breaks out, it will unflinchingly charge at dragon Pokmon that are many times larger than itself.
4102.name: sylveon

4103.text: It overwhelms opponents with quick moves, but sometimes it showboats for too long when its using a special move and gets itself into a pinch.
4103.name: hawlucha

4104.text: It sneaks into peoples homes and steals electricity from their outlets. When your electric bill seems off, its the handiwork of this rascal.
4104.name: dedenne

4105.text: Some say that deep beneath the surface of the world, a pack of Carbink live with their queen in a kingdom of jewels.
4105.name: carbink

4106.text: It uses its horns to check out its surroundings. Theyre very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
4106.name: goomy

4107.text: It crawls along sluggishly. The swirly protrusion on its back is filled with its brain and other organs.
4107.name: sliggoo

4108.text: Its very friendly toward people. If you grow close to it, Goodra will hug you with its sticky, slime-covered body. Dont get mad.
4108.name: goodra

4109.text: Although its unclear why it collects keys, giving it a key makes Klefki very happy. However, it apparently only likes master keys.
4109.name: klefki

4110.text: By imitating the voice of a child, it causes people to get hopelessly lost deep in the forest. Its trying to make friends with them.
4110.name: phantump

4111.text: Its feared as a ghost of the forest. Lumberjacks bring along Fire types, which Trevenant hates, when they enter the forest.
4111.name: trevenant

4112.text: Fruits are its favorite foods. This gourmet carefully picks out just the ripe ones using its sonar.
4112.name: noibat

4113.text: Although it has a violent disposition, if you give it a nice ripe fruit that it loves, Noivern will suddenly become tame.
4113.name: noivern

4114.text: This is Zygardes form when about half of its pieces have been assembled. It plays the role of monitoring the ecosystem.
4114.name: zygarde

4115.text: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.
4115.name: rowlet

4116.text: It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at opponents. When it simply cant afford to miss, it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.
4116.name: decidueye

4117.text: It can act spoiled if it grows close to its Trainer. A powerful Pokmon, its sharp claws can leave its Trainers whole body covered in scratches.
4117.name: torracat

4118.text: Although its rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.
4118.name: incineroar

4119.text: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesnt know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.
4119.name: brionne

4120.text: It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can get some idea of its mood or condition from the rhythm of its pecking.
4120.name: pikipek

4121.text: It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over a hundred different cries at will.
4121.name: trumbeak

4122.text: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.
4122.name: toucannon

4123.text: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. Its a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
4123.name: yungoos

4124.text: Although it wasnt originally found in Alola, this Pokmon was brought over a long time ago when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.
4124.name: gumshoos

4125.text: If you find its nest, you shouldnt stick your hand inside. Youll get bitten by an irritated Grubbin.
4125.name: grubbin

4126.text: It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely moves, munching away on humus. If you accidentally step on one, youll get a shock!
4126.name: charjabug

4127.text: It has an organ that generates electricity in its abdomen. It concentrates energy in its strong jaws and fires off powerful jolts of electricity.
4127.name: vikavolt

4128.text: Its hard pincers are well suited to both offense and defense. Fights between two Crabrawler are like boxing matches.
4128.name: crabrawler

4129.text: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!
4129.name: crabominable

4130.text: It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.
4130.name: oricorio

4131.text: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.
4131.name: cutiefly

4132.text: Rain makes pollen damp, so Ribombee hates rain. When it sees ominous clouds, it finds a hollow in a tree, where it waits stock-still.
4132.name: ribombee

4133.text: As they develop, their disposition grows more violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them too much to handle and abandon them.
4133.name: rockruff

4134.text: The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. Lycanroc wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.
4134.name: lycanroc

4135.text: Theyre weak, so they move in schools. However, they can also often be seen all alone, having strayed from the school.
4135.name: wishiwashi

4136.text: They eat Corsola branches, so Mareanie are hated by craftsmen who work with Corsola branches that have naturally fallen off.
4136.name: mareanie

4137.text: To attack, this Pokmon sends toxic spikes flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get mown down by the claws on its feet.
4137.name: toxapex

4138.text: It loves playing in the mud. If it isnt showered with mud on a daily basis, it gets stressed out and stops listening to its Trainer.
4138.name: mudbray

4139.text: It remains calm and unmoving no matter the situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its mouth to make a special kind of mud.
4139.name: mudsdale

4140.text: When two Dewpider meet, they display their water bubbles to each other. Then the one with the smaller bubble gets out of the others way.
4140.name: dewpider

4141.text: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.
4141.name: araquanid

4142.text: When the sun rises, Fomantis spreads its four leaves and bathes in the sunlight. The tip of its head has a pleasant aroma.
4142.name: fomantis

4143.text: For self-protection, it pretends to be a bug Pokmon. Both of its arms bear keen-edged petals.
4143.name: lurantis

4144.text: It scatters its shining spores around itself. Even though theyre dangerous, nighttime tours of forests where Morelull live are popular.
4144.name: morelull

4145.text: It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.
4145.name: shiinotic

4146.text: The males will do whatever the females tell them. They give the females most of their food. Due to malnutrition, the males cant evolve.
4146.name: salandit

4147.text: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.
4147.name: salazzle

4148.text: It boasts power enough to split large trees in half. The organ on its rear releases an odor that it uses to communicate with others of its kind.
4148.name: stufful

4149.text: It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesnt run away as fast as possible.
4149.name: bewear

4150.text: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokmon are always after it, but its not intelligent enough to care.
4150.name: bounsweet

4151.text: Its protected by its hard sepals, so it plays with bird Pokmon without worry. They peck it relentlessly, but it doesnt care.
4151.name: steenee

4152.text: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.
4152.name: tsareena

4153.text: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesnt have any flowers, it feels uneasy.
4153.name: comfey

4154.text: It normally spends its time meditating in the treetops. It throws Pok Balls and gives other Pokmon orders as it pleases.
4154.name: oranguru

4155.text: They use their saliva to stick leaves to their shoulders. You can tell what troop they belong to from the position of the leaves.
4155.name: passimian

4156.text: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.
4156.name: wimpod

4157.text: The shell covering its body is as hard as diamond. This Pokmon will do anything it takes to win.
4157.name: golisopod

4158.text: It likes the shovel on its head, so Sandygast will get serious and fight any children who come to take it back.
4158.name: sandygast

4159.text: Each of its grains of sand has its own will. Palossand eats small Pokmon and siphons away their vital essence while theyre still alive.
4159.name: palossand

4160.text: The tradition known as Pyukumuku chucking started from the custom of throwing Pyukumuku back into the sea after they wash onshore.
4160.name: pyukumuku

4161.text: A Pokmon weapon developed for a specific mission, it went berserk during an experiment, so it was cryogenically frozen.
4161.name: typenull

4162.text: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.
4162.name: silvally

4163.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4163.name: minior

4164.text: It stays asleep from the moment its born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.
4164.name: komala

4165.text: It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other minerals. Materials from the food it eats form the basis of its explosive shell.
4165.name: turtonator

4166.text: When its surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.
4166.name: togedemaru

4167.text: Although its a quiet, lonely Pokmon, if you try to look at whats under its rag, it will become agitated and resist violently.
4167.name: mimikyu

4168.text: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.
4168.name: bruxish

4169.text: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, Drampa will find the bullys house and burn it to the ground.
4169.name: drampa

4170.text: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.
4170.name: dhelmise

4171.text: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.
4171.name: jangmoo

4172.text: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.
4172.name: hakamoo

4173.text: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.
4173.name: kommoo

4174.text: Although its called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokmon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.
4174.name: tapukoko

4175.text: It heals the wounds of people and Pokmon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
4175.name: tapulele

4176.text: Although its called a guardian deity, its violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.
4176.name: tapubulu

4177.text: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
4177.name: tapufini

4178.text: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesnt seem to care.
4178.name: cosmog

4179.text: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the cocoon of the stars and built an altar to worship it.
4179.name: cosmoem

4180.text: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.
4180.name: solgaleo

4181.text: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name the beast that calls the moon.
4181.name: lunala

4182.text: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.
4182.name: nihilego

4183.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4183.name: buzzwole

4184.text: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
4184.name: pheromosa

4185.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4185.name: xurkitree

4186.text: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
4186.name: celesteela

4187.text: This Ultra Beasts body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
4187.name: kartana

4188.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4188.name: guzzlord

4189.text: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. Its apparently from another world.
4189.name: necrozma

4190.text: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.
4190.name: magearna

4191.text: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those its imitating.
4191.name: marshadow

4192.text: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
4192.name: poipole

4193.text: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
4193.name: naganadel

4194.text: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
4194.name: stakataka

4195.text: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. Its apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
4195.name: blacephalon

4196.text: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, theyll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
4196.name: zeraora

4197.text: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.
4197.name: rattataalola

4198.text: It has an incredibly greedy personality. Its nest is filled with so much food gathered by Rattata at its direction, it can't possibly eat it all.
4198.name: raticatealola

4199.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4199.name: pikachuoriginal

4200.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4200.name: pikachuhoenn

4201.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4201.name: pikachusinnoh

4202.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4202.name: pikachuunova

4203.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4203.name: pikachukalos

4204.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4204.name: pikachualola

4205.text: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
4205.name: pikachupartner

4206.text: It focuses psychic energy into its tail and rides it like it's surfing. Another name for this Pokmon is hodad.
4206.name: raichualola

4207.text: After fleeing a volcanic eruption, it ended up moving to an area of snowy mountains. Its ice shell is as hard as steel.
4207.name: sandshrewalola

4208.text: It runs across snow-covered plains at high speeds. It developed thick, sharp claws to plow through the snow.
4208.name: sandslashalola

4209.text: If you carelessly approach it because it's cute, the boss of the pack, Ninetales, will appear and freeze you.
4209.name: vulpixalola

4210.text: The reason it guides people all the way down to the mountain's base is that it wants them to hurry up and leave.
4210.name: ninetalesalola

4211.text: Although it's powerful enough to dig right through volcanic rock, it doesn't allow itself to be seen very often.
4211.name: diglettalola

4212.text: It's impulsive, selfish, and fickle. It's very popular with some Trainers who like giving it the attention it needs.
4212.name: meowthalola

4213.text: In contrast to its lovely face, it's so brutal that it tortures its weakened prey rather than finishing them off.
4213.name: persianalola

4214.text: It sends out psychic power from the red organ on its forehead to foresee its opponents' every move.
4214.name: alakazammega

4215.text: If you mistake it for a rock and step on it, it will headbutt you in anger. In addition to the pain, it will also zap you with a shock.
4215.name: geodudealola

4216.text: When two Graveler fight each other, it fills the surroundings with flashes of light and sound. People call it the fireworks of the earth.
4216.name: graveleralola

4217.text: Tremendous energy strengthened the power of the Shellder on its tail, but it doesn't really affect Slowpoke.
4217.name: slowbromega

4218.text: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.
4218.name: grimeralola

4219.text: There are over a hundred kinds of poison inside its body. Chemical reactions between different poisons are the source of its vitality.
4219.name: mukamola

4220.text: It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
4220.name: gengarmega

4221.text: Exeggutor is the pride of the Alolan people. Its image is carved into historical buildings and murals.
4221.name: exeggutoralola

4222.text: The rich greenery of the Alola region is hard on Marowak. It controls fire to stay alive.
4222.name: marowakalola

4223.text: The explosive energy the child is bathed in causes temporary growth. The mother is beside herself with worry about it.
4223.name: kangaskhanmega

4224.text: Mega Evolution places a burden on its body. The stress causes it to become all the more ferocious.
4224.name: gyaradosmega

4225.text: It will attack anything that moves. Mega Evolution is a burden on its body, so it's incredibly irritated.
4225.name: aerodactylmega

4226.text: Excess energy from Mega Evolution stimulates its genes, and the wool it had lost grows in again.
4226.name: ampharosmega

4227.text: It stores the excess energy from Mega Evolution, so after a long time passes, its body starts to melt.
4227.name: scizormega

4228.text: Its red claws and the tips of its tail are melting from high internal temperatures that are painful to Houndoom itself.
4228.name: houndoommega

4229.text: Due to the colossal power poured into it, this Pokmon's back split right open. Its destructive instincts are the only thing keeping it moving.
4229.name: tyranitarmega

4230.text: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, the gemstone on its chest expands, rips through its skin, and falls out.
4230.name: sableyemega

4231.text: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
4231.name: mawilemega

4232.text: The yellow patterns it bears are old scars. The energy from Mega Evolution runs through them, causing it sharp pain and suffering.
4232.name: sharpedomega

4233.text: This is the form Castform takes on bright days. In an experiment where Castform was placed in front of a heater, it didn't change to this form.
4233.name: castformsunny

4234.text: Castform changes to this form when rain hits it. Its body is soft and slightly swollen with water.
4234.name: castformrainy

4235.text: This is the form Castform takes when hit by hail. In an experiment where it was placed in a freezer, it didn't change to this form.
4235.name: castformsnowy

4236.text: Extraordinary energy amplifies its cursing power to such an extent that it can't help but curse its own Trainer.
4236.name: banettemega

4237.text: Normally, it dislikes fighting, so it really hates changing to this form for battles.
4237.name: absolmega

4238.text: The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.
4238.name: salamencemega

4239.text: Its intellect surpasses its previous level, resulting in battles so cruel, they'll make you want to cover your eyes.
4239.name: metagrossmega

4240.text: When it senses danger, it gushes a purple liquid. Some theories suggest this liquid is a greasy sweat induced by stress.
4240.name: shelloseast

4241.text: When it's attacked, it gushes a purple liquid that's not poisonous but makes Gastrodon's meat bitter and inedible.
4241.name: gastrodoneast

4242.text: Its arms and wings melted into something like scythes. Mad with rage, it rampages on and on.
4242.name: garchompmega

4243.text: Its aura has expanded due to Mega Evolution. Governed only by its combative instincts, it strikes enemies without mercy.
4243.name: lucariomega

4244.text: Even Basculin, which devours everything it can with its huge jaws, is nothing more than food to organisms stronger than itself.
4244.name: basculinbluestriped

4245.text: This is Zygarde's perfected form. From the orifice on its chest, it radiates high-powered energy that eliminates everything.
4245.name: zygardecomplete

4246.text: It lifts its opponents' spirits with its cheerful dance moves. When they let their guard down, it electrocutes them with a jolt.
4246.name: oricoriopompom

4247.text: It relaxes its opponents with its elegant dancing. When they let their guard down, it showers them with psychic energy.
4247.name: oricoriopau

4248.text: It charms its opponents with its refined dancing. When they let their guard down, it places a curse on them that will bring on their demise.
4248.name: oricoriosensu

4249.text: It has no problem ignoring orders it doesn't like. It doesn't seem to mind getting hurt at allas long as it can finish off its opponent.
4249.name: lycanrocmidnight

4250.text: Bathed in the setting sun of evening, Lycanroc has undergone a special kind of evolution. An intense fighting spirit underlies its calmness.
4250.name: lycanrocdusk

4251.text: Wishiwashi assemble in this formation to face off against strong foes. It boasts a strength that earned it the name demon of the sea.
4251.name: wishiwashischool

4252.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4252.name: silvallyfighting

4253.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4253.name: silvallyflying

4254.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4254.name: silvallypoison

4255.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4255.name: silvallyground

4256.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4256.name: silvallyrock

4257.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4257.name: silvallybug

4258.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4258.name: silvallyghost

4259.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4259.name: silvallysteel

4260.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4260.name: silvallyfire

4261.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4261.name: silvallywater

4262.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4262.name: silvallygrass

4263.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4263.name: silvallyelectric
