4264.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4264.name: silvallypsychic

4265.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4265.name: silvallyice

4266.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4266.name: silvallydragon

4267.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4267.name: silvallydark

4268.text: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battlejust like a certain Pokmon depicted in legends.
4268.name: silvallyfairy

4269.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4269.name: miniormeteororange

4270.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4270.name: miniormeteoryellow

4271.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4271.name: miniormeteorgreen

4272.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4272.name: miniormeteorblue

4273.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4273.name: miniormeteorindigo

4274.text: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokmon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
4274.name: miniormeteorviolet

4275.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4275.name: miniorred

4276.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4276.name: miniororange

4277.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4277.name: minioryellow

4278.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4278.name: miniorgreen

4279.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4279.name: miniorblue

4280.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4280.name: miniorindigo

4281.text: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
4281.name: miniorviolet

4282.text: It stands in front of a mirror, trying to fix its broken neck as if its life depended on it. It has a hard time getting it right, so it's crying inside.
4282.name: mimikyubusted

4283.text: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
4283.name: necrozmaduskmane

4284.text: Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.
4284.name: necrozmadawnwings

4285.text: This is its form when it has absorbed overwhelming light energy. It fires laser beams from all over its body.
4285.name: necrozmaultra

4286.text: This is its form from almost 500 years ago. Its body is nothing more than a containerits artificial heart is the actual life-form.
4286.name: magearnaoriginal

4287.text: Its body is soft and weak. In nature, its perpetual fate is to be seen by others as food.
4287.name: caterpie

4288.text: Its hard shell doesnt crack a bit even if Pikipek pecks at it, but it will tip over, spilling out its insides.
4288.name: metapod

4289.text: Nectar from pretty flowers is its favorite food. In fields of flowers, it has heated battles with Cutiefly for territory.
4289.name: butterfree

4290.text: This Pokmon is common but hazardous. Its sharp incisors can easily cut right through hard wood.
4290.name: rattata

4291.text: Its whiskers are essential for maintaining its balance. No matter how friendly you are, it will get angry and bite you if you touch its whiskers.
4291.name: raticate

4292.text: Due to its short wings, it cant fly long distances. It wanders about restlessly and pecks at bug Pokmon.
4292.name: spearow

4293.text: In Alola, fish Pokmon are its prey. It can be seen circling above the ocean searching for food.
4293.name: fearow

4294.text: The eggs of bird Pokmon are its favorite food. It swallows eggs whole, so sometimes an egg gets stuck, and Ekans faints.
4294.name: ekans

4295.text: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.
4295.name: arbok

4296.text: While sleeping, it generates electricity in the sacs in its cheeks. If its not getting enough sleep, it will be able to use only weak electricity.
4296.name: pikachu

4297.text: Because so many Trainers like the way Pikachu looks, you dont see this Pokmon very often.
4297.name: raichu

4298.text: When its skin gets wrinkled from moisture, it heads for a volcano. It lies flat on a spot with a lot of geothermal heat and dries itself out.
4298.name: sandshrew

4299.text: Thanks to its thick claws, its good at climbing trees. There are plenty of Sandslash that park themselves in trees and go right to sleep.
4299.name: sandslash

4300.text: Bathed in moonlight, its wings glow faintly. Without even flapping, Clefairy rises into the air, where it dances around.
4300.name: clefairy

4301.text: Some scientists believe that it gazes intently at the sky on nights with a full moon because its homesick.
4301.name: clefable

4302.text: It manipulates balls of fire to catch its prey. If you raise one from when its young, it will grow close to you like a puppy Pokmon.
4302.name: vulpix

4303.text: The flickering flames it spews from its mouth leave its opponents hypnotized. Then, this extremely intelligent Pokmon attacks.
4303.name: ninetales

4304.text: The songs they sing are totally different depending on the region they live in. Some even sound like theyre shouting!
4304.name: jigglypuff

4305.text: When it gets angry, it inhales with all its might, and its body gradually inflates. Sometimes they can grow 20 times larger!
4305.name: wigglytuff

4306.text: Their skin is so thin that theyll be burned if sunlight hits them. When it gets cold out, they gather together to warm one anothers bodies.
4306.name: zubat

4307.text: They can suck down over 10 ounces of blood in one go. They have been known to drink so much blood that they can no longer fly.
4307.name: golbat

4308.text: The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are controlling the bug. Even if the bug bugs the mushrooms, they tell it to bug off.
4308.name: paras

4309.text: Its poisonous spores are also used in traditional medicine. Apparently, spores produced in Alola are not of very good quality.
4309.name: parasect

4310.text: Around their crops, farmers plant the kind of tree that Diglett like to eat as a way of getting Diglett to plow the fields for them.
4310.name: diglett

4311.text: Dugtrios heads are sleek and smooth and incredibly hard. It can dig through any soil with its headbutts.
4311.name: dugtrio

4312.text: It loves coins, so if you give it one, you can make friends with Meowth easily. But its fickle, so you cant count on that friendship lasting.
4312.name: meowth

4313.text: This Pokmon is popular with rich people. Its also targeted by hunters who are after the jewel in its forehead.
4313.name: persian

4314.text: It has been found that its brain cells are 10 times more active when Psyduck is experiencing a headache.
4314.name: psyduck

4315.text: A professional swimmer, it can continue swimming for two days straight by waving its long tail skillfully.
4315.name: golduck

4316.text: If one gets angry, all the others around it will get angry, so silence is a rare visitor in a troop of Mankey.
4316.name: mankey

4317.text: The blood vessels in its brain are sturdier than those of other Pokmon, so it can stay healthy despite its constant raging.
4317.name: primeape

4318.text: It has lived alongside humans since ages ago. Its bones have been found in excavations of ruins from the Stone Age.
4318.name: growlithe

4319.text: There are so many old tales about them that theyre called legendary Pokmon, but there are way more of them around than youd expect.
4319.name: arcanine

4320.text: The direction of the swirl on their stomachs differs depending on where they live. Poliwag aficionados can tell them apart at a glance.
4320.name: poliwag

4321.text: Its health suffers when its skin dries out, so be sure to moisturize it diligently.
4321.name: poliwhirl

4322.text: The muscles it has developed through swimming are thick and powerful. When it lands a square punch, it can turn huge boulders to dust.
4322.name: poliwrath

4323.text: It can read others minds and will teleport away when danger approaches. You must clear your mind if you want to catch it.
4323.name: abra

4324.text: It possesses strong mental capabilities, but its psychic powers are halved when its not holding a silver spoon.
4324.name: kadabra

4325.text: If it trusts someone deeply, it will let them have one of its spoons. Anything you eat with that spoon is apparently delicious.
4325.name: alakazam

4326.text: It likes food thats highly nutritious because its instincts drive it to build muscle efficiently.
4326.name: machop

4327.text: A popular motif for sculptures, its incredibly well-developed muscles have captured the imagination of many an artist.
4327.name: machoke

4328.text: With four arms, it can attack and defend simultaneously. Its said to have mastered every martial art in the world.
4328.name: machamp

4329.text: Its body is 99% water. The remaining 1% contains the organ that makes its poison.
4329.name: tentacool

4330.text: It communicates with others of its kind by lighting up the red orbs on its head. When the orbs are blinking, its a warning sign.
4330.name: tentacruel

4331.text: It uses both hands to climb precipitous cliffs. People who see it in action have been known to take up bouldering.
4331.name: geodude

4332.text: It travels by rolling down cliffs. If it falls into a river, it will explode with its last gasp.
4332.name: graveler

4333.text: It detonates its own body. The power from that explosion can propel it up steep mountain paths with amazing speed.
4333.name: golem

4334.text: Although their tails, which fall off naturally, can easily be found lying around, theyre a precious ingredient for cooking.
4334.name: slowpoke

4335.text: Shellder, in its greed to suck out more and more sweetness from Slowbros tail, has metamorphosed into a spiral-shaped shell.
4335.name: slowbro

4336.text: Perhaps because electrical lines are often buried these days, the number of Magnemite attacks on power plants has increased.
4336.name: magnemite

4337.text: When rain clouds form, many Magneton gather in high places to wait for lightning to strike.
4337.name: magneton

4338.text: Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas dont bother it at all, but it gets tired pretty easily in warm waters.
4338.name: seel

4339.text: It sunbathes on the beach after meals. The rise in its body temperature helps its digestion.
4339.name: dewgong

4340.text: The wastewater coming from factories is clean these days, so Grimer have nothing to eat. Theyre said to be on the verge of extinction.
4340.name: grimer

4341.text: Because they scatter germs everywhere, theyve long been targeted for extermination, leading to a steep decline in their population.
4341.name: muk

4342.text: Even when its shell is closed, its tongue still hangs out. If you give its tongue a good yank, the shock will cause Shellder to open its shell.
4342.name: shellder

4343.text: Slowpoke tails are its favorite food. It has even been known to come up on land to look for Slowpoke from time to time.
4343.name: cloyster

4344.text: Poisonous gas comprises 95% of its body. Its said that the remaining 5% is made up of the souls of those who died from the gas.
4344.name: gastly

4345.text: Its dangerous to go outside alone on nights when youre feeling sad. Haunter will catch you, and you wont be able to go back home.
4345.name: haunter

4346.text: Even your home isnt safe. Gengar will lurk in whatever dark corner of a room it can find and wait for its chance to catch its prey.
4346.name: gengar

4347.text: It puts its prey to sleep and devours their dreams. It seems that bad dreams taste sour, so Drowzee doesnt particularly like eating them.
4347.name: drowzee

4348.text: There are some Hypno that assist doctors with patients who cant sleep at night in hospitals.
4348.name: hypno

4349.text: Although they are the same size as other Exeggcute, the ones produced in Alola are quite heavy. Their shells are packed full.
4349.name: exeggcute

4350.text: Each of its three heads has its own thoughts. When they want to go in different directions, Exeggutor becomes unable to move.
4350.name: exeggutor

4351.text: It wears its mothers skull on its head, so no one knows what its bare face looks like. However, its clear that its always crying.
4351.name: cubone

4352.text: They thump their bones rhythmically to communicate among themselves. There are nearly 50 different rhythmic patterns.
4352.name: marowak

4353.text: It licks filth clean with its tongue. Whatever it licks always stinks afterward, so whether its really clean is...questionable.
4353.name: lickitung

4354.text: Because the eggs on their bellies have been overharvested by people in the past, the Chansey population remains very small.
4354.name: chansey

4355.text: You shouldnt get close to the child when its playing outside its mothers pouch. Its mother is always nearby watching over it.
4355.name: kangaskhan

4356.text: The way it swims along fluttering its dress-like fins has earned it the name princess of the water.
4356.name: goldeen

4357.text: To attract females, males dance on the rivers floor. The females gather around the male that dances most gracefully.
4357.name: seaking

4358.text: No number of injuries can bother Staryu. Its amazing regenerative powers return it to its previous state in half a day!
4358.name: staryu

4359.text: It rotates its geometrically shaped body to swim through the water. It always seems to be sending out mysterious radio waves.
4359.name: starmie

4360.text: It creates invisible walls with its pantomiming. If you dont act impressed, it will attack you with a double slap!
4360.name: mrmime

4361.text: Some call it a ninja. Its movements imperceptibly quickare sufficient to cleave the air in two. Its very popular in Alola.
4361.name: scyther

4362.text: Its strange cries sound like human language. There are some musicians who compose songs for Jynx to sing.
4362.name: jynx

4363.text: While its often blamed for power outages, the truth is the cause of outages is more often an error on the part of the electric company.
4363.name: electabuzz

4364.text: The hotter the place, the better they feel. Magmar in Alola are said to be hardier than those in other areas.
4364.name: magmar

4365.text: Although its tough, it cant handle cold well. When night falls, it buries itself in leafage and sleeps.
4365.name: pinsir

4366.text: The climate seems to be related to the reason Tauros in Alola are a little calmer than those in other regions.
4366.name: tauros

4367.text: Thanks to their strong hold on life, dirty water doesnt bother them at all. They live in waters all over the world!
4367.name: magikarp

4368.text: The energy from evolution stimulated its brain cells strongly, causing it to become very ferocious.
4368.name: gyarados

4369.text: Theyve been so cherished that theres now an overabundance. The fish Pokmon population has declined in waters with too many Lapras.
4369.name: lapras

4370.text: It transforms into whatever it sees. If the thing its transforming into isnt right in front of it, Ditto relies on its memoryso sometimes it fails.
4370.name: ditto

4371.text: Its genes are easily influenced by its surroundings. Even its face starts to look like that of its Trainer.
4371.name: eevee

4372.text: It detects nearby moisture with its fin. When its fin begins trembling rapidly, that means rain will fall in a few hours.
4372.name: vaporeon

4373.text: Its fur stands on end, becoming like needles it fires at enemies. Once theyre weakened, it finishes them off with a 10,000 volt shock.
4373.name: jolteon

4374.text: The flame chamber inside its body ignites when Flareon gets agitated, reaching temperatures of up to 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
4374.name: flareon

4375.text: It was built 20 years ago by scientists who dreamed of exploring space. Their dreams have yet to come true.
4375.name: porygon

4376.text: It was restored from an ancient fossil. Those Helix Fossils are excavated from areas that were once oceans long, long ago.
4376.name: omanyte

4377.text: It wraps its prey in its tentacles to immobilize them and then finishes them off with its sharp fangs.
4377.name: omastar

4378.text: This Pokmon became extinct everywhere, except in a few areas. It protects itself with its hard shell.
4378.name: kabuto

4379.text: It swims at speeds of roughly 29 knots, quickly closing in on its prey and slashing into them with its scythes to finish them off.
4379.name: kabutops

4380.text: It flew through the open skies over the ancient continent as if they were its own. When it touched ground, its walk was weak and slow.
4380.name: aerodactyl

4381.text: It has no interest in anything other than eating. Even if you climb up on its stomach while its napping, it doesnt seem to mind at all!
4381.name: snorlax

4382.text: It sheds its skinalmost on a daily basisand grows larger. Its skin is soft just after its been shed.
4382.name: dratini

4383.text: Some say that if you see it at the start of the year, flying through the sky and twisting its body, youll be healthy all year long.
4383.name: dragonair

4384.text: Youll often hear tales of this kindhearted Pokmon rescuing people or Pokmon that are drowning.
4384.name: dragonite

4385.text: It cries out at the same time every day. A long time ago, people cherished it and considered it a divine messenger sent to tell the time.
4385.name: hoothoot

4386.text: When it turns its head entirely upside down, you know its troubled by something. If you dont leave it be, it will peck you.
4386.name: noctowl

4387.text: These very cowardly Pokmon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.
4387.name: ledyba

4388.text: It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to you, good things will happen to you.
4388.name: ledian

4389.text: Although the poison from its fangs isnt that strong, its potent enough to weaken prey that gets caught in its web.
4389.name: spinarak

4390.text: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.
4390.name: ariados

4391.text: It feeds on the blood of living people and Pokmon. If it cant drink any blood for even a short while, it becomes weak and unable to fly.
4391.name: crobat

4392.text: Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one another to claim their respective turf.
4392.name: chinchou

4393.text: It lives far down in the depths of the ocean. It blinds its prey with light, using the moment theyre dazzled to swallow them whole.
4393.name: lanturn

4394.text: It has electric sacs in its cheeks. When theyre fully charged, Pichu plays very energetically.
4394.name: pichu

4395.text: Said to have ridden here on a shooting star, Cleffa seem to appear in places where meteorites have struck in the past.
4395.name: cleffa

4396.text: Left to its own devices, it will constantly practice singing. You should make it take a break so it doesnt hurt its throat.
4396.name: igglybuff

4397.text: The look in its eyes gives the impression that its carefully observing you. If you approach it, Natu will hop away.
4397.name: natu

4398.text: While it can see the future, it has no desire to change it, which is probably why it remains motionless at all times.
4398.name: xatu

4399.text: Rubbing its fleece generates electricity. Youll want to pet it because its cute, but if you use your bare hand, youll get a painful shock.
4399.name: mareep

4400.text: It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it stores up too much, it will start to go bald in those patches.
4400.name: flaaffy

4401.text: Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.
4401.name: ampharos

4402.text: The result of its holding the same pose all the time is arms that have become supple yet strong.
4402.name: sudowoodo

4403.text: The longer and more luxurious the curled hair on its head, the greater the number of Poliwag and Poliwhirl that will obey it.
4403.name: politoed

4404.text: It searches for prey from the tops of trees. When it spots its favorite food, Bounsweet, Aipom gets excited and pounces.
4404.name: aipom

4405.text: Psychic power builds up in the orb on its forehead as it bathes in the sunshine. Espeon is not good at battling at night.
4405.name: espeon

4406.text: It lurks in the dark of night looking for prey. At the moment it pounces, the rings on its body glow dimly but ominously.
4406.name: umbreon

4407.text: It searches for shiny things for its boss. Murkrows presence is said to be unlucky, so many people detest it.
4407.name: murkrow

4408.text: Its called the sage of the sea. It engages in battles of wits with Oranguru, but the result is usually a draw.
4408.name: slowking

4409.text: What makes it happy is imitating the voices of weeping people and scaring everyone. It doesnt deal well with folks who arent easily frightened.
4409.name: misdreavus

4410.text: It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva, making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco are ridiculously huge.
4410.name: pineco

4411.text: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
4411.name: forretress

4412.text: When it sees a person, it digs a hole with its tail to make its escape. If you happen to find one, consider yourself lucky.
4412.name: dunsparce

4413.text: In contrast to its appearance, its quite timid. When playing with other puppy Pokmon, it sometimes gets bullied.
4413.name: snubbull

4414.text: Although its popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so its totally incompetent as a watchdog.
4414.name: granbull

4415.text: Once it has identified something as an enemy, it will continue beating them with its steel-hard pincers until theres nothing left but scraps.
4415.name: scizor

4416.text: It roams through forests searching for sweet nectar. Although it boasts fantastic physical strength, its not that good at flying.
4416.name: heracross

4417.text: It blends into the dark of night to ambush its prey. Sneasel will attack Sandshrew, but its hard skin can cause Sneasels claws to snap off.
4417.name: sneasel

4418.text: In Alola, where their natural enemies Mareanie are plentiful, many Corsola have stubby branches on their heads.
4418.name: corsola

4419.text: Also known as the sniper of the seas, its water gun can hit prey without fail from over 300 feet away.
4419.name: remoraid

4420.text: It usually sleeps in caves. The pitch-black ink that Octillery spits is also used for cooking.
4420.name: octillery

4421.text: It wraps food in its tail to carry it around. The Delibird with the biggest tail is the boss of the flock!
4421.name: delibird

4422.text: Many people have taken up surfing because they admire how magnificently Mantine swims.
4422.name: mantine

4423.text: Its body is draped in steel armor. It looks heavy, but it can fly at speeds of up to 185 miles an hour!
4423.name: skarmory

4424.text: They make repeated eerie howls before dawn to call attention to their pack.
4424.name: houndour

4425.text: Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long time ago thought it was the grim reaper and feared it.
4425.name: houndoom

4426.text: Even though it doesnt die in the vacuum of space, it cant move around very well in zero gravity.
4426.name: porygon2

4427.text: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
4427.name: smeargle

4428.text: Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochums lips are kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.
4428.name: smoochum

4429.text: When its horns shine a bluish white, thats the sign its fully charged. Youll get a shocking jolt if you touch it!
4429.name: elekid

4430.text: Its body temperature is always around 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. If Magby falls into a small- enough pond, the whole thing will dry up.
4430.name: magby

4431.text: Its milk is delicious and chock-full of nutrients. However, if you drink too much, it could make your stomach hurt, so be careful.
4431.name: miltank

4432.text: This Pokmon is overflowing with love. Only Chansey that share a strong bond with their Trainer can evolve, so people say.
4432.name: blissey

4433.text: Raised on nutrients it finds in the dirt, it eats roughly a mountains worth of dirt before it becomes a pupa.
4433.name: larvitar

4434.text: This dangerous pupa thrashes about. Its shell is as hard as bedrock, containing its gradually forming new body within.
4434.name: pupitar

4435.text: This Pokmon is a mobile disaster, leaving mountains crumbled and houses destroyed in its wake.
4435.name: tyranitar

4436.text: It builds nests in cliffs by the sea. It circles the skies above the ocean looking for its favorite foodWishiwashi.
4436.name: wingull

4437.text: It scoops up Wishiwashi in its huge beak and swallows them whole. It can devour more than 30 at one go!
4437.name: pelipper

4438.text: It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider, whose habitat and diet are similar.
4438.name: surskit

4439.text: Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent. It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.
4439.name: masquerain

4440.text: Theres a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.
4440.name: makuhita

4441.text: Hariyama that are big and fat arent necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
4441.name: hariyama

4442.text: It hunts without twitching a muscle by pulling in its prey with powerful magnetism. But sometimes it pulls natural enemies in close.
4442.name: nosepass

4443.text: It has two mouths. The big jaws on the back of its head cant taste anything, so thats the mouth it uses to eat foods it doesnt like.
4443.name: mawile

4444.text: Static electricity builds up all over its body as strands of its long fur rub together. This Pokmon boasts incredible speed.
4444.name: electrike

4445.text: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.
4445.name: carvanha

4446.text: It drinks in seawater and jets it from its rear to propel itself. Its very sensitive to the scent of blood.
4446.name: sharpedo

4447.text: Due to their memories of when they once lived on land, pods of them will, very rarely, wash up on shore.
4447.name: wailmer

4448.text: When a small Wailmer is attacked by Sharpedo or Dhelmise, its whole pod works together to protect it.
4448.name: wailord

4449.text: It burns coal to produce energy. When it has burned through all of its coal, it becomes unable to move.
4449.name: torkoal

4450.text: Each Spindas spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents attacks brilliantly!
4450.name: spinda

4451.text: It builds nests that double as traps, lying in wait for its prey to get caught. When night falls, it digs itself a spot beneath the sand to sleep.
4451.name: trapinch

4452.text: It vibrates its wings to send out odd sound waves. Trainers who are with it need earplugs.
4452.name: vibrava

4453.text: People continue to have their hearts stolen by its enchanting songs and find themselves stranded in the desert.
4453.name: flygon

4454.text: Its whiskers are filled with nerves. They can sense smells and flavors just as a persons nose or tongue would.
4454.name: barboach

4455.text: Its vision is not that good. It senses vibrations in the water with its whiskers to determine the location of its prey.
4455.name: whiscash

4456.text: It can adapt very well to its environment. Feebas and Corphish are about the only Pokmon to live in stagnant ditches.
4456.name: corphish

4457.text: Its pincers often fall off. Unlike with Crabrawler or Clauncher, the meat in its claws is utterly nasty and stinking.
4457.name: crawdaunt

4458.text: When they find others of their kind, they cry out loudly and gather together. Large numbers of them can be found in old graveyards.
4458.name: baltoy

4459.text: The ancient people who made it apparently modeled it after something that descended from the sky. It fires beams from both arms.
4459.name: claydol

4460.text: It sticks to rocks with its powerful suckers and cant be washed away no matter how rough the surf gets.
4460.name: lileep

4461.text: This carnivorous Pokmon lived in primordial seas. It catches prey in its eight tentacles and dissolves them with digestive fluid as it eats.
4461.name: cradily

4462.text: This is one kind of primeval bug Pokmon. With eight wings, it could apparently swim a lot faster than youd expect.
4462.name: anorith

4463.text: Armaldo adapted from living in water to living on land. It has been determined that it is the ancestor of some bug Pokmon.
4463.name: armaldo

4464.text: Because of its wretched appearance, most people pay it no attention, but there are some who collect Feebasand Feebas alone!
4464.name: feebas

4465.text: Its dwelling place is the bottom of big lakes. Those who behold its loveliness are said to have their hearts purified.
4465.name: milotic

4466.text: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castforms disposition!
4466.name: castform

4467.text: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
4467.name: kecleon

4468.text: Theres a proverb that says, Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.
4468.name: shuppet

4469.text: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
4469.name: banette

4470.text: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.
4470.name: tropius

4471.text: The elderly call it the disaster Pokmon and detest it, but interest in its power to predict disasters is on the rise.
4471.name: absol

4472.text: Rich people from cold areas all share childhood memories of playing with Snorunt.
4472.name: snorunt

4473.text: Its actual body is a rock that isnt particularly hard. Glalie absorbs moisture from the air and drapes itself in an armor of ice.
4473.name: glalie

4474.text: Clamperls pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellders pearls.
4474.name: clamperl

4475.text: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
4475.name: huntail

4476.text: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokmon.
4476.name: gorebyss

4477.text: The reason it hasnt changed at all in a hundred million years is that its apparently already a perfect life-form.
4477.name: relicanth

4478.text: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsolas branches.
4478.name: luvdisc

4479.text: Some theories suggest that its behavior of forcefully bashing its head into things stimulates cells that affect its evolution.
4479.name: bagon

4480.text: Shelgon lives deep within caves. It stays shut up in its hard shell, dreaming of the day it will be able to fly.
4480.name: shelgon

4481.text: Thanks to its fervent wishes, the cells in its body finally mutated, and at last it has its hearts desirewings.
4481.name: salamence

4482.text: If you anger it, it will do more than rampage. It will also burst out strong magnetism, causing nearby machines to break.
4482.name: beldum

4483.text: It flies at high speeds around the skies. When it finds its prey, Metang takes a firm grip with its sharp claws and never lets go.
4483.name: metang

4484.text: It analyzes its opponents with more accuracy than a supercomputer, which enables it to calmly back them into a corner.
4484.name: metagross

4485.text: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.
4485.name: cranidos

4486.text: This ancient Pokmon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.
4486.name: rampardos

4487.text: Although its fossils can be found in layers of primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever been discovered.
4487.name: shieldon

4488.text: This Pokmon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.
4488.name: bastiodon

4489.text: When it senses danger, a purple liquid oozes out of it. The liquid is thought to be something like greasy sweat.
4489.name: shellos

4490.text: Their shape and color change, depending on their environment and diet. There are many of them at beaches where the waves are calm.
4490.name: gastrodon

4491.text: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, thats proof it really likes you.
4491.name: ambipom

4492.text: Wandering souls gathered together to form this Pokmon. When trying to make friends with children, Drifloon grabs them by the hand.
4492.name: drifloon

4493.text: The raw material for the gas inside its body is souls. When its body starts to deflate, its thought to carry away people and Pokmon.
4493.name: drifblim

4494.text: The reason it keeps one ear rolled up is so it can launch a swift counterattack if its attacked by an enemy.
4494.name: buneary

4495.text: Its notably wary and has a dislike of fighting, but at the same time, it can deliver powerful kicks with its lithe legs.
4495.name: lopunny

4496.text: Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches or terrifying visions that torment others.
4496.name: mismagius

4497.text: Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it. The only time it dirties its own hands is in delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.
4497.name: honchkrow

4498.text: If its body gets too damp, it will die. So, in a process reminiscent of sweating, its eyes expel moisture.
4498.name: bonsly

4499.text: When this gifted mimic surprises an opponent, Mime Jr. feels so happy that it ends up forgetting it was imitating something.
4499.name: mimejr

4500.text: When it sees something round and white, Happiny puts it into the pouch on its stomach. It sometimes becomes overloaded and cant move.
4500.name: happiny

4501.text: Its original home is an area much hotter than Alola. If youre planning to live with one, your heating bill will soar.
4501.name: gible

4502.text: It sheds its skin and gradually grows larger. Its scales can be ground into a powder and used as raw materials for traditional medicine.
4502.name: gabite

4503.text: Its fine scales dont just reduce wind resistancetheir sharp edges also cause injury to any opponent who attacks it.
4503.name: garchomp

4504.text: Anything that looks edible, Munchlax will go on and swallow whole. Its stomach is tough enough to handle it even if the food has gone rotten.
4504.name: munchlax

4505.text: It uses waves called auras to communicate with others of its kind. It doesnt make any noise during this time, so its enemies cant detect it.
4505.name: riolu

4506.text: Lucario reads its opponents feelings with its aura waves. It finds out things it would rather not know, so it gets stressed out easily.
4506.name: lucario

4507.text: It lures in prey with its shining tail fins. It stays near the surface during the day and moves to the depths when night falls.
4507.name: finneon

4508.text: They traverse the deep waters as if crawling over the seafloor. The fantastic lights of its fins shine like stars in the night sky.
4508.name: lumineon

4509.text: Mantyke are friendly toward people and will approach boats closely. The patterns on their backs differ depending on their habitat.
4509.name: mantyke

4510.text: Thanks to its increased intelligence, scrapping over food is a thing of the past. A scratch from its claws will give you a case of frostbite!
4510.name: weavile

4511.text: There are still people who believe that this Pokmon came from outer space. It emanates a powerful magnetic field.
4511.name: magnezone

4512.text: It uses its tongue much more skillfully than its hands or its feet. It can deftly pick up a single small bean with its tongue.
4512.name: lickilicky

4513.text: A single Electivire can provide enough electricity for all the buildings in a big city for a year.
4513.name: electivire

4514.text: Magmortar takes down its enemies by shooting fireballs, which burn them to a blackened crisp. It avoids this method when hunting prey.
4514.name: magmortar

4515.text: It gets its nutrition from photosynthesis. It lives a quiet life deep in forests where clean rivers flow.
4515.name: leafeon

4516.text: It can instantaneously freeze any moisture thats around it, creating ice pellets to shoot at its prey.
4516.name: glaceon

4517.text: A faulty update was added to its programming. Its behavior is noticeably strange, so the experiment may have been a failure.
4517.name: porygonz

4518.text: It uses three small units to catch prey and battle enemies. The main body mostly just gives orders.
4518.name: probopass

4519.text: Its said that on nights of terrible blizzards, it comes down to human settlements. If you hear it knocking at your door, do not open it!
4519.name: froslass

4520.text: This Pokmon is popular with beginners because its intelligent, obedient to its Trainers commands, and easy to raise.
4520.name: lillipup

4521.text: It has been living with people for so long that portrayals of it can be found on the walls of caves from long, long ago.
4521.name: herdier

4522.text: Its fur is long and thick. A long time ago in cold regions, every household kept a Stoutland.
4522.name: stoutland

4523.text: It was found in a fissure in a layer of exposed rock. The material that makes up its body is dirt from several hundred years ago.
4523.name: roggenrola

4524.text: Its orange crystals are lumps of powerful energy. Theyre valuable, so Boldore is sometimes targeted for them.
4524.name: boldore

4525.text: It absorbs rays of sunlight and shoots out energy. Its usually lurking deep beneath the surface.
4525.name: gigalith

4526.text: When attacked, it expels cotton from its body to create a diversion. The cotton it loses grows back in quickly.
4526.name: cottonee

4527.text: Whimsicott doesnt live in a fixed location. It floats around on whirling winds, appearing all over the place to perform its mischief.
4527.name: whimsicott

4528.text: They prefer clean water and soil. When the environment they live in turns bad, the whole bunch will up and move to a new area.
4528.name: petilil

4529.text: Its well liked by other Pokmon because of its beauty. The flower on its head needs constant care, or it will soon wither and rot.
4529.name: lilligant

4530.text: When a school of Basculin appears in a lake, everything else disappears, except for Corphish and Crawdaunt. Thats how violent Basculin are.
4530.name: basculin

4531.text: Sandiles still not good at hunting, so it mostly eats things that have collapsed in the desert. Its called the cleaner of the desert.
4531.name: sandile

4532.text: It buries some of its prey in the sand to use as emergency meals when its hunts are unsuccessful.
4532.name: krokorok

4533.text: It conceals itself in sandstorms that Flygon whip up and waits patiently for prey to appear.
4533.name: krookodile

4534.text: It stretches its saggy skin up to its neck to protect itself. The saggier their skin, the more respect they garner.
4534.name: scraggy

4535.text: It taunts its opponents by spitting. It has a certain territory that it never leaves its whole life long.
4535.name: scrafty

4536.text: Its hunting grounds encompassed a broad area, from the land to more than half a mile deep in the ocean.
4536.name: tirtouga

4537.text: Carracosta eats every last bit of the prey it catches, even the shells and bones, to further strengthen its sturdy shell.
4537.name: carracosta

4538.text: Restored from a fossil, this ancient bird Pokmon has wings but cant yet fly.
4538.name: archen

4539.text: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokmon, the muscles it uses to flap its wings are still weak, so it needs a long runway in order to take off.
4539.name: archeops

4540.text: If a young Pokmon or child breathes in the toxic gas that Trubbish belches out, it could be a life-threatening situation.
4540.name: trubbish

4541.text: Some say the reason Garbodor in Alola are a little stronger than their counterparts elsewhere is the presence of Muk, their natural enemy.
4541.name: garbodor

4542.text: If a normally talkative child suddenly stops talking, it may have been replaced by Zorua.
4542.name: zorua

4543.text: If it thinks humans are going to discover its den, Zoroark shows them visions that make them wander around in the woods.
4543.name: zoroark

4544.text: When the morning sun hit an icicle, it wished not to melt, and thus Vanillite was born. At night, it buries itself in snow to sleep.
4544.name: vanillite

4545.text: This hearty Pokmon survived the Ice Age. Its incredibly popular in very hot regions.
4545.name: vanillish

4546.text: Vanilluxe is born when two Vanillish, half-melted by the days light, stick to each other and freeze together in the cold return of night.
4546.name: vanilluxe

4547.text: As it flies, it scatters electricity around, so bird Pokmon keep their distance. Thats why Emolga can keep all its food to itself.
4547.name: emolga

4548.text: Using the invisible poison spikes on its veillike arms and legs, it paralyzes its enemies and causes them to drown.
4548.name: frillish

4549.text: Fishermen are terrified of Jellicent. Its rumored to drag them into the sea and steal their lives away.
4549.name: jellicent

4550.text: The reason it helps Pokmon in a weakened condition is that any Pokmon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.
4550.name: alomomola

4551.text: This Pokmon is shrouded in mystery. Its said to have appeared from a UFO that fell from the sky about 50 years ago.
4551.name: elgyem

4552.text: It has strong psychic powers. Using its fingers that flash three different colors, it controls its opponents and rewrites their memories.
4552.name: beheeyem

4553.text: It infiltrates tunnels that Pokmon like Diglett and Dugtrio have dug and quietly waits for prey to pass through.
4553.name: druddigon

4554.text: Although ancient people apparently built it by working with clay, the source of its energy is unclear.
4554.name: golett

4555.text: It follows Bisharps orders to a tee when it attacks enemies. After slashing an opponent, Pawniard clangs both of its blades together.
4555.name: pawniard

4556.text: It leads a group of Pawniard. Bisharp doesnt even change its expression when it deals the finishing blow to an opponent.
4556.name: bisharp

4557.text: Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in order to gain their acceptance.
4557.name: rufflet

4558.text: Known as the hero of the skies, this Pokmon is so proud and so brave that it will never retreat, even when its injured.
4558.name: braviary

4559.text: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.
4559.name: larvesta

4560.text: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokmon that were suffering from the cold.
4560.name: volcarona

4561.text: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.
4561.name: fletchling

4562.text: Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in the top speed class of all bird Pokmon.
4562.name: fletchinder

4563.text: Bird Pokmon make up most of its diet. It approaches at high speeds and smacks them down to the ground with its powerful kick.
4563.name: talonflame

4564.text: This hot-blooded Pokmon is filled with curiosity. When it gets angry or starts fighting, its short mane gets hot.
4564.name: litleo

4565.text: The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesnt use it on its prey. This Pokmon prefers to eat raw meat.
4565.name: pyroar

4566.text: Flabb wears a crown made from pollen its collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.
4566.name: flabebe

4567.text: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.
4567.name: floette

4568.text: Its life can span several hundred years. Its said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.
4568.name: florges

4569.text: Its desperate to intimidate its opponents. Be nice and pretend to be scared if you catch it glaring at you intensely.
4569.name: pancham

4570.text: Pangoro is the type to talk with its fists. It doesnt say much as it pummels opponents with enough force to send a dump truck flying.
4570.name: pangoro

4571.text: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.
4571.name: furfrou

4572.text: When exchanging information with others of its kind, it flashes the light-emitting spots on its body in a complex rhythm.
4572.name: inkay

4573.text: It flashes the pattern on its torso to control its prey and draw them in. The edges of its fins are supremely sharp.
4573.name: malamar

4574.text: Its not good at swimming, so it clings to the seaweed. In the Alola region, its often found near Dhelmise.
4574.name: skrelp

4575.text: It blends in with seaweed to ambush its prey and then takes them down with a poisonous liquid strong enough to melt metal.
4575.name: dragalge

4576.text: It moves around by jetting water from its right pincer. It has a poor sense of balance, so its terrible at swimming straight.
4576.name: clauncher

4577.text: Its right arm is packed with meat. When its pincer falls off, its exported to be used as a cooking ingredient.
4577.name: clawitzer

4578.text: Tyrunt is spoiled and selfish. It may just be trying to frolic, but sometimes the ones its trying to frolic with are gravely injured.
4578.name: tyrunt

4579.text: The king of the ancient world, it can easily crunch a car with the devastating strength of its enormous jaws.
4579.name: tyrantrum

4580.text: Amaura was restored successfully, but its not expected to live long because of the heat of the current environment.
4580.name: amaura

4581.text: This usually quiet and kindly Pokmon has a surface temperature of around 240 degrees Fahrenheit.
4581.name: aurorus

4582.text: Sylveon wraps its ribbonlike feelers around its Trainers arm because this touch enables it to read its Trainers feelings.
4582.name: sylveon

4583.text: In combat, Hawlucha leaps nimbly about, taking advantage of its opponents blind spots. Its also skilled at using superb submission holds.
4583.name: hawlucha

4584.text: Its upper whiskers are sensors that survey its surroundings. Its lower whiskers are organs that shoot electricity.
4584.name: dedenne

4585.text: To keep the jewels on their bodies free of tarnish, packs of Carbink use their soft manes to polish one anothers jewels.
4585.name: carbink

4586.text: Its body is mostly water. If it dries out, it will die, so its always sitting with perfect stillness in the shade.
4586.name: goomy

4587.text: Its entire body is covered with gooey mucus that can dissolve anything. Be sure to put gloves on if youre going to touch it.
4587.name: sliggoo

4588.text: Underneath its slimy skin is a thick layer of fat, and the combination of the two makes enemies attacks slide right off.
4588.name: goodra

4589.text: Long ago it lived in mines, but once the minerals that make up its diet became scarcer, Klefki began appearing in human settlements.
4589.name: klefki

4590.text: An unknown spirit came to lodge in a tree stump, creating this Pokmon. A cure-all can be made from an infusion of its green leaves.
4590.name: phantump

4591.text: This Pokmon controls trees via roots stretching from its feet, and it will attack anyone that dares to ravage the forest.
4591.name: trevenant

4592.text: It flies around in search of fruit to eat. It uses ultrasonic waves to detect which fruits are ripe.
4592.name: noibat

4593.text: This hot-blooded Pokmon attacks anything it sees with ultrasonic waves that can crush boulders.
4593.name: noivern

4594.text: Some say it can change to an even more powerful form when battling those who threaten the ecosystem.
4594.name: zygarde

4595.text: Supremely sensitive to the presence of others, it can detect opponents standing behind it, flinging its sharp feathers to take them out.
4595.name: dartrix

4596.text: Decidueye can nock and fire an arrow at an enemy in a tenth of a second, so its battles are decided in the blink of an eye.
4596.name: decidueye

4597.text: Its coat regrows twice a year. When the time comes, Litten sets its own body on fire and burns away the old fur.
4597.name: litten

4598.text: When its mane is standing on end, you can tell its feeling good. When it isnt feeling well, its fur will lie down flat.
4598.name: torracat

4599.text: Popplio gets on top of its bouncy water balloons to jump higher. Its quite the acrobatic fighter!
4599.name: popplio

4600.text: It attacks by smacking its enemies with the exploding water balloons that it creates.
4600.name: brionne

4601.text: It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times per second!
4601.name: pikipek

4602.text: From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise to new plants.
4602.name: trumbeak

4603.text: Known for forming harmonious couples, this Pokmon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a good luck charm.
4603.name: toucannon

4604.text: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.
4604.name: yungoos

4605.text: Patient by nature, this Pokmon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favorite mealRattata!
4605.name: gumshoos

4606.text: It spits a sticky thread to stop opponents in their tracks, and then it grabs them in its sharp, sturdy mandibles to take them down.
4606.name: grubbin

4607.text: Its stout shell provides excellent defense from attacks. It uses electricity on persistent opponents.
4607.name: charjabug

4608.text: Vikavolt flusters opponents with acrobatic flying maneuvers. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electric beam attack.
4608.name: vikavolt

4609.text: Crabrawler has been known to mistake Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.
4609.name: crabrawler

4610.text: Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling. There are records of its turning back avalanches with a flurry of punches.
4610.name: crabominable

4611.text: This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokmon becomes fiercely angry.
4611.name: oricorio

4612.text: Cutiefly can pick up the auras of living things. It skillfully reads those auras to predict its foes movements and make fools of them.
4612.name: cutiefly

4613.text: It can predict the weather from moisture levels and wind direction. Ribombee only reveals itself when there are a few clear days in a row.
4613.name: ribombee

4614.text: When it rubs the rocks on its neck against you, thats proof of its love for you. However, the rocks are sharp, so the gesture is quite painful!
4614.name: rockruff

4615.text: The rocks in its mane are sharper than a knife. Fragments that break off are treasured as good luck charms.
4615.name: lycanroc

4616.text: When its in a jam, its shining eyes attract others of its kind. The light from its eyes is visible almost 25 miles away.
4616.name: wishiwashi

4617.text: Aside from its head, its body parts regenerate quickly if theyre cut off. After a good nights sleep, Mareanie is back to normal.
4617.name: mareanie

4618.text: With its 12 legs, it creates a dome to shelter within. The flow of the tides doesnt affect Toxapex in there, so its very comfortable.
4618.name: toxapex

4619.text: Possessing mighty power, Mudbray can be loaded with 50 times its own body weight and will be totally fine.
4619.name: mudbray

4620.text: It can trudge mountain roads without rest for three days and three nights, all the while dragging a 10-ton load.
4620.name: mudsdale

4621.text: It can only breathe oxygen that has dissolved in water, so it wears a water bubble on its head when it walks around on land.
4621.name: dewpider

4622.text: It has a habit of storing things it values in its water bubble. If its Trainer doesnt watch out, Araquanid will try to put them in its bubble!
4622.name: araquanid

4623.text: It loves the sunshine. When it basks in the sunlight regularly, it grows up with vivid coloration.
4623.name: fomantis

4624.text: As it slashes into its enemies, it looks like its dancing. Its elegant appearance has led some to call it the most glamorous Grass Pokmon.
4624.name: lurantis

4625.text: It likes damp dark places. When night falls, the spores filling the caps of its mushrooms glow.
4625.name: morelull

4626.text: When it starts fighting for territory with Parasect, the entire area gets completely coated in spores!
4626.name: shiinotic

4627.text: It weakens opponents and sends them reeling with its poisonous gas. Salandit doesnt deal well with Spinda, since its always reeling.
4627.name: salandit

4628.text: It punishes Salandit that couldnt bring it food with a fierce slap of its flame-spewing palm.
4628.name: salazzle

4629.text: Stufful hates to be hugged or touched in any way. It will squirm, thrash, and resist with amazing power.
4629.name: stufful

4630.text: It boasts tremendous physical strength. Many people call it the most dangerous Pokmon in the Alola region.
4630.name: bewear

4631.text: It tries to resist being swallowed by a bird Pokmon by spinning the sepals on its head. Its usually a fruitless attempt.
4631.name: bounsweet

4632.text: It bounces around, swinging the sepals on its head with abandon. Theyre quite painful when they smack you!
4632.name: steenee

4633.text: A Pokmon with an aggressive personality and a mastery of kicking, it cackles every time it kicks an opponent.
4633.name: tsareena

4634.text: It picks flowers and sticks them to its body with fluids it produces. The aroma that wafts from its petals has a healing effect.
4634.name: comfey

4635.text: Oranguru dont get along with each other, so theyre always engaging in battles of wits to decide which one is superior.
4635.name: oranguru

4636.text: Berries are its weapons as well as the staple of its diet. The one that can throw a berry the farthest is the boss of the troop.
4636.name: passimian

4637.text: An astonishingly cowardly Pokmon, Wimpod will whir its legs at high speeds to run away if anything comes near it.
4637.name: wimpod

4638.text: Its claws, which it can extend and retract at will, are its greatest weapons. Golisopod is sometimes accompanied by Wimpod.
4638.name: golisopod

4639.text: If you build sand mounds when youre playing, destroy them before you go home, or they may get possessed and become Sandygast.
4639.name: sandygast

4640.text: Once it has whipped up a sandstorm to halt its opponents in their tracks, this terrifying Pokmon snatches away their vitality.
4640.name: palossand

4641.text: Its entire body is covered in its own slime. If you accidentally step on one, youll slip, and it will get mad and smack you!
4641.name: pyukumuku

4642.text: Theres danger of its going on a rampage, so its true power is sealed away beneath its control mask.
4642.name: typenull

4643.text: Through the bond it formed with its Trainer, its will was strengthened, and it was able to destroy its control mask.
4643.name: silvally

4644.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4644.name: minior

4645.text: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative properties of the leaves that form its diet.
4645.name: komala

4646.text: Its exploding shell poses a real danger but is sensitive to moisture. On rainy days, Turtonator takes silent refuge in caves.
4646.name: turtonator

4647.text: Its capacity to produce electricity is somewhat limited, so it gets charged up by letting lightning strike it!
4647.name: togedemaru

4648.text: A gust of wind revealed what hides under this Pokmons rag to a passing Trainer, who went home and died painfully that very night.
4648.name: mimikyu

4649.text: Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanies spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches up the spikes and eats them.
4649.name: bruxish

4650.text: It appears in towns and plays with the children. Drampa will protect kids when theyre in danger, so their moms dont have to worry.
4650.name: drampa

4651.text: Its chain-like green seaweed can stretch outward for hundreds of yards. For some reason, it gets along well with Skrelp.
4651.name: dhelmise

4652.text: It will never show an enemy its back in battle. Ancient warriors liked Jangmo-o for its valiant disposition and made it one of their own.
4652.name: jangmoo

4653.text: The scales it sheds can be molded and processed to make pots and pans. They conduct heat well, so theyre a popular item.
4653.name: hakamoo

4654.text: It battles valiantly with its fists, which are armored in steel scales. Kommo-o specializes in uppercuts.
4654.name: kommoo

4655.text: The lightning-wielding guardian deity of Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity and appears before people from time to time.
4655.name: tapukoko

4656.text: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.
4656.name: tapulele

4657.text: It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts. This guardian deity of Ulaula controls plants.
4657.name: tapubulu

4658.text: Although its called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.
4658.name: tapufini

4659.text: Whether or not its a Pokmon from this world is a mystery. When its in a jam, it warps away to a safe place to hide.
4659.name: cosmog

4660.text: As it absorbs light, Cosmoem continues to grow. Its golden shell is surprisingly solid.
4660.name: cosmoem

4661.text: In writings from the distant past, its called by the name the beast that devours the sun.
4661.name: solgaleo

4662.text: It sometimes summons unknown powers and life-forms here to this world from holes that lead to other worlds.
4662.name: lunala

4663.text: It appeared in this world from an Ultra Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokmon.
4663.name: nihilego

4664.text: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.
4664.name: buzzwole

4665.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4665.name: pheromosa

4666.text: Theyve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of them stand unmoving, like trees, with their arms and legs stuck into the ground.
4666.name: xurkitree

4667.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4667.name: celesteela

4668.text: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
4668.name: kartana

4669.text: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungryit is certainly always devouring something.
4669.name: guzzlord

4670.text: Light is the source of its energy. If it isnt devouring light, impurities build up in it and on it, and Necrozma darkens and stops moving.
4670.name: necrozma

4671.text: Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist, the part called the Soul-Heart is the actual life-form.
4671.name: magearna

4672.text: It sinks into the shadows of people and Pokmon, where it can understand their feelings and copy their capabilities.
4672.name: marshadow

4673.text: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.
4673.name: poipole

4674.text: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.
4674.name: naganadel

4675.text: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brutes true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.
4675.name: stakataka

4676.text: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents surprise to rob them of their vitality.
4676.name: blacephalon

4677.text: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then tears them limb from limb with its sharp claws.
4677.name: zeraora

4678.text: Night after night, they sneak into people's homes seeking food. A massive outbreak of them has become an issue of public concern.
4678.name: rattataalola

4679.text: It commands a nest of Rattata. Different nests don't get along, whipping up severe fights over feeding grounds.
4679.name: raticatealola

4680.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4680.name: pikachuoriginal

4681.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4681.name: pikachuhoenn

4682.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4682.name: pikachusinnoh

4683.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4683.name: pikachuunova

4684.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4684.name: pikachukalos

4685.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4685.name: pikachualola

4686.text: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
4686.name: pikachupartner

4687.text: When you rub its cheeks, a sweet fragrance comes wafting out. However, you'll also get a light shock!
4687.name: raichualola

4688.text: The skin on its back is as hard as steel. Predators go after its soft belly, so it clings to the ground desperately.
4688.name: sandshrewalola

4689.text: Some said that deities visited mountains where Ninetales live, so in times long past, no one was allowed to go into those mountains.
4689.name: ninetalesalola

4690.text: The need to dig through volcanic rock in the ground has made them more powerful than the Diglett of other regions.
4690.name: diglettalola

4691.text: A royal house that flourished in the distant past brought it here from another region. Meowth is both selfish and prideful.
4691.name: meowthalola

4692.text: Its round face is a symbol of wealth. Persian that have bigger, plumper faces are considered more beautiful.
4692.name: persianalola

4693.text: Geodude compete against each other with headbutts. The iron sand on their heads will stick to whichever one has stronger magnetism.
4693.name: geodudealola

4694.text: It shoots large rocks that are charged with electricity. Tremendous electric shocks are flung out across the whole area of impact.
4694.name: golemalola

4695.text: Having been swallowed whole by Shellder, Slowbro now has an iron defense. It's pretty comfortable in there, too.
4695.name: slowbromega

4696.text: Brought to Alola to solve the garbage problem, Grimer seems to relish any and all kinds of trash.
4696.name: grimeralola

4697.text: What look like fangs and claws are actually crystallized poison that will afflict you at a mere touch, so don't get too close.
4697.name: mukamola

4698.text: Mega Evolution has made it possible for Gengar to access other dimensions. Its entire body is brimming with strange power.
4698.name: gengarmega

4699.text: When it beats opponents with its bone, the cursed flames spread to them. No amount of water will stop those flames from burning.
4699.name: marowakalola

4700.text: When the mother sees the back of her Mega-Evolved child, it makes her think of the day when her child will inevitably leave her.
4700.name: kangaskhanmega

4701.text: It zips around at blistering speeds, looking for an opening to skewer its opponent on its giant pincers.
4701.name: pinsirmega

4702.text: It zooms out of the water at Mach speeds. Even large ships caught in its path are split cleanly in two!
4702.name: gyaradosmega

4703.text: Mega Evolution awakened some dormant genes, bringing back the sharp rocks that once covered Aerodactyl's entire body.
4703.name: aerodactylmega

4704.text: It's better at beating things than grasping them. When it battles for a long time, the weight of its pincers becomes too much to bear.
4704.name: scizormega

4705.text: A tremendous influx of energy builds it up, but when Mega Evolution ends, Heracross is bothered by terrible soreness in its muscles.
4705.name: heracrossmega

4706.text: It blocks any and all attacks with its giant-sized gemstone. However, the stone's a heavy burden, and it limits Mega Sableye's movements.
4706.name: sableyemega

4707.text: The moment it charges into its opponent, sharp spikes pop out of Sharpedo's head, leaving its opponent with deep wounds.
4707.name: sharpedomega

4708.text: Castform changes to this form when it basks in bright sunlight. When you touch its glowing skin, it feels all dried out!
4708.name: castformsunny

4709.text: This is Castform's form when pelted by rain. In an experiment where it was placed in a shower, this Pokmon didn't change to this form.
4709.name: castformrainy

4710.text: This is Castform's form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!
4710.name: castformsnowy

4711.text: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.
4711.name: absolmega

4712.text: The power of Mega Evolution was so strong that it smashed Glalie's jaw. Its inability to eat very well leaves Glalie irritated.
4712.name: glaliemega

4713.text: When it knows it can't win, it digs the claws on its legs into its opponent and starts the countdown to a big explosion.
4713.name: metagrossmega

4714.text: Scientists interested in its great regenerative capabilities are currently analyzing the materials from which its cells are made.
4714.name: shelloseast

4715.text: A relative of Shellder and Cloyster, this ocean dweller sometimes comes onto land in search of food.
4715.name: gastrodoneast

4716.text: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.
4716.name: lopunnymega

4717.text: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.
4717.name: lucariomega

4718.text: Some people call it the thug of the lake. Whether the differences in color are meaningful is not yet known.
4718.name: basculinbluestriped

4719.text: Born when around 10% of Zygarde's cells have been gathered from all over, this form is skilled in close-range combat.
4719.name: zygarde10

4720.text: This Oricorio has drunk bright yellow nectar. When it sees someone looking glum, it will try to cheer them up with a dance.
4720.name: oricoriopompom

4721.text: This Oricorio has sipped pink nectar. It gets so caught up in its dancing that it sometimes doesn't hear its Trainer's orders.
4721.name: oricoriopau

4722.text: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Some dancers use its graceful, elegant dancing as inspiration.
4722.name: oricoriosensu

4723.text: They live alone without forming packs. They will only listen to orders from Trainers who can draw out their true power.
4723.name: lycanrocmidnight

4724.text: This strange form is the result of its evolving at dusk. It's very rare in Alola.
4724.name: lycanrocdusk

4725.text: Called demon of the sea by some, when Wishiwashi are injured in battle and their numbers dwindle, they become a regular school.
4725.name: wishiwashischool

4726.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4726.name: silvallyfighting

4727.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4727.name: silvallyflying

4728.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4728.name: silvallypoison

4729.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4729.name: silvallyground

4730.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4730.name: silvallyrock

4731.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4731.name: silvallybug

4732.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4732.name: silvallyghost

4733.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4733.name: silvallysteel

4734.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4734.name: silvallyfire

4735.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4735.name: silvallywater

4736.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4736.name: silvallygrass

4737.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4737.name: silvallyelectric

4738.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4738.name: silvallypsychic

4739.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4739.name: silvallyice

4740.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4740.name: silvallydragon

4741.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4741.name: silvallydark

4742.text: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.
4742.name: silvallyfairy

4743.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4743.name: miniormeteororange

4744.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4744.name: miniormeteoryellow

4745.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4745.name: miniormeteorgreen

4746.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4746.name: miniormeteorblue

4747.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4747.name: miniormeteorindigo

4748.text: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
4748.name: miniormeteorviolet

4749.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4749.name: miniorred

4750.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4750.name: miniororange

4751.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4751.name: minioryellow

4752.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4752.name: miniorgreen

4753.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4753.name: miniorblue

4754.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4754.name: miniorindigo

4755.text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
4755.name: miniorviolet

4756.text: Sad that its true identity may be exposed, Mimikyu will mercilessly seek revenge on any opponent that breaks its neck.
4756.name: mimikyubusted

4757.text: This is Necrozma's form while it's absorbing the power of Solgaleo, making it extremely ferocious and impossible to control.
4757.name: necrozmaduskmane

4758.text: This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.
4758.name: necrozmadawnwings

4759.text: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.
4759.name: necrozmaultra

4760.text: It functions thanks to its artificial soul. The vivid decoration is proof that it was presented as a gift to royalty.
4760.name: magearnaoriginal

4761.text: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
4761.name: bulbasaur

4762.text: The bud on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.
4762.name: ivysaur

4763.text: The flower on its back catches the suns rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.
4763.name: venusaur

4764.text: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.
4764.name: charmander

4765.text: Tough fights could excite this Pokmon. When excited, it may breathe out bluish-white flames.
4765.name: charmeleon

4766.text: When this Pokmon expels a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
4766.name: charizard

4767.text: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.
4767.name: squirtle

4768.text: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.
4768.name: blastoise

4769.text: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
4769.name: caterpie

4770.text: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.
4770.name: metapod

4771.text: Its wings, covered with poisonous powder, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.
4771.name: butterfree

4772.text: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
4772.name: weedle

4773.text: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
4773.name: kakuna

4774.text: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
4774.name: beedrill

4775.text: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
4775.name: pidgey

4776.text: This Pokmon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
4776.name: pidgeotto

4777.text: This Pokmon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
4777.name: pidgeot

4778.text: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
4778.name: rattata

4779.text: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
4779.name: raticate

4780.text: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
4780.name: spearow

4781.text: A Pokmon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
4781.name: fearow

4782.text: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
4782.name: arbok

4783.text: This forest-dwelling Pokmon stores electricity in its cheeks, so youll feel a tingly shock if you touch it.
4783.name: pikachu

4784.text: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
4784.name: raichu

4785.text: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.
4785.name: sandshrew

4786.text: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.
4786.name: sandslash

4787.text: A mild-mannered Pokmon that does not like to fight. Bewareits small horn secretes venom.
4787.name: nidoranf

4788.text: When resting deep in its burrow, its barbs always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.
4788.name: nidorina

4789.text: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pokmon. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.
4789.name: nidoqueen

4790.text: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.
4790.name: nidoranm

4791.text: Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an enemy with the horn, the impact makes the poison leak out.
4791.name: nidorino

4792.text: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.
4792.name: nidoking

4793.text: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.
4793.name: clefairy

4794.text: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.
4794.name: clefable

4795.text: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.
4795.name: vulpix

4796.text: According to an enduring legend, nine noble saints were united and reincarnated as this Pokmon.
4796.name: ninetales

4797.text: Uses its cute round eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.
4797.name: jigglypuff

4798.text: Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
4798.name: wigglytuff

4799.text: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
4799.name: zubat

4800.text: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and to suck blood.
4800.name: golbat

4801.text: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.
4801.name: oddish
