5348.text: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesnt get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
5348.name: swirlix

5349.text: By taking in a persons scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. Its hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
5349.name: slurpuff

5350.text: It spins while making its luminescent spots flash. These spots allow it to communicate with others by using different patterns of light.
5350.name: inkay

5351.text: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamars control.
5351.name: malamar

5352.text: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
5352.name: binacle

5353.text: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
5353.name: barbaracle

5354.text: It drifts in the ocean, blending in with floating seaweed. When other Pokmon come to feast on the seaweed, Skrelp feasts on them instead.
5354.name: skrelp

5355.text: Dragalge uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.
5355.name: dragalge

5356.text: Claunchers claws can fall off during battle, but theyll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is popular as a delicacy in Galar.
5356.name: clauncher

5357.text: After using the feelers on its oversized claw to detect the location of prey, Clawitzer launches a cannonball of water at its target.
5357.name: clawitzer

5358.text: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokmons electric moves.
5358.name: helioptile

5359.text: A now-vanished desert culture treasured these Pokmon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to the Galar region, treasure came with them.
5359.name: heliolisk

5360.text: This is an ancient Pokmon, revived in modern times. It has a violent disposition, and itll tear apart anything it gets between its hefty jaws.
5360.name: tyrunt

5361.text: This Pokmon is from about 100,000,000 years ago. It has the presence of a king, vicious but magnificent.
5361.name: tyrantrum

5362.text: This Pokmon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.
5362.name: amaura

5363.text: Aurorus was restored from a fossil. Its said that when this Pokmon howls, auroras appear in the night sky.
5363.name: aurorus

5364.text: By releasing enmity-erasing waves from its ribbonlike feelers, Sylveon stops any conflict.
5364.name: sylveon

5365.text: It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy finishing move.
5365.name: hawlucha

5366.text: A Dedennes whiskers pick up electrical waves other Dedenne send out. These Pokmon share locations of food or electricity with one another.
5366.name: dedenne

5367.text: When beset by attackers, Carbink wipes them all out by firing high-energy beams from the gems embedded in its body.
5367.name: carbink

5368.text: Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if the weather becomes too arid. Its considered the weakest dragon Pokmon.
5368.name: goomy

5369.text: Although this Pokmon isnt very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
5369.name: sliggoo

5370.text: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers dont mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.
5370.name: goodra

5371.text: This Pokmon is constantly collecting keys. Entrust a Klefki with important keys, and the Pokmon will protect them no matter what.
5371.name: klefki

5372.text: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirits rebirth as this Pokmon.
5372.name: phantump

5373.text: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokmon it shares its woods with, its kind.
5373.name: trevenant

5374.text: Spirits that wander this world are placed into Pumpkaboos body. Theyre then moved on to the afterlife.
5374.name: pumpkaboo

5375.text: Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.
5375.name: gourgeist

5376.text: They chill the air around them to -150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.
5376.name: bergmite

5377.text: At high latitudes, this Pokmon can be found with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims among the icebergs.
5377.name: avalugg

5378.text: After nightfall, they emerge from the caves they nest in during the day. Using their ultrasonic waves, they go on the hunt for ripened fruit.
5378.name: noibat

5379.text: Aggressive and cruel, this Pokmon will ruthlessly torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.
5379.name: noivern

5380.text: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.
5380.name: rowlet

5381.text: It throws one knifelike feather after another at its enemies, and each one precisely strikes a weak point. These feathers are known as blade quills.
5381.name: dartrix

5382.text: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueyes shots never miss.
5382.name: decidueye

5383.text: It spends even the smallest amount of downtime grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves.
5383.name: litten

5384.text: In the midst of battle, the fire pouch on Torracats neck rings like a bell and produces stronger flames than usual.
5384.name: torracat

5385.text: It excels at violent, no-holds-barred battles. The temperature of the flames that issue from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
5385.name: incineroar

5386.text: It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer force of their bursting is what deals damage.
5386.name: popplio

5387.text: As if dancing, it artfully dodges the attacks of its enemies. All the while, its busy forming a bunch of balloons to overwhelm its foes.
5387.name: brionne

5388.text: With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to control its water balloons.
5388.name: primarina

5389.text: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
5389.name: grubbin

5390.text: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
5390.name: charjabug

5391.text: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
5391.name: vikavolt

5392.text: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying to get some of Gossifleurs pollen.
5392.name: cutiefly

5393.text: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
5393.name: ribombee

5394.text: This Pokmon can bond very strongly with its Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.
5394.name: rockruff

5395.text: This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks jutting from its mane are razor sharp.
5395.name: lycanroc

5396.text: Individually, theyre incredibly weak. Its by gathering up into schools that theyre able to confront opponents.
5396.name: wishiwashi

5397.text: The first symptom of its sting is numbness. The next is an itching sensation so intense that its impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.
5397.name: mareanie

5398.text: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokmon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.
5398.name: toxapex

5399.text: Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its own body weight pose no issue for this Pokmon. Its skilled at making use of mud.
5399.name: mudbray

5400.text: Mud that hardens around a Mudsdales legs sets harder than stone. Its so hard that it allows this Pokmon to scrap a truck with a single kick.
5400.name: mudsdale

5401.text: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
5401.name: dewpider

5402.text: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokmon can then take its time to savor its meal.
5402.name: araquanid

5403.text: When bathed in sunlight, this Pokmon emits a pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug Pokmon to gather around it.
5403.name: fomantis

5404.text: This Pokmon resembles a beautiful flower. A properly raised Lurantis will have gorgeous, brilliant colors.
5404.name: lurantis

5405.text: Pokmon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelulls head. The caps regrow overnight.
5405.name: morelull

5406.text: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokmon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
5406.name: shiinotic

5407.text: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokmon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandits poisonous gas.
5407.name: salandit

5408.text: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
5408.name: salazzle

5409.text: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokmon could result in painful retaliation.
5409.name: stufful

5410.text: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerousit could easily shatter your bones.
5410.name: bewear

5411.text: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokmon.
5411.name: bounsweet

5412.text: As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will feel a surge of happiness.
5412.name: steenee

5413.text: This feared Pokmon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
5413.name: tsareena

5414.text: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers wont wither once theyre attached to a Comfey.
5414.name: comfey

5415.text: With waves of its fanmade from leaves and its own furOranguru skillfully gives instructions to other Pokmon.
5415.name: oranguru

5416.text: Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the orders of their boss as they all help out in the search for their favorite berries.
5416.name: passimian

5417.text: Its natures cleanerit eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
5417.name: wimpod

5418.text: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
5418.name: golisopod

5419.text: Grudges of the dead have possessed a mound of sand and become a Pokmon. Sandygast is fond of the shovel on its head.
5419.name: sandygast

5420.text: Palossand is known as the Beach Nightmare. It pulls its prey down into the sand by controlling the sand itself, and then it sucks out their souls.
5420.name: palossand

5421.text: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
5421.name: pyukumuku

5422.text: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokmon being created in the Galar region.
5422.name: typenull

5423.text: A solid bond of trust between this Pokmon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
5423.name: silvally

5424.text: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
5424.name: turtonator

5425.text: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokmon takes in electricity from other electric Pokmon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
5425.name: togedemaru

5426.text: It wears a rag fashioned into a Pikachu costume in an effort to look less scary. Unfortunately, the costume only makes it creepier.
5426.name: mimikyu

5427.text: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
5427.name: drampa

5428.text: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokmon.
5428.name: dhelmise

5429.text: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
5429.name: jangmoo

5430.text: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
5430.name: hakamoo

5431.text: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokmon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
5431.name: kommoo

5432.text: This Pokmon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away.
5432.name: cosmog

5433.text: The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokmons growth. The shell that encases it is harder than any known material.
5433.name: cosmoem

5434.text: When light radiates from its body, this Pokmon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world.
5434.name: solgaleo

5435.text: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokmon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy.
5435.name: lunala

5436.text: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.
5436.name: necrozma

5437.text: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokmon learned the ultimate techniques.
5437.name: marshadow

5438.text: It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its opponents with its high-voltage claws.
5438.name: zeraora

5439.text: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
5439.name: meltan

5440.text: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
5440.name: melmetal

5441.text: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
5441.name: grookey

5442.text: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
5442.name: thwackey

5443.text: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
5443.name: rillaboom

5444.text: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokmons body. Once that happens, its ready to fight at full power.
5444.name: scorbunny

5445.text: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
5445.name: raboot

5446.text: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
5446.name: cinderace

5447.text: When scared, this Pokmon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers wont be able to resist weeping.
5447.name: sobble

5448.text: A clever combatant, this Pokmon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
5448.name: drizzile

5449.text: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.
5449.name: inteleon

5450.text: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokmon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
5450.name: skwovet

5451.text: It stashes berries in its tailso many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokmon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesnt notice the loss.
5451.name: greedent

5452.text: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokmon benefits from every battleeven a defeat increases its strength a bit.
5452.name: rookidee

5453.text: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokmon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
5453.name: corvisquire

5454.text: This Pokmon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
5454.name: corviknight

5455.text: A constant collector of information, this Pokmon is very smart. Very strong is what it isnt.
5455.name: blipbug

5456.text: It barely moves, but its still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
5456.name: dottler

5457.text: Its famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.
5457.name: orbeetle

5458.text: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokmon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.
5458.name: nickit

5459.text: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
5459.name: thievul

5460.text: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
5460.name: gossifleur

5461.text: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokmon can benefit from them.
5461.name: eldegoss

5462.text: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokmon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
5462.name: wooloo

5463.text: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. Youll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
5463.name: dubwool

5464.text: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.
5464.name: chewtle

5465.text: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokmon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
5465.name: drednaw

5466.text: This Pokmon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.
5466.name: yamper

5467.text: This Pokmon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.
5467.name: boltund

5468.text: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokmon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
5468.name: rolycoly

5469.text: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokmon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.
5469.name: carkol

5470.text: Its usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
5470.name: coalossal

5471.text: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokmon, by pretending its just an apple and nothing more.
5471.name: applin

5472.text: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.
5472.name: flapple

5473.text: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokmon it preys on.
5473.name: appletun

5474.text: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
5474.name: silicobra

5475.text: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
5475.name: sandaconda

5476.text: Its so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what its battling midfight.
5476.name: cramorant

5477.text: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokmon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. Its very proud of that jaw.
5477.name: arrokuda

5478.text: This Pokmon has a jaw thats as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewdas flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
5478.name: barraskewda

5479.text: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokmon, a tingling sensation follows.
5479.name: toxel

5480.text: When this Pokmon sounds as if its strumming a guitar, its actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.
5480.name: toxtricity

5481.text: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
5481.name: sizzlipede

5482.text: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
5482.name: centiskorch

5483.text: Its very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
5483.name: clobbopus

5484.text: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokmon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
5484.name: grapploct

5485.text: This Pokmon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.
5485.name: sinistea

5486.text: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.
5486.name: polteageist

5487.text: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures emotions. If you dont have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.
5487.name: hatenna

5488.text: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokmon, it will silence you violently.
5488.name: hattrem

5489.text: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.
5489.name: hatterene

5490.text: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokmon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.
5490.name: impidimp

5491.text: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, its trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.
5491.name: morgrem

5492.text: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokmon can overwhelm even Machamp.
5492.name: grimmsnarl

5493.text: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shoutthis move is known as Obstruct.
5493.name: obstagoon

5494.text: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokmon lives for the thrill of battle.
5494.name: perrserker

5495.text: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokmons core spirit.
5495.name: cursola

5496.text: Only Farfetchd that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokmons leek withers, it will retire from combat.
5496.name: sirfetchd

5497.text: Its highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
5497.name: mrrime

5498.text: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
5498.name: runerigus

5499.text: This Pokmon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
5499.name: milcery

5500.text: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries its decorated with cream.
5500.name: alcremie

5501.text: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.
5501.name: pincurchin

5502.text: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.
5502.name: snom

5503.text: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than -290 degrees Fahrenheit.
5503.name: frosmoth

5504.text: It stands in grasslands, watching the suns descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokmon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.
5504.name: stonjourner

5505.text: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.
5505.name: eiscue

5506.text: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.
5506.name: indeedee

5507.text: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokmon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. Its also generating electricity.
5507.name: morpeko

5508.text: It digs up the ground with its trunk. Its also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.
5508.name: cufant

5509.text: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.
5509.name: copperajah

5510.text: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.
5510.name: dracozolt

5511.text: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.
5511.name: arctozolt

5512.text: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.
5512.name: dracovish

5513.text: Though its able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.
5513.name: arctovish

5514.text: Its body resembles polished metal, and its both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.
5514.name: duraludon

5515.text: After being reborn as a ghost Pokmon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.
5515.name: dreepy

5516.text: Its capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
5516.name: drakloak

5517.text: When it isnt battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.
5517.name: dragapult

5518.text: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokmon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.
5518.name: zacian

5519.text: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.
5519.name: zamazenta

5520.text: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.
5520.name: eternatus

5521.text: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.
5521.name: kubfu

5522.text: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.
5522.name: urshifu

5523.text: Within dense forests, this Pokmon lives in a pack with others of its kind. Its incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokmon of the forest fear it.
5523.name: zarude

5524.text: This Pokmon is a cluster of electrical energy. Its said that removing the rings on Regielekis body will unleash the Pokmons latent power.
5524.name: regieleki

5525.text: An academic theory proposes that Regidragos arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokmon. The theory remains unproven.
5525.name: regidrago

5526.text: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. Its also a belligerent Pokmonanything it wants, it takes by force.
5526.name: glastrier

5527.text: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save oneit doesnt use its sense of sight. Spectriers kicks are said to separate soul from body.
5527.name: spectrier

5528.text: Calyrex is a merciful Pokmon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.
5528.name: calyrex

5529.text: This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is brimming with memories of when they first met.
5529.name: pikachupartner

5530.text: It's believed that the weather, climate, and food of the Alola region all play a part in causing Pikachu to evolve into this form of Raichu.
5530.name: raichualola

5531.text: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokmon a body of ice that's as hard as steel.
5531.name: sandshrewalola

5532.text: It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this Sandslash is faster than any other Pokmon.
5532.name: sandslashalola

5533.text: After long years in the ever-snowcapped mountains of Alola, this Vulpix has gained power over ice.
5533.name: vulpixalola

5534.text: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokmon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity's incarnation.
5534.name: ninetalesalola

5535.text: The metal-rich geology of this Pokmon's habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.
5535.name: diglettalola

5536.text: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on their heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.
5536.name: dugtrioalola

5537.text: It's accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. As a result, it's very picky about food.
5537.name: meowthalola

5538.text: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokmon's body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.
5538.name: meowthgalar

5539.text: The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so these Pokmon are very well cared for.
5539.name: persianalola

5540.text: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokmon's horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.
5540.name: ponytagalar

5541.text: Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed from this Pokmon's horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.
5541.name: rapidashgalar

5542.text: The Farfetch'd of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.
5542.name: farfetchdgalar

5543.text: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokmon.
5543.name: exeggutoralola

5544.text: This Pokmon sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.
5544.name: marowakalola

5545.text: This Pokmon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.
5545.name: weezinggalar

5546.text: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokmon can kick up to use as a barrier.
5546.name: mrmimegalar

5547.text: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.
5547.name: articunogalar

5548.text: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity. That's why this Pokmon is called Zapdos.
5548.name: zapdosgalar

5549.text: This Pokmon's sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.
5549.name: moltresgalar

5550.text: Watch your step when wandering areas oceans once covered. What looks like a stone could be this Pokmon, and it will curse you if you kick it.
5550.name: corsolagalar

5551.text: Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokmon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.
5551.name: zigzagoongalar

5552.text: It uses its long tongue to taunt opponents. Once the opposition is enraged, this Pokmon hurls itself at the opponent, tackling them forcefully.
5552.name: linoonegalar

5553.text: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It's full of energy while it's like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
5553.name: cherrimsunshine

5554.text: There's speculation that its appearance is determined by what it eats, but the truth remains elusive.
5554.name: shelloseast

5555.text: It secretes a purple fluid to deter enemies. This fluid isn't poisonousinstead, it's super sticky, and once it sticks, it's very hard to unstick.
5555.name: gastrodoneast

5556.text: This Rotom has possessed a convection microwave oven that uses a special motor. It also has a flair for manipulating flames.
5556.name: rotomheat

5557.text: This form of Rotom enjoys coming up with water-based pranks. Be careful with it if you don't want your room flooded.
5557.name: rotomwash

5558.text: Rotom assumes this form when it takes over a refrigerator powered by a special motor. It battles by spewing cold air.
5558.name: rotomfrost

5559.text: In this form, Rotom applies its new power over wind to its love of pranks. It will happily blow away any important documents it can find.
5559.name: rotomfan

5560.text: This is Rotom after it's seized control of a lawn mower that has a special motor. As it mows down grass, it scatters the clippings everywhere.
5560.name: rotommow

5561.text: This Pokmon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.
5561.name: unfezantf

5562.text: Blue-striped Basculin used to be a common food source. They apparently have an inoffensive, light flavor.
5562.name: basculinbluestriped

5563.text: It lived in snowy areas for so long that its fire sac cooled off and atrophied. It now has an organ that generates cold instead.
5563.name: darumakagalar

5564.text: Through meditation, it calms its raging spirit and hones its psychic powers.
5564.name: darmanitanzen

5565.text: On days when blizzards blow through, it comes down to where people live. It stashes food in the snowball on its head, taking it home for later.
5565.name: darmanitangalar

5566.text: Anger has reignited its atrophied flame sac. This Pokmon spews fire everywhere as it rampages indiscriminately.
5566.name: darmanitangalarzen

5567.text: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.
5567.name: yamaskgalar

5568.text: It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws it down to the deeps, five miles below the ocean's surface.
5568.name: frillishf

5569.text: Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky, schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
5569.name: jellicentf

5570.text: The sameness of Reshiram's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Reshiram. Kyurem can now use the power of both fire and ice.
5570.name: kyuremwhite

5571.text: It's said that this Pokmon battles in order to protect the ideal world that will exist in the future for people and Pokmon.
5571.name: kyuremblack

5572.text: When taking spirits to the afterlife, small Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of children to those of adults.
5572.name: pumpkaboosmall

5573.text: When taking spirits to the afterlife, large Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of adults to those of children.
5573.name: pumpkaboolarge

5574.text: Supersized Pumpkaboo are very partial to the spirits of people who were of similarly superior proportions.
5574.name: pumpkaboosuper

5575.text: Supersized Gourgeist aren't picky. They will forcefully drag anyone off to the afterlife.
5575.name: gourgeistsuper

5576.text: This form of Lycanroc is reckless. It charges headlong at its opponents, attacking without any care about what injuries it might receive.
5576.name: lycanrocmidnight

5577.text: This form of Lycanroc is normally calm and quiet. Once a battle begins, however, this Pokmon displays a ferocious fighting spirit.
5577.name: lycanrocdusk

5578.text: On their own, they're very weak. But when Wishiwashi pool their power together in a school, they become a demon of the sea.
5578.name: wishiwashischool

5579.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Fighting type to match the memory it has equipped.
5579.name: silvallyfighting

5580.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Flying type to match the memory it has equipped.
5580.name: silvallyflying

5581.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Poison type to match the memory it has equipped.
5581.name: silvallypoison

5582.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Ground type to match the memory it has equipped.
5582.name: silvallyground

5583.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Rock type to match the memory it has equipped.
5583.name: silvallyrock

5584.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Bug type to match the memory it has equipped.
5584.name: silvallybug

5585.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Ghost type to match the memory it has equipped.
5585.name: silvallyghost

5586.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Steel type to match the memory it has equipped.
5586.name: silvallysteel

5587.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Fire type to match the memory it has equipped.
5587.name: silvallyfire

5588.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Water type to match the memory it has equipped.
5588.name: silvallywater

5589.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Grass type to match the memory it has equipped.
5589.name: silvallygrass

5590.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Electric type to match the memory it has equipped.
5590.name: silvallyelectric

5591.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Psychic type to match the memory it has equipped.
5591.name: silvallypsychic

5592.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Ice type to match the memory it has equipped.
5592.name: silvallyice

5593.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Dragon type to match the memory it has equipped.
5593.name: silvallydragon

5594.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Dark type to match the memory it has equipped.
5594.name: silvallydark

5595.text: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the Fairy type to match the memory it has equipped.
5595.name: silvallyfairy

5596.text: There will be no forgiveness for any who reveal that it was pretending to be Pikachu. It will bring the culprit down, even at the cost of its own life.
5596.name: mimikyubusted

5597.text: When it dominates Solgaleo, it takes on this form. It's a vicious Pokmon, mangling prey with its many clawsincluding those on its back.
5597.name: necrozmaduskmane

5598.text: Necrozma has subjugated Lunala entirely, forcing the unfortunate Pokmon to emit its light energy for Necrozma to consume.
5598.name: necrozmadawnwings

5599.text: Cramorant's gluttony led it to try to swallow an Arrokuda whole, which in turn led to Cramorant getting an Arrokuda stuck in its throat.
5599.name: cramorantgulping

5600.text: This Cramorant has accidentally gotten a Pikachu lodged in its gullet. Cramorant is choking a little, but it isn't really bothered.
5600.name: cramorantgorging

5601.text: Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokmon looks down on all that would challenge it.
5601.name: toxtricitylowkey

5602.text: The swirl pattern in this Pokmon's body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.
5602.name: sinisteantique

5603.text: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
5603.name: polteageistantique

5604.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a sweet and tart flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5604.name: alcremierubycream

5605.text: The moment it evolved, it took on an aromatic flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5605.name: alcremiematchacream

5606.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a refreshing flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5606.name: alcremiemintcream

5607.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a sour flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5607.name: alcremielemoncream

5608.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a salty flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5608.name: alcremiesaltedcream

5609.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a mixed flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5609.name: alcremierubyswirl

5610.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5610.name: alcremiecaramelswirl

5611.text: The moment it evolved, it took on a complex flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
5611.name: alcremierainbowswirl

5612.text: The ice covering this Pokmon's face has shattered, revealing a slightly worried expression that many people are enamored with.
5612.name: eiscuenoice

5613.text: These intelligent Pokmon touch horns with each other to share information between them.
5613.name: indeedeef

5614.text: Intense hunger drives it to extremes of violence, and the electricity in its cheek sacs has converted into a Dark-type energy.
5614.name: morpekohangry

5615.text: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokmon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokmon.
5615.name: zaciancrowned

5616.text: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master's Shield. It was feared and respected by all.
5616.name: zamazentacrowned

5617.text: As a result of Rose's meddling, Eternatus absorbed all the energy in the Galar region. It's now in a state of power overload.
5617.name: eternatuseternamax

5618.text: It's believed that this Pokmon modeled its fighting style on the flow of a riversometimes rapid, sometimes calm.
5618.name: urshifurapidstrike

5619.text: This Zarude left its pack to raise a human child. The cloth Zarude would wrap the child with has a comforting scent that calmed the child's crying.
5619.name: zarudedada

5620.text: According to lore, this Pokmon showed no mercy to those who got in its way, yet it would heal its opponents' wounds after battle.
5620.name: calyrexice

5621.text: It's said that Calyrex and a Pokmon that had bonded with it ran all across the Galar region to bring green to the wastelands.
5621.name: calyrexshadow

5622.text: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
5622.name: bulbasaur

5623.text: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
5623.name: ivysaur

5624.text: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
5624.name: venusaur

5625.text: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
5625.name: charmander

5626.text: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
5626.name: charmeleon

5627.text: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
5627.name: squirtle

5628.text: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
5628.name: wartortle

5629.text: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
5629.name: blastoise

5630.text: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
5630.name: caterpie

5631.text: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It cant withstand a harsh attack.
5631.name: metapod

5632.text: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
5632.name: butterfree

5633.text: When Pikachu meet, theyll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.
5633.name: pikachu

5634.text: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
5634.name: raichu

5635.text: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
5635.name: sandshrew

5636.text: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
5636.name: sandslash

5637.text: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidorans horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a males horn.
5637.name: nidoranf

5638.text: If the group is threatened, these Pokmon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
5638.name: nidorina

5639.text: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
5639.name: nidoqueen

5640.text: Small but brave, this Pokmon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female its friendly with.
5640.name: nidoranm

5641.text: Its nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
5641.name: nidorino

5642.text: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. Its forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
5642.name: nidoking

5643.text: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokmon is rarely found.
5643.name: clefairy

5644.text: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so theyre usually found in quiet places.
5644.name: clefable

5645.text: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.
5645.name: vulpix

5646.text: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
5646.name: ninetales

5647.text: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
5647.name: jigglypuff

5648.text: Its proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture thats perfectly heavenly.
5648.name: wigglytuff

5649.text: Zubat live in caves, down where the suns light wont reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.
5649.name: zubat

5650.text: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokmon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.
5650.name: golbat

5651.text: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
5651.name: oddish

5652.text: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
5652.name: gloom

5653.text: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
5653.name: vileplume

5654.text: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
5654.name: diglett

5655.text: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what its like underground.
5655.name: dugtrio

5656.text: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesnt get along with Galarian Meowth.
5656.name: meowth

5657.text: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
5657.name: persian

5658.text: As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.
5658.name: psyduck

5659.text: Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.
5659.name: golduck

5660.text: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.
5660.name: growlithe

5661.text: A Pokmon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
5661.name: arcanine

5662.text: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokmon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.
5662.name: poliwag

5663.text: This Pokmons sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies grasp and escape.
5663.name: poliwhirl

5664.text: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
5664.name: poliwrath

5665.text: Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.
5665.name: abra

5666.text: This Pokmons telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.
5666.name: kadabra

5667.text: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. Its said that this Pokmon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.
5667.name: alakazam

5668.text: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
5668.name: machop

5669.text: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
5669.name: machoke

5670.text: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
5670.name: machamp

5671.text: This Pokmon is mostly made of water. A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to spot, because its body blends in with the sea.
5671.name: tentacool

5672.text: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch.
5672.name: tentacruel

5673.text: If youve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.
5673.name: ponyta

5674.text: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herds pace and direction of travel.
5674.name: rapidash

5675.text: When this Pokmons tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokmon.
5675.name: slowpoke

5676.text: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokmon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
5676.name: slowbro

5677.text: It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.
5677.name: magnemite

5678.text: This Pokmon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when a Magneton approaches.
5678.name: magneton

5679.text: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.
5679.name: farfetchd

5680.text: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
5680.name: shellder

5681.text: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
5681.name: cloyster

5682.text: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
5682.name: gastly

5683.text: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
5683.name: haunter

5684.text: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
5684.name: gengar

5685.text: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
5685.name: onix

5686.text: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
5686.name: krabby

5687.text: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when its not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
5687.name: kingler

5688.text: These Pokmon get nervous when theyre not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
5688.name: exeggcute

5689.text: When they work together, Exeggutors three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokmon sluggish.
5689.name: exeggutor

5690.text: This Pokmon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubones dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
5690.name: cubone

5691.text: When this Pokmon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowaks temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
5691.name: marowak

5692.text: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
5692.name: hitmonlee

5693.text: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
5693.name: hitmonchan

5694.text: Bug Pokmon are Lickitungs main food source. This Pokmon paralyzes its prey with a lick from its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.
5694.name: lickitung

5695.text: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.
5695.name: koffing

5696.text: It cant suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.
5696.name: weezing

5697.text: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.
5697.name: rhyhorn

5698.text: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
5698.name: rhydon

5699.text: This species was once very slow. To protect their eggs from other creatures, these Pokmon became able to flee quickly.
5699.name: chansey

5700.text: The vines of a Tangela have a distinct scent. In some parts of Galar, Tangela vines are used as herbs.
5700.name: tangela

5701.text: There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.
5701.name: kangaskhan

5702.text: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.
5702.name: horsea

5703.text: Seadras mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food thats larger than the opening of its mouth.
5703.name: seadra

5704.text: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.
5704.name: goldeen

5705.text: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.
5705.name: seaking

5706.text: Fish Pokmon nibble at it, but Staryu isnt bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.
5706.name: staryu

5707.text: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokmon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.
5707.name: starmie

5708.text: Its known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.
5708.name: mrmime

5709.text: If you come across an area in a forest where a lot of the trees have been cut down, what youve found is a Scythers territory.
5709.name: scyther

5710.text: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokmon have even gathered a fan base.
5710.name: jynx

5711.text: With the coming of a storm, many of these Pokmon will gather under tall trees and sit there waiting for lightning to strike.
5711.name: electabuzz

5712.text: These Pokmons bodies are constantly burning. Magmar are feared as one of the causes behind fires.
5712.name: magmar

5713.text: This Pokmon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.
5713.name: pinsir

5714.text: The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in nature, and they wont allow people to ride on their backs.
5714.name: tauros

5715.text: This weak and pathetic Pokmon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.
5715.name: magikarp

5716.text: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
5716.name: gyarados

5717.text: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokmon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.
5717.name: lapras

5718.text: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
5718.name: ditto

5719.text: Its bodys cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.
5719.name: vaporeon

5720.text: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
5720.name: jolteon

5721.text: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
5721.name: flareon

5722.text: In recent years, this species has been very helpful in cyberspace. These Pokmon will go around checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.
5722.name: porygon

5723.text: This Pokmon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like its just drifting along.
5723.name: omanyte

5724.text: Omastars sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokmon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.
5724.name: omastar

5725.text: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.
5725.name: kabuto

5726.text: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokmon that inhabited warm seas.
5726.name: kabutops

5727.text: Aerodactyls sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatterseven the skin of Steel-type Pokmon.
5727.name: aerodactyl

5728.text: This Pokmons stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
5728.name: snorlax

5729.text: This Pokmon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.
5729.name: articuno

5730.text: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokmon. Its said that when Zapdos rubs its feathers together, lightning will fall immediately after.
5730.name: zapdos

5731.text: There are stories of this Pokmon using its radiant, flame-cloaked wings to light up paths for those lost in the mountains.
5731.name: moltres

5732.text: This Pokmon was long considered to be no more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratinis forehead is actually a horn thats still coming in.
5732.name: dratini

5733.text: This Pokmon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.
5733.name: dragonair

5734.text: This Pokmon is known as the Sea Incarnate. Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate the bows of many ships.
5734.name: dragonite

5735.text: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.
5735.name: hoothoot

5736.text: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
5736.name: noctowl

5737.text: This Pokmon flaps its four wings skillfully. Crobat can fly through cramped caves without needing to slow down.
5737.name: crobat

5738.text: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
5738.name: chinchou

5739.text: This Pokmon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.
5739.name: lanturn

5740.text: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.
5740.name: pichu

5741.text: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
5741.name: cleffa

5742.text: Taking advantage of the softness of its body, Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a deep pink when its temperature rises.
5742.name: igglybuff

5743.text: It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.
5743.name: togepi

5744.text: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
5744.name: togetic

5745.text: Because its wings arent yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
5745.name: natu

5746.text: This odd Pokmon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the suns movement all day.
5746.name: xatu

5747.text: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
5747.name: bellossom

5748.text: Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water- repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves the water. Thats why this Pokmon is never cold.
5748.name: marill

5749.text: These Pokmon create air-filled bubbles. When Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them with these bubbles.
5749.name: azumarill

5750.text: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
5750.name: sudowoodo

5751.text: The cry of a male is louder than that of a female. Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find more popularity with the opposite gender.
5751.name: politoed

5752.text: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.
5752.name: wooper

5753.text: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.
5753.name: quagsire

5754.text: It unleashes psychic power from the orb on its forehead. When its power is exhausted, the orb grows dull and dark.
5754.name: espeon

5755.text: On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.
5755.name: umbreon

5756.text: Slowking can solve any problem presented to it, but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.
5756.name: slowking

5757.text: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
5757.name: wobbuffet

5758.text: The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels. They never get lost in their own neststhey can tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.
5758.name: dunsparce

5759.text: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
5759.name: steelix

5760.text: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
5760.name: qwilfish

5761.text: Though its body is slim, Scizor has tremendous attacking power. Even Scizors muscles are made of metal.
5761.name: scizor

5762.text: The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
5762.name: shuckle

5763.text: This Pokmon takes pride in its strength, which allows it to lift things 100 times heavier than itself with no trouble at all.
5763.name: heracross

5764.text: It has a cunning yet savage disposition. It waits for parents to leave their nests, and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.
5764.name: sneasel

5765.text: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
5765.name: swinub

5766.text: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
5766.name: piloswine

5767.text: These Pokmon live in warm seas. In prehistoric times, many lived in the oceans around the Galar region as well.
5767.name: corsola

5768.text: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantines underside to scavenge for leftovers.
5768.name: remoraid

5769.text: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
5769.name: octillery

5770.text: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokmon, so its always scrounging around for more food.
5770.name: delibird

5771.text: As it majestically swims, it doesnt care if Remoraid attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.
5771.name: mantine

5772.text: People fashion swords from Skarmorys shed feathers, so this Pokmon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
5772.name: skarmory

5773.text: Scales shed by this Pokmon have such a splendorous gleam to them that theyve been given to royalty as gifts.
5773.name: kingdra

5774.text: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokmon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
5774.name: porygon2

5775.text: Even though it is small, it cant be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
5775.name: tyrogue

5776.text: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponents timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
5776.name: hitmontop

5777.text: This is a very curious Pokmon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.
5777.name: smoochum

5778.text: Its not good at storing electricity yet. This Pokmon sneaks into peoples homes, looking for electrical outlets to eat electricity from.
5778.name: elekid

5779.text: This Pokmon makes its home near volcanoes. At the end of the day, Magby soaks in magma, resting and recovering from the days fatigue.
5779.name: magby

5780.text: This Pokmon needs to be milked every day, or else it will fall ill. The flavor of Miltank milk changes with the seasons.
5780.name: miltank

5781.text: Blissey lays mysterious eggs that are filled with happiness. Its said that anyone who eats a Blissey egg will start acting kindly to all others.
5781.name: blissey

5782.text: It will not stay still, even while its a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.
5782.name: pupitar

5783.text: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.
5783.name: tyranitar

5784.text: This Pokmon traveled through time to come from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.
5784.name: celebi

5785.text: Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside Galar acquired this appearance. If youve lost something, this Pokmon can likely find it.
5785.name: zigzagoon

5786.text: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
5786.name: linoone

5787.text: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.
5787.name: lotad

5788.text: It lives at the waters edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
5788.name: lombre

5789.text: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
5789.name: ludicolo

5790.text: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
5790.name: seedot

5791.text: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleafs grass flute fills listeners with dread.
5791.name: nuzleaf

5792.text: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
5792.name: shiftry

5793.text: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the seas edge.
5793.name: wingull

5794.text: Skimming the waters surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
5794.name: pelipper

5795.text: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
5795.name: nincada

5796.text: This Pokmon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
5796.name: ninjask

5797.text: A strange Pokmonit flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
5797.name: shedinja

5798.text: When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice startles it, making the Pokmon cry even louder. It cries until its exhausted, then it falls asleep.
5798.name: whismur

5799.text: The force of this Pokmons loud voice isnt just the soundits also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.
5799.name: loudred

5800.text: This Pokmon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, itll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
5800.name: exploud

5801.text: Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry one will swing around the big ball on its tail and try to smash its opponents.
5801.name: azurill

5802.text: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
5802.name: sableye

5803.text: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
5803.name: mawile

5804.text: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Arons shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
5804.name: aron

5805.text: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.
5805.name: lairon

5806.text: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokmons strength.
5806.name: aggron

5807.text: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
5807.name: electrike

5808.text: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
5808.name: manectric

5809.text: These Pokmon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
5809.name: carvanha

5810.text: This Pokmon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attackedno exceptions.
5810.name: sharpedo

5811.text: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
5811.name: wailmer

5812.text: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
5812.name: wailord

5813.text: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
5813.name: torkoal

5814.text: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
5814.name: trapinch

5815.text: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
5815.name: vibrava

5816.text: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
5816.name: flygon

5817.text: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.
5817.name: swablu

5818.text: This Pokmon has a kind disposition, but if its provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
5818.name: altaria

5819.text: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
5819.name: lunatone

5820.text: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
5820.name: solrock

5821.text: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
5821.name: whiscash

5822.text: It was originally a Pokmon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
5822.name: corphish

5823.text: A brutish Pokmon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
5823.name: crawdaunt

5824.text: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
5824.name: baltoy

5825.text: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
5825.name: claydol

5826.text: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokmon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
5826.name: lileep

5827.text: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
5827.name: cradily

5828.text: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokmon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokmon.
5828.name: anorith

5829.text: Though it lives on land, its also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
5829.name: armaldo

5830.text: It is a shabby and ugly Pokmon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
5830.name: feebas

5831.text: Its said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions youre feeling.
5831.name: milotic

5832.text: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
5832.name: duskull

5833.text: It seeks drifting will-o-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
5833.name: dusclops

5834.text: Because of this Pokmons ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
5834.name: absol

5835.text: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
5835.name: wynaut

5836.text: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as -150 degrees Fahrenheit.
5836.name: snorunt

5837.text: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
5837.name: glalie

5838.text: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.
5838.name: spheal

5839.text: This Pokmon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Pok Balls or Spheal.
5839.name: sealeo

5840.text: Walreins tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
5840.name: walrein

5841.text: This Pokmon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasnt changed in 100,000,000 years, so its called a living fossil.
5841.name: relicanth

5842.text: Bagon is a solitary Pokmon that doesnt form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.
5842.name: bagon

5843.text: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.
5843.name: shelgon

5844.text: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokmon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
5844.name: salamence

5845.text: The cells in this Pokmons body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldums body.
5845.name: beldum

5846.text: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokmon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
5846.name: metang

5847.text: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokmon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
5847.name: metagross

5848.text: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokmons rock body, but nothing was foundnot even a brain or a heart.
5848.name: regirock

5849.text: This Pokmons body is made of solid ice. Its said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.
5849.name: regice

5850.text: Its rumored that this Pokmon was born deep underground in the planets mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.
5850.name: registeel

5851.text: Its believed that when this Pokmon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head.
5851.name: jirachi

5852.text: Electricity makes this Pokmons fur glow. Shinx sends signals to others of its kind by shaking the tip of its tail while the tail tip is shining brightly.
5852.name: shinx

5853.text: Upon encountering an opponent, this Pokmon prepares for battle by extending its claws, which can put out 1,000,000 volts of electricity.
5853.name: luxio

5854.text: Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of Luxrays electricity, so the Pokmon sleeps for long periods of time to store up energy.
5854.name: luxray

5855.text: This Pokmon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.
5855.name: budew

5856.text: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
5856.name: roserade

5857.text: It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and the swarm.
5857.name: combee

5858.text: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants.
5858.name: vespiquen

5859.text: The deeper a Cherubis red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!
5859.name: cherubi

5860.text: Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokmon can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim wont be bothered at all.
5860.name: cherrim

5861.text: Subjecting this Pokmon to a strong force causes it to secrete a strange purple fluid. Though harmless, the fluid is awfully sticky.
5861.name: shellos

5862.text: The softness of its body helps disperse the force of impacts, so although its body is uncommonly squishy, its also surprisingly resilient.
5862.name: gastrodon

5863.text: The gathering of many souls gave rise to this Pokmon. During humid seasons, they seem to appear in abundance.
5863.name: drifloon

5864.text: It grabs people and Pokmon and carries them off somewhere. Where do they go? Nobody knows.
5864.name: drifblim

5865.text: Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack becomes stronger with training.
5865.name: buneary

5866.text: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunnys coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.
5866.name: lopunny

5867.text: If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware. Its about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough to make you faint.
5867.name: stunky

5868.text: It digs holes in the ground to make its nest. The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip of its tail is extremely potent.
5868.name: skuntank

5869.text: Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface reflect the truth, according to common lore. Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.
5869.name: bronzor

5870.text: Many scientists suspect that this Pokmon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.
5870.name: bronzong

5871.text: This Pokmon lives in dry, rocky areas. As its green spheres dry out, their dull luster increases.
5871.name: bonsly

5872.text: It looks for a Mr. Rime thats a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rimes steps like an apprentice.
5872.name: mimejr

5873.text: Happinys willing to lend its precious round stone to those its friendly with, but if the stone isnt returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.
5873.name: happiny

5874.text: All Spiritombs mischief and misdeeds compelled a traveler to use a mysterious spell to bind Spiritomb to an odd keystone.
5874.name: spiritomb
