8480.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from snowy lands.
8480.name: vivillonpolar

8481.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands of severe cold.
8481.name: vivillontundra

8482.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands of vast space.
8482.name: vivilloncontinental

8483.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from verdant lands.
8483.name: vivillongarden

8484.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands with distinct seasons.
8484.name: vivillonelegant

8485.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands where flowers bloom.
8485.name: vivillonmeadow

8486.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from sun-drenched lands.
8486.name: vivillonmodern

8487.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands with ocean breezes.
8487.name: vivillonmarine

8488.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from places with many islands.
8488.name: vivillonarchipelago

8489.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands with little rain.
8489.name: vivillonhighplains

8490.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from parched lands.
8490.name: vivillonsandstorm

8491.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands where large rivers flow.
8491.name: vivillonriver

8492.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands with intense rainfall.
8492.name: vivillonmonsoon

8493.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands with a tropical climate.
8493.name: vivillonsavanna

8494.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands bathed in light.
8494.name: vivillonsun

8495.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands of perpetual summer.
8495.name: vivillonocean

8496.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from lands of tropical rain forests.
8496.name: vivillonjungle

8497.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from a mysterious land.
8497.name: vivillonfancy

8498.text: The patterns on this Pokmon depend on the climate and topography of the land it was born in. This form is from a special land.
8498.name: vivillonpokeball

8499.text: This Pokmon spews flames hotter than 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. It swings around its grand, blazing mane as it protects its allies.
8499.name: pyroarmega

8500.text: This Flabb rides a yellow flower. The Pokmon is defenseless and vulnerable before it has found and received power from a flower.
8500.name: flabebeyellow

8501.text: It receives strength from flowers and gives them some of its energy in return. This Pokmon likes orange flowers best of all.
8501.name: flabebeorange

8502.text: This Pokmon likes blue flowers best of all. It floats upward using the power emanating from its flower and bobs along lightly through the air.
8502.name: flabebeblue

8503.text: When evening falls, it searches out a place blooming with flowers of the same white color as its own flower, and then it goes to sleep.
8503.name: flabebewhite

8504.text: This Pokmon can draw forth the power hidden within yellow flowers. This power then becomes the moves Floette uses to protect itself.
8504.name: floetteyellow

8505.text: This Pokmon can draw forth the most power when in sync with orange flowers, compared to flowers of other colors.
8505.name: floetteorange

8506.text: Whenever this Pokmon finds flowering plants that are withering, it will bring them back to its territory and care for them until they are healthy.
8506.name: floetteblue

8507.text: If it finds someone messing up a flower bed, it will attack them without mercy. This Floette takes particularly good care of white flowers.
8507.name: floettewhite

8508.text: This rare Floette holds a plant that died out in ancient times. The Pokmon is said to harbor an incredible power.
8508.name: floetteeternal

8509.text: The Eternal Flower has absorbed all the energy from Mega Evolution. The flower now attacks enemies on its own.
8509.name: floettemega

8510.text: It is said that there was once a Florges that protected the garden of a castle for over 300 years.
8510.name: florgesyellow

8511.text: When Florges attacks, its orange flowers fire off powerful beams as if they were a battery of artillery.
8511.name: florgesorange

8512.text: Blue pigments were tremendously expensive in the past, so paintings of blue Florges are highly valuable.
8512.name: florgesblue

8513.text: A flower garden made by a white-flowered Florges will be beautifully decorated with flowering plants of many different colors.
8513.name: florgeswhite

8514.text: Females are a bit more selfish and aggressive than males. If they don't get what they want, they will torment you with their psychic abilities.
8514.name: meowsticf

8515.text: This stance is dedicated to offense. It can cleave any opponent with the strength and weight of its steel blade.
8515.name: aegislashblade

8516.text: It uses its colorful lights to overwrite the personalities and memories of othersand to control them.
8516.name: malamarmega

8517.text: It uses its many arms to toy with its opponents. This keeps the head extremely busy.
8517.name: barbaraclemega

8518.text: It spits a liquid that causes the regenerative power of cells to run wild. The liquid is deadly poison to everything other than itself.
8518.name: dragalgemega

8519.text: Mega Evolution has pumped up all its muscles. Hawlucha flexes to show off its strength.
8519.name: hawluchamega

8520.text: The iron in Sliggoo's drinking water turned its shell metallic. The Pokmon doesn't come out of its shell on sunny days.
8520.name: sliggoogalar

8521.text: If anything bad happens to it, Goodra retreats into its shell and bounces around like a rubber ball, knocking down trees and boring into mountains.
8521.name: goodragalar

8522.text: In keeping with the size of its body, this variety of Pumpkaboo takes the small spirits of children to the afterlife.
8522.name: pumpkaboosmall

8523.text: In keeping with the size of its body, this variety of Pumpkaboo takes the large spirits of adults to the afterlife.
8523.name: pumpkaboolarge

8524.text: In keeping with the size of its body, this variety of Pumpkaboo takes jumbo spirits to the afterlife.
8524.name: pumpkaboosuper

8525.text: Small Gourgeist pretend to be children to fool adults. Anyone who falls for the act gets carried away to the hereafter.
8525.name: gourgeistsmall

8526.text: Large Gourgeist put on the guise of adults, taking the hands of children to lead them to the afterlife.
8526.name: gourgeistlarge

8527.text: Jumbo Gourgeist aren't picky. They will forcefully drag anyone off to the afterlife.
8527.name: gourgeistsuper

8528.text: With its icy jaw, it swiftly plows across snowy fields and mountains, in search of nutritious vegetables people have stored in the snow.
8528.name: avalugggalar

8529.text: This is Zygarde when about 10% of its pieces have been assembled. It leaps at its opponent's chest and sinks its sharp fangs into them.
8529.name: zygarde10

8530.text: Born when all of Zygarde's cells have been gathered together, it uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.
8530.name: zygardecomplete

8531.text: In response to people's emotions during an unprecedented crisis, Zygarde Mega Evolves and calms the situation with its unmatched power.
8531.name: zygardemega

8532.text: This Pokmon is also known as the Royal Pink Princess. The dazzling, sparkling diamond on its forehead is a whopping 2,000 carats.
8532.name: dianciemega

8533.text: This is Hoopa's true form, in which it has regained its sealed powers. The hole in its chest is said to connect to another dimension.
8533.name: hoopaunbound

8534.text: Drampa's cells have been invigorated, allowing it to regain its youth. It manipulates the atmosphere to summon storms.
8534.name: drampamega

8535.text: Mega Falinks has taken on the ultimate battle formation, which can be achieved only if the troopers and brass have the strongest of bonds.
8535.name: falinksmega
